0831174302000291--.name: I honestly didn't believe I would live to see my granddaughter again. Thank heavens this world still has heroes.

0831174302000292--.name: But... I fear that $npc:11000188[gender:1]$ isn't getting any better... Such a delicate girl. She was frozen in ice too long. Sigh.

0831174302000293--.name: Something must be done to release her from the clutches of that blasted frost. I hate to impose, but could I ask you a favor?

0831174302000295--.name: I'd like you to go to $map:02000059$ and find $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$, a well-respected herbalist. He happens to be the son of an old friend. Surely he has something that will help my granddaughter!

0831174302000296--.name: I'd like you to go to $map:02000059$ and find $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$, a well-respected herbalist. He happens to be the son of an old friend. Surely he has something that will help my granddaughter!

0831174302000297--.name: Oh, hello. Is there something I can help you with?

0831174302000299--.name: Sigh... $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$'s lives here, but it's been more than three days since I last saw my husband.

0831174302000300--.name: What has my life become? More than half my day is spent cleaning the house, my kids keep getting into fights, and I haven't heard from my husband since he went out to gather herbs DAYS ago!

0831174302000301--.name: I'm positively fed up! But I can't just leave my kids alone to go looking for the inconsiderate oaf.

0831174302000302--.name: Well, if you DO find that man of mine, please tell him to come home. It's been three whole days without a peep. You might have a word with $npcName:11000192[gender:0]$ just down the hill. That's who my hubby was headed to see before his vanishing act.

0831174302000303--.name: You might have a word with $npcName:11000192[gender:0]$ just down the hill. That's who my hubby was headed to see before his vanishing act. And if you do find my husband, please tell him to come home.

0831174302000306--.name: Oh...? He did stop by, but that was days ago.

0831174302000307--.name: Do you know where he went?

0831174302000308--.name: He told me he was off to the $map:02000082$ to investigate the sighting of a precious $item:30000233$. He really ought to have been back by now.

0831174302000309--.name: If you're heading to the $map:02000082$ to find him, would you mind bringing him this bag? He scrambled off in such a hurry that he forgot it. The entrance to the $map:02000082$ is right below us.

0831174302000312--.name: Nope! I just got turned around.

0831174302000313--.name: You really should take better care of other people's belongings. Lucky for you, that wasn't the first bag $npcName:11000190$ has left here. Try not to lose this one, all right?

0831174302000314--.name: You mean that conspicuously bag-shaped object sticking out of your pockets? Perhaps you should check again.

0831174302000315--.name: Really now, I don't see anywhere in that bag of yours to put it. Why don't you come back after you've parted with some of that junk you're lugging around?

0831174302000316--.name: Hmph. You seem pretty bad with directions for an adventurer. The entrance to the $map:02000082$ is right below us. If you can't find it, you're not looking.

0831174302000319--.name: Huh, this bag looks just like one of mine. Even has my name on it. Oh! I must have left it at $npcName:11000192[gender:0]$'s house. Thanks. Uh... was there something else?

0831174302000320--.name: Your wife wants you to come home.

0831174302000321--.name: Ugh, family. Kids running around yelling all day, wife always nagging. "Don't leave your shoes on the table, dear. Will you be wearing pants to dinner? Honey, you can't feed the boys dog food." Go back home? No thank you.

0831174302000322--.name: I'd much rather stay here where it's quiet, picking mushrooms.

0831174302000324--.name: $npc:11000187[gender:1]$ said you could help me find an herb.

0831174302000325--.name: An herb? For $npc:11000187[gender:1]$? Is everything all right? I can't remember the last time I saw the old broad.

0831174302000327--.name: Really? Her granddaughter's not an ice cube anymore? That's great to hear. Come to think of it, I remember her hiring me to find her a $item:50200451$ Seed a few years back...

0831174302000328--.name: She was pretty torn up about losing her son, daughter-in-law, and granddaughter... At least with the kid back, maybe she can find a little peace. But wait, what do you need the herb for?

0831174302000330--.name: Hmm... What you need is something to kickstart her metabolism and get her body's temperature regulation back under control. There's a medicinal fruit that would help, super common too. I'm just can't for the life of me recall the name.

0831174302000331--.name: I wrote it down in my herb guide... Should be somewhere in my house. I gotta warn you though, my handwriting is not super great.

0831174302000332--.name: Head over to my house and look for my herb guide. My penmanship isn't great, but you should be able to read it.

0831174302000334--.name: Your dad sent me to look for his herb guide.

0831174302000335--.name: Really? You should look on top of the wardrobe. Dad likes to hide stuff where $npcName:11000200[gender:0]$ and I can't reach. Hey... Is my mom still outside?

0831174302000337--.name: Sigh... Guess I'm not getting off easy. How much longer do I have to sit like this? $npc:11000200[gender:0]$'s gonna get what's coming to him!

0831174302000338--.name: <font color="#909090">(The recipe book was on top of the wardrobe, just like $npc:11000202[gender:0]$ said. You start leafing through the pages.)</font>

0831174302000339--.name: Pg. 15 | Mushmint Especially effective for boosting energy and overcoming fatigue. It usually takes root near sources of fresh water, such as riversides or near waterfalls. To Prepare: Sun-dry and submerge in 1 cup $item:30000230$. Bring to boil, stirring until homogeneous.

0831174302000340--.name: Pg. 40 | $item:30000232$ Tasty, but no real medicinal value. Grind fruit to extract juice, or boil as tea. Often takes root between rocks within warm mountainous regions. Fruit best collected in spring.

0831174302000341--.name: Pg. 89 | $item:20000044$ Remarkable fruit, boosts metabolism and warms the body. Especially good for replenishing energy. Can be eaten whole, juiced, or blended. Its extract is used in numerous commercial medicines. It is often found in $map:02000059$ and $map:02000054$.

0831174302000342--.name: <font color="#909090">($item:20000044$, eh? If this book is right, the fruit could be the key to $npc:11000188$'s recovery. You should go to $map:02000059$ or $map:02000054$ and collect some.)</font>

0831174302000343--.name: <font color="#909090">($item:20000044$, eh? If this book is right, the fruit could be the key to $npc:11000188$'s recovery. You should go to $map:02000059$ or $map:02000054$ and collect some.)</font>

0831174302000344--.name: $MyPCName$, you're back. What's that you've got there in your hand? Did $npc:11000190[gender:0]$ help you find an herb that could help my dear granddaughter?

0831174302000346--.name: An... apple? Well, whatever works! Thank you very much. So, how is $npcName:11000190[gender:0]$ these days?

0831174302000348--.name: He seems generally miserable about life.

0831174302000349--.name: Oh, I'd hate to disturb the poor dear while she's resting. She's lasted this long, after all.

0831174302000350--.name: Oh no, what a shame. Is there a problem with his home life?

0831174302000351--.name: He and his wife are pretty much fed up with each other.

0831174302000352--.name: Oh my... It's easy to forget how precious family is. When someone is such a regular part of your life, sometimes you take them for granted.

0831174302000353--.name: Families should sacrifice for each other, and embrace one another no matter their flaws. After all I've lost, I would never neglect someone who meant so much to me.

0831174302000356--.name: I chop firewood 'til I'm stiff and sweaty, only to have it snatched up by the monsters living in the $map:02000082$ while my back is turned.

0831174302000357--.name: What do monsters need with firewood?

0831174302000358--.name: Why are you asking me? All I know is holes leading into the $map:02000082$ keep cropping up. $npcName:11000192[gender:0]$ found one south of here, and now parts of the road to $map:02000054$ have started caving in.

0831174302000359--.name: I went to investigate the crater, and what should I find but those blasted monsters digging their way to the surface.

0831174302000360--.name: First they cut down all the saplings in the area, and then they started stealing our lumber. This is the last time I let those monsters get their hands on my wood!

0831174302000361--.name: No firewood to sell, means no food in our bellies. Won't you please liberate my wood? You can just set it down wherever.

0831174302000362--.name: No firewood to sell, means no food in our bellies. Won't you please liberate my wood? You can just set it down wherever.

0831174302000363--.name: I'm in your debt, friend. Thanks!

0831174302000366--.name: Mind doing me a favor? I've put some mushrooms in this bag. Take them to my wife and tell her to sell them, okay?

0831174302000367--.name: And tell her not to sell 'em too cheap! These are RARE medicinal mushrooms that pretty much only grow in bat poop. Well... She'll probably figure it out. Her shrewd business sense and effective-but-yappy negotiating skills are why I fell in love with her.

0831174302000368--.name: Oh and on your way out would you mind re-lighting any burned out candles you come across? The bats hate the light, and I really enjoy not getting gnawed to death by rats with wings. Thanks buddy!

0831174302000371--.name: Nope! I just got turned around.

0831174302000372--.name: Oh. Well, it is pretty dark in this cave. I just want to stress how RARE these mushrooms are, and how much work it was to gather them. Here's another bag.

0831174302000373--.name: What? It's sitting right there in the top of your bag!

0831174302000374--.name: Yeesh. There's nowhere to put it! How do you walk with a bag that full? Come back to me when you've dumped some of that junk.

0831174302000375--.name: Oh, yeah. It 's pretty dark in here. Be careful on your way out.

0831174302000378--.name: Oh my... If he'd collected this many, he should have just come home! Sigh... Well, thank you for going to the trouble of bringing these.

0831174302000619--.name: Oh man, oh jeez. What should I do?

0831174302000621--.name: I am so fired... I was taking $npc:11000049$ for a walk, and before I knew what was happening, she had scampered down into a crevice in the side of the cliff!

0831174302000623--.name: Oh. $npc:11000049$ is my boss's cat. I can't go back without her, and there's no way I can climb down there. Please, save the cat and save my job!

0831174302000624--.name: Please climb down the cliff side and rescue $npc:11000049$ before my boss comes back.

0831174302000625--.name: I can't believe you risked your life climbing down to rescue $npc:11000049$... You've really saved my bacon! Thanks.

0831174302000686--.name: The monsters came out of nowhere... They trashed the lab, and attacked our researchers. Worst of all, they made off with the $itemPlural:20000049$ that were the foundation of our research!

0831174302000687--.name: The $itemPlural:20000049$ are experimental prototypes that were never meant to leave the lab. If they are introduced into the ecosystem, they could wreak untold havoc! Please, you must recover the samples before it's too late...

0831174302000688--.name: The $itemPlural:20000049$ are experimental prototypes that were never meant to leave the lab. If they are introduced into the ecosystem, they could wreak untold havoc! Please, you must recover the samples before it's too late...

0831174302000689--.name: Thank heavens... You recovered the $itemPlural:20000049$ before the monsters escaped the lab with them. I'm... Urgh... In your debt.

0831174302000690--.name: Sigh... Now what do I do?

0831174302000692--.name: My girlfriend and I have been together a while, so I thought it was time we went on a trip. And when we get here, she suddenly gets upset and takes off on a cable car.

0831174302000694--.name: I don't know why! She asked if I thought the cable car girl was pretty, and I told her she was prettier. And then she got mad and threw her $item:30000046$ down there in that field!

0831174302000695--.name: Anyways... I don't know what I did wrong, but I have to find the $item:30000046$ before I can go and patch things up with my girlfriend. The problem is, the place is surrounded with monsters.

0831174302000696--.name: I'm no warrior, and I've never been in a fight. Would you please recover the $item:30000046$?

0831174302000697--.name: I'm no warrior, and I've never been in a fight. Would you please recover the $item:30000046$?

0831174302000700--.name: You're a life-saver! This ring was custom-made, I would never have been able to replace it.

0831174302000701--.name: Sigh... But returning the promise ring isn't going to solve whatever made her angry in the first place.

0831174302000702--.name: I just know she's going to ask if I know what I did wrong. What am I supposed to say to that?

0831174302000703--.name: Listen, I'm really sorry to ask for another favor, but could you deliver this $item:30000046$ to my girlfriend $npc:11000224[gender:1]$? Maybe you could even figure out why she's angry for me...

0831174302000704--.name: What's wrong? Did I ask too much?

0831174302000705--.name: Hypothetically, what would you say if I lost the $item:30000046$?

0831174302000706--.name: Nope! I just got turned around.

0831174302000707--.name: Huh? Isn't that it on the floor right there? Please be more careful, it's the only one of its kind.

0831174302000708--.name: I saw you put it in your bag... is it not in there? Why don't you look again?

0831174302000709--.name: Your bag looks really full. Why don't you clean it up first?

0831174302000710--.name: Ah... Well, this place is pretty big.

0831174302000711--.name: Hmph! A $item:30000046$?! I don't need any more broken promises!

0831174302000713--.name: $npc:11000223[gender:0]$ is a two-bit cheat! He said I was PRETTIER than her! PRETTI-ER! That means he thinks she's pretty!

0831174302000714--.name: I thought we had a future together. But then some random girl smiles at him, and HE SMILES BACK?! He might as well have stuck a dagger in my heart!

0831174302000715--.name: But you said she smiled first...

0831174302000716--.name: And that boyfriend-thieving hussy should pay for what she did! But he shouldn't have smiled back. If he really loved me, the sheer radiance of my beauty should render all other women hideous in his eyes!

0831174302000717--.name: Is it possible you're overreacting just a tiny bit?

0831174302000718--.name: OVERREACTING?! He smiled at her! And I bet they're back there now making kissy-faces and planning about babies and stuff! I'm not even halfway through high school, and my life is over!

0831174302000719--.name: The only thing I want is a man who loves me unconditionally, and never so much as glances in the general direction of another woman. Is that really so much to ask for?

0831174302000722--.name: Those monsters over there appeared out of nowhere while I was on my way to $map:02000023$. They stole my shoe pouch. All the pretty shoes I was going to gift my friends in $map:02000023$ were in there!

0831174302000723--.name: They took the shoes out of my pouch and scattered them everywhere. If I don't get them back, I won't have any gifts for my wonderful friends. Would you please help me find all of my shoes?

0831174302000724--.name: Please help me get all of my shoes back from the monsters. Please.

0831174302000987--.name: I finally found a way to win her over... With $item:30000065$! But $npc:22000002[gender:0]$ stole it, and now my dream is forever lost.

0831174302000989--.name: There is a place called $map:02000089$ which was formed from tears shed over a missing lover. It is the only known source of $item:30000065$, a potion said to have the power to make those who consume it fall deeply in love. I went there and fulfilled $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ request in exchange for the potion, but I never got to use it...

0831174302000990--.name: But I can't give up on her... Even if one swing of $npc:22000002[gender:0]$'s hammer will undoubtedly be my doom.

0831174302000991--.name: Hmm... But you, you could defeat $npc:22000002[gender:0]$! Please, won't you recover the $item:30000065$?

0831174302000992--.name: Please recover the $item:30000065$ from $npc:22000002[gender:0]$. It's the only chance I have left.

0831174302000993--.name: You retrieved the $item:30000065$! Thank you so much. Now she'll have no choice but to love me!

0831174302001000--.name: You there! Want your fortune read?

0831174302001001--.name: You won't find a fortune teller with my skills anywhere else. And, because I'm in a good mood, I'll even read your fortune for free!

0831174302001002--.name: You won't find a fortune teller with my skills anywhere else. And, because I'm in a good mood, I'll even read your fortune for free!

0831174302001003--.name: Yes, yes. Very good. You have all the qualities one looks for in a great hero. Except... That's a shame.

0831174302001005--.name: Oh, it's nothing. Nothing at all. Just focus on the positive. No point in struggling against fate...

0831174302001006--.name: Typical. I give you a nice fortune, but are you happy? No. You just have to find out about the bad things, too...

0831174302001007--.name: $MyPCName$! When your time comes, it will come quickly and with a bang. You can slap mushrooms to pieces all day long, but one day you'll run across a big monster like $npcName:23000020[gender:1]$, and then it will be curtains for you.

0831174302001008--.name: That is your fate. No matter how much you struggle, you will never overcome it.

0831174302001009--.name: Oh, I'll overcome the heck out of it!

0831174302001010--.name: Hey, we've all gotta go someday, right?

0831174302001011--.name: With those skills of yours? Never in a million years. In fact, I'm so sure you can't do it, I'll give you my whole fortune if you defeat $npcName:23000020[gender:1]$ and return with $item:30000068$.

0831174302001012--.name: Big words for a—Wait, what? You're giving up already?

0831174302001013--.name: That's... that's sad. Listen, maybe you can get some friends together and have a go at $npcName:23000020[gender:1]$. So chin up, okay?

0831174302001014--.name: In fact, if you bring me $item:30000068$, I'll give you a reward. You like rewards, right? Think of it as a celebration for overcoming fate.

0831174302001015--.name: If you bring me $item:30000068$, I'll give you a reward. You like rewards, right? Think of it as a celebration for overcoming fate.

0831174302001016--.name: Well, well, well. $item:30000068$. I didn't see that coming.

0831174302001017--.name: It's a rare soul who can change their own destiny. Keep it up.

0831174302001020--.name: My glass slippers... Sniff... They were stolen by the monsters of the forest. I never even got a chance to wear them! They were so pretty and I didn't want to scuff them up...

0831174302001021--.name:
Some nice adventurers offered to find them, and searched a bunch of monsters nearby, but in the end they all gave up the search. 
<font color="#909090">(She wipes tears from the corners of her eyes.)</font>

0831174302001022--.name: Please find my glass slippers. I know the monsters have them! I don't blame them for wanting to feel pretty, but they're my slippers! Will you help me?

0831174302001023--.name: Please find my glass slippers. I know the monsters have them! I don't blame them for wanting to feel pretty, but they're my slippers! Will you help me?

0831174302001024--.name: Oh! That glimmering sheen! Did you really find them?

0831174302001026--.name:
I thought I'd never see them again! Thank you so much.
<font color="#909090">(She hugs the slippers.)</font>

0831174302001027--.name: As a show of gratitude, I'll give you a special gift! I hope it will be of some help to you...

0831174302001052--.name: Indeed I am, young one. Those horrible 'gogs have captured my children!

0831174302001053--.name: Please rescue my poor babies and release them in the water, where they belong. I beg of you!

0831174302001054--.name: Please rescue my poor babies and release them in the water, where they belong. I beg of you!

0831174302001055--.name: Thank you! Thank you! Ribbit! One day, my children and I will repay you for this.

0831174302001082--.name: Something is transforming the forest into toy blocks! The trees, grass, and flowers are all hardening.

0831174302001083--.name: There are butterflies trapped inside those toy trees... But butterflies are meant to fly! Please go break the tree and release the butterflies!

0831174302001084--.name: There are butterflies trapped inside those toy trees... But butterflies are meant to fly! Please go break the tree and release the butterflies!

0831174302001085--.name: Yay! You're a good person. I bet the butterflies are grateful.

0831174302001086--.name: I'm really worried. We're experiencing a water shortage like I've never seen before, even in times of drought. And now the bedrock of the basin is exposed.

0831174302001088--.name: There's a big waterfall a short ways south of here, but recently the water in the basin below has started slowly receding and transforming into ludibrium.

0831174302001089--.name: I don't know how many days it has been since I last watered my crops. I'm not sure how much longer they'll last.

0831174302001090--.name: The terrain around the waterfall is too treacherous to navigate, but perhaps there's still some water left in the basin? It would be amazing if you could have a look, and bring some back if you find any.

0831174302001091--.name: The terrain around the waterfall is too treacherous to navigate, but perhaps there's still some water left in the basin? It would be amazing if you could have a look, and bring some back if you find any.

0831174302001092--.name: So there was some water left after all. Thanks a bunch!

0831174302001093--.name: I've got a lot of thirsty plants, and even more ground to cover. Would you mind helping me a little longer?

0831174302001094--.name: I'll water the strawberries over here. Would you mind watering the carrot sprouts around my farm?

0831174302001095--.name: I'll water the strawberries over here. Would you mind watering the carrot sprouts around my farm?

0831174302001096--.name: Wow, all you did was spritz them with some water and the carrots popped right out of the ground. They must really have been thirsty. Thanks for the assistance!

0831174302001097--.name: My crops won't die for lack of water in the near future, but they're still in danger. There's a lot of hungry monsters out there eager to dig them up and eat them, or careless ones liable to trample right over them.

0831174302001098--.name: I'm sorry to impose, but could you do me one last favor? If you could thin the herd of aggressive monsters around here, it would really give me some peace of mind about my crop.

0831174302001099--.name: I'm sorry to impose, but could you do me one last favor? If you could thin the herd of aggressive monsters around here, it would really give me some peace of mind about my crop.

0831174302001100--.name: Thanks a ton! I hope one day I'll be able to farm in peace again.

0831174302001105--.name: Hey, maybe you can help me out. I hired $npcName:11000300[gender:0]$ to collect a $item:20000075$ for me, but I haven't heard a peep from him in ages!

0831174302001106--.name: He sent me a letter when he arrived at $map:02000039$ ages ago, and then... nothing! Can you go find out what happened to $npcName:11000300[gender:0]$?

0831174302001107--.name: He sent me a letter when he arrived at $map:02000039$ ages ago, and then... nothing! Can you go find out what happened to $npcName:11000300[gender:0]$?

0831174302001109--.name: She probably just wants to know what's taking so long. She doesn't care what happens to me at all!

0831174302001110--.name: There's a rumor going around town that $item:20000075$ can be used to cure all kinds of things—back pain, gout, mascot's itch, all that. That's why $npcName:11000268[gender:1]$'s so eager to get the stuff in stock.

0831174302001111--.name: I thought I could take care of this, but—Gosh, I hate to admit this. See, I've got this fear of falling down a hole and dying. And it turns out that the $npcName:22000005$ lives in a deep, dark hole...

0831174302001112--.name: I've got an idea! Why don't you jump into this hole here, beat the $npcName:22000005$, and deliver its tail to $npcName:11000268[gender:1]$ for me?

0831174302001113--.name: I'll leave the delivery to you. Who'd've thunk the $npcName:22000005$ would live in such a scary place?

0831174302001114--.name: I see you've returned with the $item:20000075$. Well, if you're going to do $npcName:11000300[gender:0]$'s job, it's only fair that you get his pay, too. Thanks.

0831174302001115--.name: What're you doing out here in the middle of nowhere?

0831174302001116--.name: I could ask you the same.

0831174302001117--.name: Chief $npcName:11000134[gender:0]$ hired me and my crew to set up an outpost here. Seems the monsters in the area have been getting out of hand, see.

0831174302001118--.name: I've seen it with my own two eyes. Bunch of beasties rampaged through my site and stole my $itemPlural:30000077$.

0831174302001119--.name: Maybe you could do me a solid and track down my stolen $itemPlural:30000077$. I'll make it worth your time.

0831174302001120--.name: The monsters who took the $itemPlural:30000077$ should still be around here somewhere.

0831174302001121--.name: Hey, that was pretty quick. I could use some workers with your drive!

0831174302001122--.name: Well, I got my $itemPlural:30000077$, so I guess this break is over. I don't suppose you're headed to $map:02000051$ next...

0831174302001123--.name: My bud $npcName:11000271[gender:0]$ is in $map:02000051$. He's the best building supplies dealer anywhere. And he's handsome, too. A real charmer!

0831174302001124--.name: He asked me to fetch some $itemPlural:30000015$ from the site. They're not too hard to find. Just dig up some rocks and you'll find them.

0831174302001125--.name: I don't have time to dig through the muck, even for a handsome fella like him. Can't say I'm too pleased to let him down, though. Mind digging up some $itemPlural:30000015$ and bringing them to him?

0831174302001126--.name: I don't have time to dig through the muck, even for a handsome fella like him. Can't say I'm too pleased to let him down, though. Mind digging up some $itemPlural:30000015$ and bringing them to him?

0831174302001127--.name: Ah, I smell $itemPlural:30000015$! $npcName:11000301[gender:0]$ must have sent you.

0831174302001128--.name: Why do you want this, anyway?

0831174302001129--.name: I use them to make $itemPlural:50100076$, of course. Just harden the muck and smooth it out. Rustic types go wild for it!

0831174302001130--.name: To thank you, I'd like to give you this $item:50100076$ on the house. I'm sure it'll look great in your home.

0831174302001146--.name: Ah, $MyPCName$? Would you do me a favor if you're heading out?

0831174302001148--.name: I found the title that $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ has been searching all over for, $item:30000087$. I left it on top of that book cart over there. Would you mind delivering it to her for me?

0831174302001149--.name: I found the title that $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ has been searching all over for, $item:30000087$. I left it on top of that book cart over there. Would you mind delivering it to her for me?

0831174302001150--.name: Hmm? $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ found the book? May I see it please?

0831174302001152--.name: Oh my, there is a record of it!

0831174302001154--.name: Here, look at this excerpt from Perion's history... "In the end, the shaman $npc:21000425[gender:0]$'s plan to conquer the land using dark magic was foiled, and he was sealed forever in the depths of the $map:02000047$ by a priestess of the order."

0831174302001155--.name: Several days ago, on an expedition to the ruins of the $map:02000047$, I discovered an altar that seems to have once belonged to an ancient shaman. I've gone through all sorts of documents pertaining to the temple, but I've found next to nothing about it.

0831174302001156--.name: Wait, this is all they have on $npc:21000425[gender:0]$? This is hardly a footnote... There's got to be more!

0831174302001157--.name: There's an antiques collector named $npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ who might know something more about the legend of $npc:21000425[gender:0]$.

0831174302001158--.name: $MyPCName$! How would you like to go on a trip to $map:02000076$? All you have to do is ask $npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ if he knows anything about $npc:21000425[gender:0]$'s story.

0831174302001159--.name: $MyPCName$! How would you like to go on a trip to $map:02000076$? All you have to do is ask $npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ if he knows anything about $npc:21000425[gender:0]$'s story.

0831174302001160--.name: $npc:21000425[gender:0]$? Hmm... I feel like I've heard that name before.

0831174302001161--.name: Oh that's right! When I visited Perion, I spoke with the sage $npc:11000039[gender:1]$ about the exploits of her predecessor, who is said to have been the one to do in $npc:21000425[gender:0]$.

0831174302001162--.name: $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ was a shaman who was exiled from Perion after committing a grave mistake. Rather than spending his days atoning for his errors, he attempted to use dark magic to summon a demon sealed away long ago, with the intent of destroying Perion.

0831174302001163--.name: Fortunately, the sage happened upon the ancient temple where $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ was hiding, and discovered his machinations. She cleaved off his head with a ceremonial sword, and hid it away. His dark magic kept him alive, but he wanders about searching for his lost head to this day.

0831174302001164--.name: I'm not quite sure where the ancient temple is. But according to myth, if you hang a $item:30000088$ on the altar where $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ practiced his wicked sorcery, he will come to claim it, in hopes of finding his lost head.

0831174302001166--.name: Well, legends and truth rarely see eye to eye. Can I see that book? Oh! So all this transpired in the $map:02000047$. Now all you need is a $item:30000088$ to discover if the legend is true.

0831174302001168--.name: I can see you're serious about this! Well, you'll have to do a lot of searching, but you should be able to find a $item:30000088$ on the $npcPlural:21000225$ of $map:02000056$. Believe it or not, a whole heap of them knocked over a tourist shop a while back and made off with a handful of masks.

0831174302001169--.name: I suppose they took issue with their deceased siblings being used to earn a quick meso. Can't say I blame them.

0831174302001170--.name: Well, you'll have to do a lot of searching, but you should be able to find a $item:30000088$ on the $npcPlural:21000225$ of $map:02000056$. Believe it or not, a whole heap of them knocked over a tourist shop a while back and made off with a handful of masks.

0831174302001171--.name: You found a $item:30000088$? Hehe. You're a tenacious one.

0831174302001172--.name: Now all that remains is to take this $item:30000088$ to the $map:02000047$ and find out if the legend is true or not.

0831174302001174--.name: Do you know of the $map:02000060$? It forms a border between the regions of Ellinia and Perion. Somewhere in its western hills, you'll find the $map:02000047$.

0831174302001175--.name: If you actually encounter $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ there, you must defeat him. He is a danger to the world.

0831174302001176--.name: If you actually encounter $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000047$, you must defeat him. He is a danger to the world.

0831174302001177--.name: You're finally back? I asked you to take a trip to $map:02000076$, not a vacation. What took so long? Anyways, did you learn anything about $npc:21000425[gender:0]$?

0831174302001178--.name: (Tell her about your journey to the $map:02000047$.)

0831174302001181--.name: No! You should have taken me with you! You could have damaged irreplaceable historical artifacts! I've got to arrange an expedition to $map:02000047$ and thoroughly document the place!

0831174302001183--.name: Oh yeah, you should go right now.

0831174302001184--.name: I may not look very tough, but I'm a seasoned archaeologist! I've lived through more snake pits and poison darts and ancient curses than you can imagine.

0831174302001185--.name: In any case, thank you for your concern, and the information. I'm just disappointed that I never got to see $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ in person...

0831174302001186--.name: I will! This is an archaeologist's dream. A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to elevate legend to historical fact!

0831174302001187--.name: In any case, thank you for your research. I'm just disappointed that I never got to see $npc:21000425[gender:0]$ in person...

0831174302001188--.name: Who are you, anyway? What are you doing here?

0831174302001189--.name: $npc:11000244[gender:1]$ sent me to retrieve the $item:30000084$ she ordered.

0831174302001190--.name: Good luck with that. To unlock the storage device containing the $item:30000084$, you'd have to first get the master key card from $npc:11000335[gender:0]$...

0831174302001191--.name: Which he'll probably give you right away... if you free him. He's, uh, kind of in a tough spot right now.

0831174302001192--.name: The robots are holding $npc:11000335[gender:0]$ hostage in the lower part of the lab, toward the west. Please... we can't lose his genius. You have to save him!

0831174302001193--.name: The robots are holding $npc:11000335[gender:0]$ hostage in the lower part of the lab, toward the west. Please... we can't lose his genius. You have to save him!

0831174302001194--.name: I suppose $npc:11000335[gender:0]$ isn't a swindler after all. But why couldn't he meet me personally, as agreed?

0831174302001195--.name: Malfunctioning robots were holding him hostage in an electric field.

0831174302001196--.name: I see. You don't suppose this $item:30000084$ will malfunction, too, do you?

0831174302001197--.name: Oh, never mind. I've paid you, now run along.

0831174302001198--.name: How much longer do I need to wait? Have I been swindled?

0831174302001200--.name: $npc:11000335[gender:0]$. He said he'd make me a maid robot, the very latest model. I even placed a hefty deposit on it, the cost of half a dozen apartment buildings in Tria. But it's been several days, and I haven't heard a peep.

0831174302001201--.name: Why is it so hard to find good help these day? The train to $map:02000100$ departs soon, so I suppose you'll have to do. Run along to the $map:02000163$ and retrieve my $item:30000084$. Don't fret, I'll reward you handsomely.

0831174302001202--.name: Why is it so hard to find good help these day? The train to $map:02000100$ departs soon, so I suppose you'll have to do. Run along to the $map:02000163$ and retrieve my $item:30000084$. Don't fret, I'll reward you handsomely.

0831174302001205--.name: I... I don't know! The robots from the lab just suddenly started attacking! I think they must be malfunctioning or something.

0831174302001243--.name: Hey! Adventurer! Over here! Do you know how to get to the hotel at the top of this cliff?

0831174302001244--.name: I sure do! Need help with something?

0831174302001245--.name: No way! I know what you have in mind.

0831174302001246--.name: Yes! I was making a delivery to $map:02000178$ when my cart overturned.

0831174302001247--.name: I thought of carrying my bread boxes one by one, but those stairs go up a looong way. How about you help me out?

0831174302001248--.name: Come on, I know it's a lot of work, but this bread isn't going to deliver itself. And with my cart overturned, I don't have a lot of options here.

0831174302001249--.name: I thought of carrying my bread boxes one by one, but those stairs go up a looong way. How about you help me out?

0831174302001250--.name: I thought of carrying my bread boxes one by one, but those stairs go up a looong way. How about you help me out?

0831174302001251--.name: Ah, ah, ah! The heavenly scent of bread from the Mendel Confectionery! How long has it been since this divine aroma has wafted through my nostrils?

0831174302001252--.name: I sampled these lovely baked goods every day when the hotel was located in $map:02000087$, but I haven't had them once since it was moved here to $map:02000171$.

0831174302001253--.name: Moved? You mean, since you built a new hotel?

0831174302001254--.name: No, I mean MOVED! One day, we're in $map:02000087$, and the next day I step outside and we're here in $map:02000171$, two sneezes from toppling off this wretched cliff!

0831174302001255--.name: We were all stunned. Frightened, even. Not just the guests, but the hotel employees as well.

0831174302001256--.name: The only one who took it in stride was $npc:11000341[gender:1]$, who was calm as you please. But now, you see, this hotel has become a landmark of $map:02000171$.

0831174302001257--.name: And here we are today, getting bread delivered from the Mendel Confectionery! Life is full of surprises, isn't it?

0831174302001258--.name: What am I just standing around for? The hotelier said to get a sample of the bread to him the moment it's delivered!

0831174302001259--.name: Would you mind bringing this $item:30000091$ to $npcName:11000340[gender:0]$? He's too courteous to yell at a guest.

0831174302001260--.name: Yes? What brings you back here?

0831174302001263--.name: Ah, that's because I still have it, you see? I must have forgotten to give it to you. Now, off you go!

0831174302001264--.name: No, you didn't. It's right here in your bag. Really, there's no reason to be nervous. You won't get yelled at.

0831174302001265--.name: Your bag looks really full. I would hate for the sample to get crushed...

0831174302001266--.name: It would be my pleasure to direct you to the entrance of the hotel. Take two steps to your left, and you'll see the grand doorway.

0831174302001267--.name: Wait a moment, that scent is...

0831174302001268--.name: Of course! It's the bread from the Mendel Confectionery! Tsk, $npcName:11000339[gender:0]$ was supposed to deliver this. To force his duties upon a guest...

0831174302001269--.name: Allow me to apologize on this behalf. We at the $map:02000178$ pride ourselves on our service. The fact that we're perilously perched upon the edge of a cliff does not change that, not so long as $npc:11000341[gender:1]$ and I are around!

0831174302001270--.name: That is why I asked for a sample of the bread. I must taste it first, to ensure it is of the same quality as it was back at $map:02000087$. Only then can I serve it to our guests!

0831174302001271--.name: Ah, it is as I expected. One nibble, and I am transported to heaven! Little by little, we are restoring the hotel to its former glory!

0831174302001296--.name: An axe-wielding zombie, if you can believe it. We've had reports of an undead menace based out of the $map:02000082$ in $map:02000059$ plaguing those who dwell nearby.

0831174302001297--.name: Naturally, I took a group of Green Hoods to investigate, but the fiend proved elusive, despite his great size.

0831174302001298--.name: Whoever he was in life, he is nothing more than a $npc:22000011[gender:0]$ now. For many years, the $map:02000082$ where he resides was sealed away. But somehow it seems that old tomb has been reopened, unleashing the horrors that dwell within.

0831174302001299--.name: The people are growing restless, spreading ridiculous rumors. They say that even a graze from his mighty axe will turn one into a zombie. Even if such claims are devoid of truth, it falls on us to protect the people.

0831174302001300--.name: The fiend must be defeated, and his axe reclaimed for disposal.

0831174302001301--.name: $MyPCName$, should you come across this $npc:22000011[gender:0]$, you must be certain to relieve him of both his axe and his afterlife. The peoples' safety depends on it.

0831174302001302--.name: $MyPCName$, should you come across this $npc:22000011[gender:0]$, you must be certain to relieve him of both his axe and his afterlife. The peoples' safety depends on it.

0831174302001303--.name: Well done, $MyPCName$! You've done a noble deed by dispatching the $npc:22000011[gender:0]$.

0831174302001406--.name: Mm! Such a sweet smell! And the consistency turned out just right. $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ would have loved it if he was here. Would you mind doing me a favor dear?

0831174302001408--.name: Just outside of $map:02000001$ is a place called the $map:02000017$. $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ told me he was building a house there. I'd love it if you'd take him this fresh pudding as a housewarming gift. I just know he'd love it.

0831174302001412--.name: Oh, what a shame to lose such a delicious treat. But it's easy to lose your footing out there in the woods. Not to worry, there's plenty more where that came from! I'll wrap some up for you, dear.

0831174302001413--.name: Now, now, don't be greedy dear. I can see it right there in your bag.

0831174302001414--.name: Your bag looks really heavy. Why don't you clear it out?

0831174302001415--.name: I wish that homes in $map:02000001$ were a little cheaper. I would have loved to have $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ as a neighbor. Such a nice man!

0831174302001416--.name: Oh! That heavenly smell! It must be $item:30000122$! Right?

0831174302001418--.name: Mm, yes! My nose was right! If I had enough money, I could live next door to $npc:11000002[gender:1]$ and eat tasty things every day... What a pity.

0831174302001419--.name: But what can I do? Houses are so expensive in $map:02000001$, I couldn't dream of buying one. That's why I decided to build a house here.

0831174302001420--.name: This place is beautiful and affordable, since it hasn't been developed as a residential area. And I'm almost done with preparations to build my house...

0831174302001421--.name: If you follow the path west of here, you'll reach a place called $map:02000041$. It used to be part of Ellinia forest, until humans ruined it by cutting down the trees, and trampling all over the grass to see the lake.

0831174302001422--.name: I want the $map:02000017$ and $map:02000041$ to return the way they were before humans came and wrecked them. That's why I planted trees all over the place... but they're dying because the tree bugs keep gnawing their tops off.

0831174302001423--.name: $npcPlural:29000022$ love hiding under the rocks around the trees in $map:02000041$. Please get rid of those wriggling menaces as soon as you can.

0831174302001424--.name: $npcPlural:29000022$ love hiding under the rocks around the trees in $map:02000041$. Please get rid of those wriggling menaces as soon as you can.

0831174302001425--.name: Thank you very much. One day, this whole region will be a forest again.

0831174302001461--.name: You seem weak. You really shouldn't be playing here.

0831174302001464--.name: If you'd like to keep your insides on the inside and your outsides on the outside, then you'd be wise not to wander around here like a tourist. Bump into $npc:22300105[gender:0]$, and it might just be the last thing you ever do.

0831174302001466--.name: Super. Super, super strong. A pipsqueak like you couldn't take him. But if you really want to try, be my guest.

0831174302001467--.name: If you'd like to keep your insides on the inside and your outsides on the outside, then you'd be wise not to wander around here like a tourist. Bump into $npc:22300105[gender:0]$, and it might just be the last thing you ever do.

0831174302001468--.name: You defeated $npcName:22300105[gender:0]$...? Impressive. I wonder if his serum wore off.

0831174302001469--.name: His what? What are you talking about?

0831174302001470--.name: Well, all I  know about $npcName:22300105[gender:0]$'s life before $npc:11000173[gender:0]$ hired him is some rumors I heard. Some say he was born with that monstrous strength. Descended from some legendary race of giants.

0831174302001471--.name: But the rumor I find most believable is that he was just some weak kid who got bullied a lot growing up. So he took some kind of special pill that transformed him into what he is now.

0831174302001473--.name: If I knew that, I'd have used it myself by now!

0831174302001474--.name: They say Goldus Pharmaceutical created it for testing, but honestly, it sounds pretty sketchy to me.

0831174302001507--.name: Just you watch! I'll have my vengeance!

0831174302001509--.name: That terrible beast has gone too far! Papa and I were weapon merchants here at this castle before the Blue Lapenta shattered and $npc:23000024[gender:1]$ awoke.

0831174302001510--.name: Everyone in the castle fled, but papa and I stayed up too late the night before making yellow snow cones as free gifts to go with every purchase, so $npc:23000024[gender:1]$ took us by surprise. Papa died defending me... but I will have my revenge!

0831174302001511--.name: I just... can't do it alone. $npc:23000024[gender:1]$ is really strong. You seem awfully hero-like. Do you want to help me?

0831174302001514--.name: Yes! I believe in you! Even though we've just met.

0831174302001515--.name: But what if... I gave you a gift? C'mon, you can't refuse, right?

0831174302001516--.name: Defeat $npc:23000024[gender:1]$ for me, and I'll give you a gift!

0831174302001517--.name: You did it! You avenged papa's death! Thank you, $MyPCName$! But... what do I do with my life now?

0831174302001525--.name: My mom worries about me so much since I've moved away. I spoke with a girl named $npc:11000420[gender:1]$ from $map:02000111$, which is just a little way down the road, and she says it's a wonderful place to live.

0831174302001526--.name: I'd like to investigate moving there, but I've got too much to do right now. Would you mind scoping it out? If it really is a nice place, maybe I'll move my mom out there too, so she can stop worrying about me.

0831174302001527--.name: I'd like to investigate moving to $map:02000111$, but I've got too much to do right now. Would you mind scoping it out? If it really is a nice place, maybe I'll move my mom out there too, so she can stop worrying about me.

0831174302001528--.name: Hm? $npc:11000360[gender:0]$ asked you to look into his moving here?

0831174302001530--.name: He told me he had too much work to do in $map:02000086$. Maybe he's changed his mind. Do you really think he'd want to move here?

0831174302001532--.name: What's taking him so long to decide? I guess it doesn't matter anyway. This place really used to be a good place live, until recently...

0831174302001534--.name: So many things have gone wrong! A huge, scary turtle appeared out of nowhere, my mom's fish store isn't doing nearly as well as before, crime's gone up. Maybe I'll tell him not to come here...

0831174302001535--.name: Sigh... I wonder where that turtle came from...

0831174302001537--.name: Do you see the island across the water? Lots of tourist liked to go there and enjoy the view, which in turn allowed me to make a good living off my business.

0831174302001538--.name: But after that behemoth turtle showed up and started harassing people, all my business dried up. If I had to guess I'd say it came up here to exact revenge for people polluting its ocean home. But if this goes on I won't be able to feed my family.

0831174302001539--.name: If enough people got together, they could chase that mean old turtle away. I know it's not the right solution, but I can't live like this. Next time that turtle shows up, won't you please round up some friends to chase him away?

0831174302001540--.name: If enough people got together, they could chase that mean old turtle away. I know it's not the right solution, but I can't live like this. Next time that turtle shows up, won't you please round up some friends to chase him away?

0831174302001541--.name: Thank you so much! Now the tourists should finally come back, and with them, my business. I like to think that turtle went back to where it used to live.

0831174302001542--.name: Hm... That $npc:11000055[gender:0]$! The book he borrowed is long overdue, but I haven't heard a peep out of him! What if he lost it?

0831174302001543--.name: If you happen to bump into $npc:11000055[gender:0]$ would you mind telling him to return it? I'll give him until tomorrow.

0831174302001544--.name: If you happen to bump into $npc:11000055[gender:0]$ would you mind telling him to return it? I'll give him until tomorrow.

0831174302001545--.name: Oh, right! I forgot again! I'll return it right away!

0831174302001546--.name: Take a look at the passage in this book here! Did you know that?

0831174302001547--.name: This book, Forest Legends and Folktales, has a story about $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$. They're really evil!

0831174302001548--.name: It says here that $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ were lake elves who fell deeply in love with a human named Alberto. They were so jealous of his fiance, Roanna, that they killed her and stole her jewel box containing the beautiful ruby necklace Alberto had gifted her.

0831174302001549--.name: $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ were supposedly banished to the cold snowy region in the north for what they did. But do you know what the scariest part is?

0831174302001550--.name: I heard from $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ that $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ have reappeared!

0831174302001552--.name:
Uh, she told me, but... I forgot. Would you go ask $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ where it was?
I really want to know, so I can make sure I never go there.

0831174302001553--.name: $npcName:11000327[gender:1]$ said that $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ reappeared, but I cant remember where. You should ask her if you're curious.

0831174302001555--.name: I didn't see them myself. I heard it from an explorer I happened to meet. $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ were sighted somewhere in $map:02000041$.

0831174302001556--.name: You won't find this in any book, but there are rumors that $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ fled from the snowfields of the north and returned to $map:02000041$. If that explorer really saw them, that's a huge find.

0831174302001557--.name: If they really have the necklace and jewel box that Alberto supposedly gifted Roanna as a token of love, that proves there is truth to the legend. Heck, it could validate the entirety of Forest Legends and Folktales!

0831174302001558--.name: We have the opportunity to make history and to confirm the myth...! Isn't that exciting? Will you go and see if $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ are in possession of those historical artifacts? If they do, they deserve everything that's coming!

0831174302001559--.name: Will you go and see if $npc:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npc:22000004[gender:1]$ are in possession of those historical artifacts? If they do, they deserve everything that's coming!

0831174302001560--.name: These are... the ruby necklace and jewel box that Alberto gifted Roanna as tokens of his love... They match their descriptions exactly!

0831174302001561--.name: But that means that the tragedy of Alberto and Roanna is true... How sad.

0831174302001562--.name: I did some research while you were out and learned that Roanna's grave is located somewhere atop the big tree in the northwest $map:02000017$.

0831174302001563--.name: I've heard that there's a grave marker for an unknown individual beside Roanna's... Perhaps Alberto wasted away mourning his love, and was buried by a kind soul passing through.

0831174302001564--.name: In any case, it's time to return these trinkets to their rightful owner. Would you be so kind as to go to and place them in front of Roanna's grave?

0831174302001567--.name: Nope! I just got turned around.

0831174302001568--.name: Oh! You left it right here, silly. Take better care of it this time, okay?

0831174302001569--.name: Didn't you put it in your bag? Maybe check again.

0831174302001570--.name: Your bag looks really full... Why don't you clear some space?

0831174302001571--.name: Still not used to $map:02000001$'s layout yet?

0831174302001572--.name: <font color="#909090">(Deep within the forest and off the beaten path, you discover an old headstone and a nameless grave marker standing sentinel alongside it. There is an inscription on the headstone.)</font>

0831174302001573--.name: Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.

0831174302001574--.name: <font color="#909090">(You should pull up the weeds in front of the headstone and leave the jewel box there.)</font>

0831174302001579--.name: <font color="#909090">($item:30000133$ is already in your bag.)</font>

0831174302001580--.name: <font color="#909090">($item:30000133$ is sitting beside the headstone, but there's nowhere in your bag to put it.)</font>

0831174302001581--.name: Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.

0831174302001582--.name: Thank you for going to all this trouble. While all this started as a curiosity, I find myself moved by the story of Alberto and Roanna. I hope that they have found peace together in the afterlife.

0831174302001583--.name: It makes me happy that we were able to return the tokens of their love and find justice for Roanna's untimely demise.

0831174302001584--.name: I bet that Alberto and Roanna are grateful too, wherever they may be now.

0831174302001603--.name: This seems like a terrible idea...

0831174302001605--.name: Err... I'm considering grabbing onto one of those vultures and letting it carry me over to $npc:11000427[gender:0]$... Between the snowstorms and the murderous shadow monsters, it's too dangerous to go on foot.

0831174302001606--.name: Sigh... But holding on to the wild vultures is dangerous too, even when their flight patterns are bizarrely regular. I could fall to my death, or get carried somewhere else entirely. But I have to get this $item:30000141$ to $npc:11000427[gender:0]$...

0831174302001607--.name: Hey... You don't look like you're afraid of traveling by vulture. Do you think you could help me out?

0831174302001610--.name: Nope! I just got turned around.

0831174302001611--.name: Oh yeah, it's right here. Here you go.

0831174302001612--.name: I saw you put it in your bag. Maybe have another look?

0831174302001613--.name: How do you travel with such a heavy bag? You should get rid of some of that junk...

0831174302001614--.name: Oh. All you have to do is wait for a vulture, grab it by the talons, and hold on for dear life while it flies you to the other side.

0831174302001615--.name: Don't tell me you've never flown by vulture before, that was marvelous technique. Say, what brings you here?

0831174302001616--.name: $npc:11000425[gender:0]$ asked me to bring you this book.

0831174302001617--.name: Ah, kids today. So afraid of a little danger. Danger is the spice of life! Anyway, thanks for this.

0831174302001618--.name: Now, let's have a look at that $item:30000141$. Where's that page on vultures? Hmm...

0831174302001619--.name: Why are you looking up vultures?

0831174302001620--.name: There's a place on the highland plains across the way where the vultures like to nest because it's closer to the sun. It's just about time for those eggs to start hatching.

0831174302001621--.name: When the eggs hatch, I intend to raise the hatchlings and train them to ferry the area's residents around. However, there's one hitch in my plan.

0831174302001623--.name: $npc:23000019[gender:0]$, the notorious beast hailing from Perion's mountain, often comes to prey on the hatchlings. Furthermore, one flap of those mighty wings is enough to send those eggs sailing through the air.

0831174302001624--.name: What I need is a coalition of heroes to defeat $npc:23000019[gender:0]$ the next time he appears. It's a dangerous task, but surely you must have some capable friends. Can I count on your help?

0831174302001625--.name: What I need is a coalition of heroes to defeat $npc:23000019[gender:0]$ the next time he appears. It's a dangerous task, but surely you must have some capable friends. Can I count on your help?

0831174302001626--.name: Thanks to your aid, the vulture hatchlings have survived. This time I'll be able to train them to aid the local populace.

0831174302001670--.name: Now what could the hold up be? I really should've heard something by now!

0831174302001672--.name: My brother was swept away by a typhoon on his way here to $map:02000062$ from across the sea. It's all my fault. I told him to come visit. He wasn't gonna at first, but changed his mind to make me happy, y'know?

0831174302001673--.name: The Adventurer's Guild said they were gonna do everything they could to find him, but I've waited and waited. You don't think they've forgotten, do you?

0831174302001674--.name: They found the wreckage from my brother's boat all the way out at $map:02000183$, but that was weeks ago, and since then, not a peep. You look pretty sturdy. Maybe you could go check it out?

0831174302001676--.name: Aw, gee, ma'am, that's really far away.

0831174302001677--.name: You're really going to help me? I knew you looked like a nice $male:lady,female:guy$! My brother's name is $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$.

0831174302001678--.name: It takes a long time to get to $map:02000183$ by land. Why don't you try talking to $npcName:11000994[gender:0]$ over by the quay? He might know of a boat headed to $map:02000183$.

0831174302001679--.name: Sure it is, if you go by land. But if you go by sea... Why don't you try talking to $npcName:11000994[gender:0]$ over by the quay? He might know of a boat headed to $map:02000183$.

0831174302001680--.name: Won't you please help me? My brother... $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$... I just need to know that he's all right.

0831174302001681--.name: Why don't you try talking to $npcName:11000994[gender:0]$ over by the quay? He might know of a boat headed to $map:02000183$.

0831174302001682--.name: Ho there, youngster. What brings you to these frosty lands?

0831174302001684--.name: I don't know who you're looking for, but beware the $map:02000067$! Beware! Beware! Bewaaaare!

0831174302001685--.name: I've seen cannibal mushrooms devour their own young. I've been chased by waterfowl covered in murderous feces. But I've never been more shaken than by what I saw at the $map:02000067$!

0831174302001686--.name: Holy moly. What did you see?!

0831174302001687--.name: A ship! A ship full of undead pirates! Those monsters have infected the land, up and down the coast from $map:02000063$ to the $map:02000067$!

0831174302001688--.name: I barely made it. I was paralyzed with fear, literally quaking in my boots, but this old man swooped in to save me right before a pirate took a bite out of my juicy belly.

0831174302001689--.name: That's who I'm looking for! Maybe. What was his name?

0831174302001690--.name: Uh... what was it that he shouted when he barreled through the undead? "$npcName:11000021[gender:0]$ the great has come to save the daaaaaay!"

0831174302001692--.name: We dodged the pirates and made it all the way here, where we ran into an Adventurer's Guild investigations team. He left me to guide them back to where we last saw the ship.

0831174302001693--.name: Guess that's where I've got to go then.

0831174302001694--.name: You've got guts, kid. That $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$ guy probably led them back to the $map:02000067$.

0831174302001695--.name: If you're sure you want to do it, head to $map:02000067$ to find the $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$. You won't catch me anywhere near there, though.

0831174302001696--.name: Ahoy, there. Nice to see a friendly face! Err... You know who I am, don'tcha?

0831174302001699--.name: Ha! I could tell from the start you were a right sharp $male:lad,female:lass$! But what brings ya to a dangerous place like this?

0831174302001701--.name: $npcName:11000025[gender:1]$? I almost forgot all about her. I've been right busy saving the day, and all.

0831174302001702--.name: Hmm... I see the stories of my heroism haven't traveled as far as I thought. Anyway, what brings ya to a dangerous place like this?

0831174302001704--.name: So you want to hear my tale, do ya? The day dawned bright and sunny when we cast off. Almost brought my grandson with me. Mighty lucky he had a spelling bee that day.

0831174302001705--.name: $map:02000062$ was just a stone's throw away, when suddenly, the sky darkened. Waves taller than any building back home came crashing down upon us before any of us could react. I was tossed overboard...

0831174302001706--.name: Sometime later, I opened my eyes to find myself on a ship teeming with undead pirates! Aye, I was aboard the fabled phantom ship!

0831174302001707--.name: I gathered my wits and flung myself at their feet, proclaiming how useful a living servant would be for them. One of the other prisoners was smart enough to do the same. We waited and waited, and when the pirates let down their guard, we made our grand escape!

0831174302001708--.name: We're the only ones in all history who've ever escaped the phantom ship alive! Least, I like to tell myself that. We found traces of previous prisoners aboard. From the shreds of fabric still sticking to their bones, I could tell they were sailors from the Victoria.

0831174302001709--.name: You know of the Victoria, right? Largest vessel to ever sail the seas, 'til it disappeared without a trace. Now I'm thinking, the undead pirates must have something to do with that. It'll all come to light when the Adventurer's Guild finishes their investigation.

0831174302001710--.name: As for me, I'm headed to $map:02000062$ so dear ol' $npc:11000025[gender:1]$ can stop frettin' over me. Talk to the Adventurer's Guild investigations team if you're interested in helping them out.

0831174302001711--.name: Talk to the Adventurer's Guild investigations team if you're interested in helping them find the truth about the missing Victoria.

0831174302001712--.name: Hey! Get outta here! Don't you know this area is dangerous?

0831174302001713--.name: I'm here to help with your investigation.

0831174302001714--.name: Are ya, now? Well, we're still doing our preliminary fieldwork. Don't wanna be rash, you know. But thanks for asking.

0831174302001715--.name: Ugh, I'm so sick of all of this... Maybe I should just walk out and join the strike.

0831174302001717--.name: Eep! You didn't hear that, did you? Please don't tell $npc:11000252[gender:0]$.

0831174302001718--.name: Sigh.... Ever since our Goldus Express drivers went on strike for better working conditions, it's been up to me to deliver the formal interview schedules for all of our unpaid replaceme—err, I mean prospective new interns.

0831174302001719--.name: We're about to start the interviews, but I have one last schedule to deliver, and I've worn my feet raw. Do you think... Do you think that maybe you could deliver it for me?

0831174302001721--.name: Really? You're my hero, thank you! The last candidate is $npcName:11001054[gender:0]$ from $map:02000166$. Please hurry and deliver the news, our first interview will begin shortly.

0831174302001722--.name: The last candidate is $npcName:11001054[gender:0]$ from $map:02000166$. Please hurry and deliver the news, our first interview will begin shortly.

0831174302001726--.name: You should go. The interviews are starting soon.

0831174302001727--.name: Oh man, I'd better hurry... I can't believe they read my application. This could be my big break!

0831174302001728--.name: Oh... But what am I going to do?

0831174302001730--.name: I'm working part time delivering pizzas right now... I had a job over at $map:52000004$, but I had to come back to get my parkour shoes, because that place is a death trap. But...

0831174302001731--.name: I don't have time to deliver the pizzas before they get cold AND make it to my interview! Listen, do you think you could do me a solid and deliver the pizzas I left outside $map:52000004$ to a guy named $npc:11001055[gender:0]$? He's working on the roof of the construction site, but he should hear you coming up.

0831174302001732--.name: I don't have time to deliver the pizzas before they get cold AND make it to my interview! Listen, do you think you could do me a solid and deliver the pizzas I left outside $map:52000004$ to a guy named $npc:11001055[gender:0]$? He's working on the roof of the construction site, but he should hear you coming up.

0831174302001733--.name: Are you new? I gotta say, you guys were pretty slow today. Don't be late next time, all right? I hate cold pizza.

0831174302001734--.name: Oh, $MyPCName$! You're a life-saver! I passed my first interview, and it's all thanks to you.

0831174302001736--.name: Thanks, but it's too early to celebrate... There's only one more interview, and all I have to do is memorize some stupid song to sing in front $npc:11000252[gender:0]$... But I can't think straight with undelivered pizzas on my mind...

0831174302001737--.name: $MyPCName$, I'll treat you to a free pizza if I get the job. Would you help me out one last time? $npc:11001055[gender:0]$ over at $map:52000004$ has ordered another stack of pizzas. Do you mind delivering them while I memorize this "$npc:11000477$" thingy?

0831174302001738--.name: I'll go ahead and leave the pizzas at the first floor of $map:52000004$ for you. Just take them to $npc:11001055[gender:0]$ on the top floor. I don't know what the guy does with all those pizzas, but he tips well, so I don't ask questions.

0831174302001739--.name: Hm? It's you again. And hey, the pizza's hot this time. Not bad kid! Now get out of here so I can ravage this pizza.

0831174302001781--.name: Will I never meet him again...?

0831174302001783--.name: I was on a delivery outside the city when I found him lying on the road. He wore the strangest bamboo hat and black robe. I was sure he would die if I left him there, so I brought him home and nursed him back to health...

0831174302001784--.name: But as soon as he could sit up under his own power, he left. I found his bed, neatly made, with a beautiful paper flower on top. He never said goodbye, but I could feel his gratitude in the flower...

0831174302001785--.name: I heard from one of my associates in $map:02000076$ that a swordsman with a bamboo hat was making a fuss near the Ant Tunnel. Do you think it could be him?

0831174302001786--.name: I must see him again! Would you please go to the Ant Tunnel and look for the man in the brown bamboo hat?

0831174302001787--.name: I must see him again! Would you please go to the Ant Tunnel and look for the man in the brown bamboo hat?

0831174302001788--.name: Ugh, my head. Nothing's going my way!

0831174302001790--.name: I'm... not sure? I was looking for a monster called $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ in the Ant Tunnel. Seemed that it was after the Red Lap... something bad.

0831174302001791--.name: I was ambushed by a huge mushroom with a charm on its head. I believe you call them $npcNamePlural:22000322[gender:0]$?

0831174302001792--.name: Anyway, I thought it was all over for me, but someone pushed me out of the way. Off the ledge overhead, but out of the way. I can't remember much after that...

0831174302001793--.name: What did this person look like?

0831174302001794--.name: I couldn't see his face. It was hidden by his bamboo hat...

0831174302001795--.name: Do you think he defeated the $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$ on his own? She was a pretty fearsome fungus...

0831174302001796--.name: But what if he wasn't strong enough? What if the $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$ waddled off with his $item:11300119$? In the end, she may hold the answer to his fate...

0831174302001797--.name: Ugh, my head... It hurts to think. Besides, this is all distracting me from my real mission.

0831174302001798--.name: Do you think this bamboo man defeated the $npc:22000322[gender:0]$? You should look into it for yourself.

0831174302001799--.name: This... this is the same kind of flower that he left behind... Where did you find this?

0831174302001802--.name: It doesn't look good. I'm sorry...

0831174302001803--.name: Then I'll never see him again... I never even learned his name, you know? I even made new clothes to give him on our next meeting. It was all for nothing...

0831174302001804--.name: I can't stand to keep these. Please, I want you to have them.

0831174302002979--.name: Once I leave this place, that's it! No more crime. But there's one thing that still bothers me.

0831174302002981--.name: Those $npcPlural:21000281$ over there recently showed up. They're more dangerous than a hooligan like me. We may swing clubs and throw our weight around, but they're something else.

0831174302002982--.name: They run around that construction site throwing dangerous bombs without any regard for safety! I know, as a hooligan, I'm not really one to talk, but still! The number of villains and brigands in this place has gotten out of control.

0831174302002983--.name: But you already know I swore to leave the hooligan life behind. I can't go around beating people up even if they are throwing bombs around. Could you please teach those $npcPlural:21000281$ a lesson for the safety of everyone here?

0831174302002984--.name: You already know I swore to leave the hooligan life behind. I can't go around beating people up even if they are throwing bombs around. Could you please teach those $npcPlural:21000281$ a lesson for the safety of everyone here?

1113182202005922--.name: Wow! Is there nothing you can't do? I'm so glad I met you. It really helps having a friend I can depend on now that I've turned over a new leaf.

0831174302003370--.name: He's been in there a while now, yet time's still frozen...

0831174302003372--.name: My colleagues and I are from the Chaos Tempus Center. We're investigating the stoppage of time in this area. At first, we thought it was due to the expansion of the temporal crevice at the nearby $map:02000008$...

0831174302003373--.name: But the Clock Tower seems to be the true culprit. Time stopped when the clock stopped. We sent a member of our team into the $map:02000161$ to investigate.

0831174302003374--.name: But it's been a while, and we haven't heard from him. Perhaps, if you have a moment, you could venture into the $map:02000161$ and check on my colleague?

0831174302003375--.name: Perhaps, if you have a moment, you could venture into the $map:02000161$ and check on my colleague?

0831174302003378--.name: I simply cannot comprehend... how I haven't solved this mystery yet!

0831174302003379--.name: To solve the mystery of the stopped clock, I must first study the $item:39000026$.

0831174302003381--.name: It's not that simple! A rabbit riding around on a clock, of all things, rolled by and stole it right out of my hands, then fled into the deepest part of the tower!

0831174302003382--.name: There are dozens of monsters between me and that blueprint. I'm a researcher not a fighter... but you look strong. Will you help me get that $item:39000026$ back?

0831174302003383--.name: A rabbit riding around on a clock, of all things, rolled by and stole the $item:39000026$ right out of my hands, then fled into the deepest part of the tower! Will you help me get it back?

0831174302003384--.name: You did it! Thank you so much!

0831174302003387--.name: According to this blueprint, the control center of the clock isn't even in this tower... It's in the basement!

0831174302003388--.name: I'm in the wrong place! But how do I get to the basement? I don't recall seeing a— Let's see here, it says... Oh. Ah, I see. Hmm...

0831174302003389--.name: It looks like the basement to the Clock Tower can be reached from the highest point of the Clock Tower! All right, then! I'll just have to go down, er... up, er... down-up to the basement!

0831174302003390--.name: Do me a favor and let $npcName:11000870[gender:0]$ know I'll be back soon. I'll have this clock fixed in no time!

0831174302003391--.name: Do me a favor and let $npcName:11000870[gender:0]$ know I'll be back soon. I'll have this clock fixed in no time!

0831174302003392--.name: Wait, wait, wait. You're telling me the controls to the clock are in the basement... which you get to by climbing to the top of the Clock Tower?

0831174302003393--.name: And $npcName:11000871[gender:0]$ is heading down... up there alone? But he has no idea what he'll find!

0831174302003394--.name: Couldn't you have talked some sense into him? Or at least accompanied him? Whatever. Thanks for the "help," pal.

0831174302003506--.name: Hm... The mayor of $map:02000100$ is asking for Dark Wind's help.

0831174302003508--.name: Giant robot attacks in $map:02000100$. These things happen, of course, but something about this robot has got the mayor extra worried. He wants us to get its programming chip so we can figure out who made it.

0831174302003509--.name: I wouldn't mind smashing some robot skull.

0831174302003510--.name: I knew I could count on you. The robot's been spotted at the $map:02000145$. Dismantle it, get the $item:30000280$, then give it to $npc:11000065[gender:0]$. Good luck against $npcName:23000054$.

0831174302003511--.name: I knew I could count on you. The robot's been spotted at the $map:02000145$. Dismantle it, get the $item:30000280$, then give it to $npc:11000065[gender:0]$. Good luck against $npcName:23000054$.

0831174302003512--.name: It's about time Dark Wind sent someone with the chip! Hand it over.

0831174302003514--.name: Hmm. I see. From looking at this chip, I can tell that... I need to send it to the lab for the eggheads to analyze.

0831174302003515--.name: Listen, it'll take some time to analyze the $item:30000280$. Why don't I give you something else to do in the meantime?

0831174302003517--.name: Another robot is on a rampage on $map:02000314$, near $map:02000164$. That's an important voter district for me! What's worse, if this $npc:23100055$ damages the power links on the tower, all of $map:02000100$ will lose electricity!

0831174302003518--.name: You've tangled with these bots before. Can you go to $map:02000314$, defeat $npc:23100055$, and reconnect the power links?

0831174302003519--.name: You've tangled with these bots before. Can you go to $map:02000314$, defeat $npc:23100055$, and reconnect the power links?

0831174302003520--.name: Well, the lights are still on. Were you successful?

0831174302003522--.name: That is a relief. I wouldn't want to keep my citizens in the dark, if you know what I mean.

0831174302003523--.name: Hm... I expected to receive the analysis of the $item:30000280$ by now. I have a hunch that those scoundrels in $map:02000270$ are behind these attacks...

0831174302003525--.name: Politics can be... messy. $map:02000270$ was founded by a group of scientists who were exiled from $map:02000100$.

0831174302003526--.name: Our top science advisors assured me and my fellow politicians that these particular scientists were no good, so we evicted them from their labs to house more upstanding ventures.

0831174302003527--.name: However, even if $map:02000270$ is outside of the city limits, it's still under $map:02000100$'s jurisdiction.

0831174302003528--.name: And $map:02000100$ is growing more and more every day. I'm working on some legislation to expand our borders to include $map:02000270$, but the residents of that slum don't like the idea. Seems they want to run their own government.

0831174302003529--.name: That's a load of nonsense, of course. And I wouldn't put it past those no-good rabble-rousers to attack us with killer robots.

0831174302003530--.name: Anyway, I can't do anything with more proof. For now, tell Dark Wind to double its patrols. I won't have any more robot attacks in my city.

0831174302003531--.name: I can't do anything with more proof. For now, tell Dark Wind to double its patrols. I won't have any more robot attacks in my city.

0831174302003532--.name: I hear you cleaned things up at $map:02000099$. How'd it go?

0831174302003533--.name: Well, the robots are all gone now.

0831174302003534--.name: And did anything come of the $item:30000280$?

0831174302003536--.name: Hm... I hope the mayor's suspicions aren't true. If it comes to fighting between us and $map:02000270$... That won't be good for anyone.

0831174302003537--.name: We need to be focusing our attention on the forces of darkness. Victory here will be meaningless if we're at each other's throats when this is all over.

0831174302003538--.name: No matter what, we can't let that happen. Our enemy isn't just the Land of Darkness... it's mistrust and hatred itself.

0831174302003594--.name: There's some guy named $npc:11000604[gender:0]$. He spends all day with his head in a book, oblivious to the world around him. And now my copy of $item:39000011$ has gone missing. He has a nasty habit of borrowing other people's books without asking permission.

0831174302003595--.name: If I know $npc:11000604[gender:0]$, he'll be off in the $map:02000109$ hiding out of sight. Would you mind finding him and retrieving my copy of $item:39000011$?

0831174302003596--.name: If I know $npc:11000604[gender:0]$, he'll be off in the $map:02000109$ hiding out of sight. Would you mind finding him and retrieving my copy of $item:39000011$?

0831174302003599--.name: Ugh... Go away. I'm trying to read in here.

0831174302003600--.name: Sigh... I don't know who you are, but I can still hear you breathing out there. Get lost already.

0831174302003602--.name: Yeah, well I'm not done with it. I still have somethings to check out. Tell him he'll get it back later.

0831174302003603--.name: He didn't ask for his book back later.

0831174302003604--.name: Sigh... And he really needs it right now? Well then, I'll offer you a deal. You help me with my research, I'll give you the book. I need a $item:30000189$.

0831174302003606--.name: From a $npc:22000038$, obviously. They appear in $map:02000089$ from time to time. And don't come back without the claw!

0831174302003607--.name: The $npc:22000038$ appears in $map:02000089$ from time to time. Go there and bring back its claw.

0831174302003612--.name: Really? You're more tenacious than I expected. I was sure you'd chicken out.

0831174302003613--.name: Oh hey, you're back. Here's the book. I finished reading it while you were gone.

0831174302003614--.name: ...Was this whole errand a ploy to buy time?

0831174302003615--.name: Of course. What the heck would I need a $item:30000189$ for? Anyway, take the book and get lost.

0831174302003619--.name: Argh! How am I supposed to get anything done with all these interruptions? Here's your book. Now stop bothering me!

0831174302003620--.name: Are you daft? I saw you put it in your bag.

0831174302003621--.name: And where are you going to put it? Clear some junk out of your bag!

0831174302003622--.name: Are you being serious right now? How could get you get lost in a cavern this small?

0831174302003623--.name: Oh, you're back. Did you find my copy of $item:39000011$?
