0831174302003625--.name: So it was $npc:11000604[gender:0]$, just as I expected! There's something I needed to confirm, though I've been waiting so long it's a wonder I remember.

0831174302003626--.name: Ah! Here it is... Yes, yes, as I expected.

0831174302003628--.name: Oh, nothing too interesting. Local fertilizer sources and collection techniques. Anyways, I found what I was looking for. Thanks for your help. Say... Do you like books?

0831174302003630--.name: I'm not really a big reader.

0831174302003631--.name: Really? That's great! Since I'm done with it, how about I give you this copy of $item:39000011$ as a show of appreciation? It's quite interesting!

0831174302003632--.name: Really? Then this will be perfect for someone of your reading level! $item:39000011$ is more of a picture book, so it's a good gateway into the world of reading. Give it a look!

0831174302003633--.name: Something's been irking me... $npcName:11000021[gender:0]$ said that the leader of the undead pirates calls himself... $npc:23100015[gender:0]$. That's also the name of the captain of the Victoria...

0831174302003634--.name: ...Who also happened to be the best friend of my late father. $npc:23100015[gender:0]$ was like a father to me, after my own passed away. $npc:11000021[gender:0]$ mentioned that he saw $item:39000032$ in the captain's quarters...

0831174302003635--.name: $item:39000032$ could contain valuable information about what really happened to the Victoria. I'd really like to read it. If you really want to help with our investigation, then maybe you can retrieve it from the captain's quarters.

0831174302003636--.name: The $item:39000032$ in the undead pirate leader's chambers could contain valuable information about what really happened to the Victoria. I'd really like to read it.

0831174302003637--.name: This is it! I recognize the handwriting! Let's see...

0831174302003638--.name: Oh, geez. It's kind of splotchy, but on this last page here, do you see it? "Monkfish"... "ruler"... "dark sea"...? What terrors did the Victoria face?!

0831174302003761--.name: This neighborhood has really grown on me. I'm a bit sad though. If I move, I won't be able to see my neighbor's $item:30000328$ any more.

0831174302003763--.name: Oh, it's a really rare kind of sheep. They have pink wool, and they're so soft and fluffy! My neighbor $npc:11001013[gender:1]$ recently adopted a little lamb born in $map:52000002$.

0831174302003764--.name: Could you tell $npc:11001013[gender:1]$ to come visit with her $item:30000328$ before I move? $npc:11000401[gender:0]$ would love it.

0831174302003765--.name: I'd love to see it one last time. Would you please ask $npc:11001013[gender:1]$ to visit me with $item:30000328$ before I move

0831174302003766--.name: You have impeccable timing! I just got back from a trip. But why are you looking for me?

0831174302003768--.name: Oh! $npc:11000246[gender:0]$ is moving? How disappointing. He never said a peep to me about it.

0831174302003769--.name: I'm so sad that $npc:11000246[gender:0]$ is moving! I'd love to bring my $item:30000328$ along for a visit before he moves. But first, I've got to find the comic book I borrowed from $npc:11000401[gender:0]$ for my trip.

0831174302003770--.name: Since you're here... I need to unpack my bags and track down that comic book. While I'm doing that, would you be so kind as to retrieve my little $item:30000328$?

0831174302003771--.name: It's still too young to go on trips with me, so I left it in the care of the folks at $map:52000002$.

0831174302003772--.name: I've got so much to do! Would you help me out and bring my $item:30000328$? It's still too young to go on trips with me, so I left it at $map:52000002$.

0831174302003773--.name: $npc:11001013[gender:1]$ asked you to pick up her $item:30000328$? I don't know what to do.

0831174302003774--.name: Sniff... sniffle... Wolves invaded our farm... sniff... They destroyed it and took $npc:11001013[gender:1]$'s $item:30000328$...

0831174302003775--.name: My brother told me to find someone who can help. Maybe you can! Please chase those wolves off our farm and bring back that poor $item:30000328$. I'm really worried something bad will happen to it!

0831174302003776--.name: Please chase those wolves off our farm and get $item:30000328$ back. I'm really worried something bad will happen to $item:30000328$!

0831174302003777--.name: Aww! How has my sweet little lamby been doing? Hm? It's scared stiff, and its wool is damaged. What happened?

0831174302003779--.name: Goodness! If it weren't for you, I might have never seen my baby again. How scary! I'm so glad you brought it back, but what about its siblings in $map:52000002$? Are they okay?

0831174302003781--.name: Phew! That's a relief! Thank you! Why don't you choose whatever you'd like in my shop? I'll give you a special discount as thanks.

1021192602004191--.name: Huh? $MyPCName$! Is something wrong? You look really very tired today... I know exactly what you need! Oh, what is the word...?

1021192602004193--.name: You know! When people want to relax. They have a... spa day! That's the word! You hop in a $item:50400036$ and bathe with expensive, fragrant soap. You stick your feet in a nice warm $item:50400091$, and then you lie back in a cozy $item:50400037$ and let all of your troubles fly away.

1021192602004194--.name: Go on $male:boy,female:girl$, treat yourself! Well, it need not be your own house. You could even go to a friend's house and make use of their tub or massage chair for a while. Whatever you decide, take a little me-time, all right?

1021192602004195--.name: You know! When people want to relax. They take a spa day! That's the word! You hop in a $item:50400036$ and bathe with expensive soap. You stick your feet in a nice warm $item:50400091$, and then you lie back in a cozy $item:50400037$ and let a machine do all the work!

1021192602004196--.name: Well, how do you feel? You look like a million mesos!

1021192602004197--.name: Oh my! Is it true? Someone told me of a mystical object often referred to as an idiot box. They say, those who gaze upon it actually grow dumber! Such an outrageous tale must surely be false.

1021192602004198--.name: $MyPCName$, what do you say, will you disprove this myth? Go and find one of these so-called "Televisions", look upon it, and tell me what happens.

1021192602004199--.name: $MyPCName$, will you disprove this myth? Go and find one of these so-called "Televisions", look upon it, and tell me what happens.

1021192602004200--.name:
Oh! $MyPCName$, you're back!
Tell me, what is one plus one? And 3 times 5?

1021192602004202--.name: One plus one is two, and three times five is fifteen.

1021192602004203--.name: Ah...! Were you rendered mindless by this "Television"? No... the look on your face tells me you are in full possession of your faculties.

1021192602004204--.name: Hmm. Perhaps those questions were too simple. But honestly, you do not seem any dumber than before. I will consider this myth busted.

1021192602004205--.name: Oh, what I would give for a soft and friendly kitten to keep me company. But sadly, I could not bring one on our ship. In my homeland the cats were so friendly, but the ones living here seem so cold and distant. Someone here said there is an object called a $item:50400004$ that makes cats much more playful.

1021192602004206--.name: $MyPCName$, would you find a $item:50400004$ and see if the rumors are true?

1021192602004207--.name: $MyPCName$, would you find a $item:50400004$ and see if the rumors are true?

1021192602004208--.name: Oh, $MyPcName$, you're finally back! I managed to befriend a cute little kitty, without the aid of a $item:50400004$! I'm sorry, I didn't mean to waste your time.

1021192602004209--.name: One of my friends said she attended a party at someone's home, where they have glimmering lights just like at a dance club! Ahh... It would be so much fun to... what do you say? "Let loose" on the dance floor.

1021192602004210--.name: $MyPCName$, do you think you could find me one of these house-parties? And if you do not mind, please ensure the lights are all working. I would hate for anyone to miss my disco-dance debut!

1021192602004211--.name: $MyPCName$, do you think you could find me one of these house-parties? And if you do not mind, please ensure the lights are all working. I would hate for anyone to miss my disco-dance debut!

1021192602004212--.name: Oh! Did you find a suitable house? How was their lighting setup? Ooh! Did they have a disco ball?

1021192602004214--.name: Oh yes! Yalamas! I will practice my dance moves and pay that house a visit! Thank you for checking it out.

1021192602004215--.name: Hello $MyPCName$! I am wondering,  are you a... how do you say...? Hardcore gamer? Or perhaps a "filthy casual?"

1021192602004216--.name: Woah, lady. You never go full meta...

1021192602004217--.name: Hmm? I do not know this phrase. I ask only because my friend spoke of roving packs of gamers known for subjugating the neighborhood arcades. I love meeting new people, but I do not know if I am good enough for them to accept me. Back home, we only had very basic games ling Plong and Tortroise.

1021192602004218--.name: Could you be inspecting the neighborhood arcades and see if the games are simple enough for a beginner?

1021192602004219--.name: Could you be inspecting the neighborhood arcades and see if the games are simple enough for a beginner?

1021192602004220--.name: Hmm? Let me check your fingers for callouses! What do you think, $MyPCName$, are the games around here easy to learn, or hard?

1021192602004221--.name: Easy-peasy. I was eating noobs three square meals a day.

1021192602004223--.name: It was awful. I never want to play another video game so long as I live.

1021192602004224--.name: Oh, really? That is wonderful news. When I play these games, I will try to live up to your angry talents!

1021192602004225--.name: Hmm... Yes, I suppose you are right. There is no point taking such things so seriously.

1021192602004226--.name: Oh no! Do not say that, $MyPCName$. If you could not defeat these games, how can I hope to? If you ask me, all that matters is that you have tried.

1021192602004227--.name: After some thought, I have decided that the best way to learn about your culture is to surround myself in it fully! That is why I am thinking about working as a maid. However... I have no professional housekeeping experience.

1021192602004228--.name: Washing dish, cooking, cleaning, and dusting... When you spend your whole life traveling, it is easy to neglect such talents. $MyPCName$, would you perhaps be willing to try performing such tasks, and let me know if they are difficult?

1021192602004229--.name: Washing dish, cooking, cleaning, and dusting... When you spend your whole life traveling, it is easy to neglect such talents. $MyPCName$, would you perhaps be willing to try performing such tasks, and let me know if they are difficult?

1021192602004230--.name: How swiftly you return! Well, how was a day in the life of a maid? Do you think it is something I would be good at?

1021192602004231--.name: Housework is easy, anyone can do it!

1021192602004232--.name: Cleaning is the worst. Don't put yourself through that.

1021192602004233--.name: Cooking and cleaning is a lot of work. There's gotta be a better way.

1021192602004234--.name: Really? What a relief... I will start looking for a job immediately! As a thank you, I will buy you some manner of treat when I receive my first day's pay.

1021192602004235--.name: Ah... Really? Well, thank you for suffering so I do not have to.

1021192602004236--.name: Is that so? I suppose I will have to find another way to fit in.

1021192602004237--.name: $MyPCName$... Your look unwell. Perhaps you need to, as they say... unleash the dogs?

1021192602004239--.name: I'm already running on empty, thanks.

1021192602004240--.name: Now that you mention it, I can't remember the last time I went...

1021192602004241--.name: Do you need to... you know... cut rope? Drop anchor? Grow a tail? Clear out your inventory? Feed the fish? Bake some brownies? Make an offering at the porcelain altar? Forgive my vulgarity, but you really should relieve yourself daily. You don't want to make a mess...

1021192602004242--.name: Hmm...  Forgive me, but I do not believe you. Having sampled many foreign cuisines, I recognize that queasy look when I see it! Go find a restroom at once, before you have an accident!

1021192602004243--.name: No wonder you look so... congested? Go find a place to do your business at once, before you embarrass yourself!

1021192602004244--.name: At absolute minimum, you should relieve yourself once a day!

1021192602004245--.name: You look lighter! Are you feeling better? Saving the world is important, but you cannot forget your basic needs.

1021192602004246--.name: Ugh! Something smells like a shazaba! Oh, sorry. That is how we say "incontinent camel" in our language. $MyPCName$... when was the last time you bathed? Hygiene is important. Go and clean yourself up!

bamboo, wooden boxes, blocks of cheese... To break such things with their bare hands, they must be quite strong! $MyPCName$, you look strong... Why not crush some things to release some stress?

I hear the coffee at $map:2000033$ in $map:2000001$ is quite good... Why don't you go there, take a seat, and just relax for a while?

1023001202004366--.name: How was it? Was the coffee as good as they say? It may not be a big inn, but quality is much more important than quantity, yes?

1023001202004367--.name: $MyPCName$, you look so tired. When was the last time you took a vacation? I hear the view from $map:2000178$ in $map:2000171$ is great, and the service is even better! 1023001202004369--.name: What do you think? Was it everything they say? The way there may be dangerous, but I saw on a talking box that there is no finer home away from home!

1023001202004370--.name: $MyPCName$! Have you read the best-seller "$item:39000001$?" It sounds like such a cute and heartwarming story! Do you think you could find me a copy?

1023001202004372--.name: Wow, $MyPCName$! Thank you so much! I will treasure it.

1023001202004373--.name: I have heard there is a machine in town that can dismantle unused equipment to receive useful materials. $MyPCName$, if you have any junk equipment you no longer need, why don't you try dismantling it?

1023001202004374--.name: I have heard there is a machine in town that can dismantle unused equipment to receive useful materials. $MyPCName$, if you have any junk equipment you no longer need, why don't you try dismantling it?

1023001202004375--.name: You already dismantled some unneeded equipment? What happened? Did you get anything good? Well, it doesn't matter. You can travel lighter without that junk weighing you down!

1023001202004376--.name: I've heard there are all kinds of exciting events going on every day here! That adorable Mr. $npcName:11000168$ makes a public announcement whenever one is available! You can play alongside others! What fun. $MyPCName$, you should participate!

1023001202004377--.name: I've heard there are all kinds of exciting events going on every day here! That adorable Mr. $npcName:11000168$ makes a public announcement whenever one is available! You can play alongside others! What fun. $MyPCName$, you should participate!

1023001202004378--.name: Did you have fun? This land is so exciting!

1023001202004379--.name: Have you met $npc:11000711[gender:1]$? You can often find her dancing around by the $map:02000064$ taxi stop. She was the first friend I made after coming to this land. It would mean the world to me if the two of you got along. Why don't you go introduce yourself?

1023001202004381--.name: What did you think? Isn't $npcName:11000711[gender:1]$ so much fun? There are so many wonderful people in this city.

1023163802004413--.name: Hello, $MyPCName$! There's something I want to read called "$item:39000009$." I heard you can get a copy from the guards at $map:2000124$... Do you think you could pick one up for me?

1023163802004414--.name: Wow, $MyPCName$! Thank you so much! I will treasure it.

1127002402004457--.name: Hmm? You want to help? Are you ready to take the task of purifying the $map:2000350$?

1127002402004459--.name: Do you really think you're up to the task? You look a little... scrawny. I've got a light case of extreme havi poisoning, so I'm taking a break from my work in the $map:2000350$. Last time I managed to weather ten waves of darkness!

1127002402004461--.name: How arrogant! Do you have a death wish? Or... are you really that brave? Fine, if you think it's so easy, enter the $map:2000350$ and survive 10 waves of the darkness! Show me you mean business.

1127002402004462--.name: How arrogant! Do you have a death wish? Or... are you really that brave? Fine, if you think it's so easy, enter the $map:2000350$ and survive 10 waves of the darkness! Show me you mean business.

1127002402004463--.name: You really did it...? Erm... I guess you're tougher than you look. AGHH!

1127002402004465--.name:
It's... urgh... no big deal. Once a week, the havi fruit seeds embedded in my flesh sprout stalks of shadow. Aghhhh... Just gotta pull it out so I don't become a brainless shadow monster.
<font color="#909090">(She doubles over in pain and tugs at a dark vine growing from her side.)</font>

1127002402004466--.name: Phew. It's out. One day I'll be free of this pain. $npcName:11001228[gender:1]$ is working on a treatment for my condition.

1127002402004467--.name: Well, I admit it. You're as tough as I am. Here, take this  $item:90000014$. You can trade it to $npcName:11001228[gender:1]$ for useful fairy treasure...

0217013702004908--.name: The deep corruption of the $map:02000350$'s is sure to wear on you the deeper you travel inside. I've prepared some gifts for weary warriors returning from their battle against the darkness.

0217013702004909--.name: $MyPCName$, when combatting the corruption of the $map:02000350$ begisn to wear on you, come see me. It won't be much, but hopefully I'll have a gift that can help you.

0217013702004910--.name: $MyPCName$, when combatting the corruption of the $map:02000350$ begisn to wear on you, come see me. It won't be much, but hopefully I'll have a gift that can help you.

0217013702004911--.name: Oh... $MyPCName$! How far did you get? I can feel that the corruption remains, but at least you are unharmed. I'd like you to have this $item:30000524$ for your efforts.

0217013702004912--.name: If you gather enough, you can use them to open the special treasure chests I sell in my shop. I'm certain what's inside will be of use to you.

0831175903000001--.name: Well... I'm almost ready to start construction on my house, but I need one more thing...

0831175903000003--.name: This place is dangerous with so many $npcPlural:21000029$ around, but I'm building my house here, because $map:02000001$ is too expensive. That said, it's a great place to build. Clear running water, wide open spaces, and the fresh smell of the forest!

0831175903000004--.name: I have everything else ready. I was thinking all I need is cement, but I got an idea after seeing the $npcPlural:21000029$ in the surrounding area!

0831175903000005--.name: The $npcPlural:21000029$ love to gather down by the water. Defeat them and harvest $itemPlural:20000055$. That's all I need to carry out my brilliant plan to live off the land.

0831175903000006--.name: The $npcPlural:21000029$ love to gather down by the water. Defeat them and harvest $itemPlural:20000055$. That's all I need to carry out my brilliant plan to live off the land.

0831175903000007--.name: Oh! This will be plenty. Thanks!

0831175903000008--.name: If I lump up the $itemPlural:20000055$ and bake them in the furnace, I can make my own special cement. Could you help me?

0831175903000009--.name: Don't worry if you end up needing more $itemPlural:20000055$. You can just head right back to the stream and defeat the $npcPlural:21000029$ to get them.

0831175903000010--.name: Take the $itemPlural:20000055$ I gave you and make $item:30000094$ in the furnace! If you don't have enough $itemPlural:20000055$, just hunt $npcPlural:21000029$ nearby!

0831175903000011--.name: Excellent! Now I can work on the bricks!

0831175903000039--.name: It's high time I stop acting like a hooligan!

0831175903000040--.name: Why do you want to stop?

0831175903000041--.name: Lately, my hooligan friends and I have started doing a lot worse than petty crime. I've started to think, "Is it okay? Do I really want this life for myself?" Worse, the salary for hired muscle isn't nearly what it used to be.

0831175903000042--.name: So I'm done with that thug life for good! I swear! But if I turn myself in, I might go to prison. I don't want to go to prison!

0831175903000043--.name: I was really worried about it until I saw a bulletin board! Katvan, the leader of Dark Wind himself, is the one who posted it! "Reward! Defeat $npcPlural:29000023$ and Provide Proof to Earn Cold, Hard Mesos!"

0831175903000044--.name: This is how I can redeem myself! It even said I'd be pardoned of my crimes if I can just collect some $itemPlural:30000097$!

0831175903000045--.name: I heard there are $npcPlural:29000023$ hiding somewhere in $map:02000110$. The problem is, I can't show my face anywhere right now, or I'll go straight to the big house. Won't you defeat some $npcPlural:29000023$ and collect  their capes to save me from life in prison?

0831175903000046--.name: You'll flush all the $npcPlural:29000023$ out of hiding if you pull on the levers you see around the area!

0831175903000047--.name: Please defeat $npcPlural:29000023$ and get $itemPlural:30000097$ for me! Pull on the levers, and you're sure to find them.

0831175903000048--.name: Wow! You don't know what this means to me, friend! I'm well on my way to being a reformed hooligan now!

0831175903000049--.name: Why is it so noisy here?

0831175903000051--.name: I had a call with my son, $npc:11000360[gender:0]$, yesterday. He said he's old enough to live on his own now, and he found a place in some swelteringly hot, noisy place called $map:02000086$.

0831175903000052--.name: I knew it was a construction site, but who knew it could be so loud?

0831175903000053--.name: Do you think maybe... Would you make those noisy monsters quiet down?

0831175903000054--.name: How is my precious son supposed to sleep through all that racket?

0831175903000055--.name: I'm doing all of this for my son. He really needs his beauty sleep!

0831175903000056--.name: Please make those noisy monsters quiet down. I love my son too much to let that racket continue.

0831175903000060--.name: You know my son moved here, right?

0831175903000061--.name: Well, I came here for a visit, but it turns out that it's really noisy here... and really, really hot! Too hot for my liking!

0831175903000062--.name: I got worried about my son and thought it would be a good idea to give him this ice pack. The trouble is, that lava is terrifying! I'm too scared to try crossing it.

0831175903000063--.name: But you seem really brave. Would you please take this ice pack to my son, $npc:11000360[gender:0]$? I'm so worried he's going to pass out from heat exhaustion or something...

0831175903000067--.name: The weather here is so hot that it must have melted. No worries! I've got more! Have another.

0831175903000068--.name: Hm? But it's already in your bag. You should pay more attention.

0831175903000069--.name: Isn't your bag full? Come to me after you empty it.

0831175903000070--.name: My son, $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is on the other side of the lava. I wanted to visit him, but I'm just too scared to cross it myself.

0831175903000071--.name: Mom? She doesn't need to worry. I'm doing just fine on my own! Parents are such worrywarts, aren't they?

0831175903000263--.name: Phew! I thought I could handle it, but this heat is unbearable!

0831175903000265--.name: But it's not just the heat! Some engineer didn't account for the unstable ground around here. They overdeveloped the area, and now sinkholes are opening up full of lava!

0831175903000266--.name: The lava pits are a serious hazard to anyone passing through, and the heat they're giving off is unbearable.

0831175903000267--.name: Please pick up some of this ice and use it to block up those lava pits. It's the only way I can think of to solve both problems at once.

0831175903000268--.name: Watch out. That lava's hot, and if you aren't careful, you could fall in! As long as you do it right, you can place the ice without getting hurt.

0831175903000269--.name: You know, I really didn't figure on the ice melting. But it's definitely a lot cooler now! Anyway, thanks for the help. Now I've just got to order a few dozen more tons of ice...

0831175903000073--.name: What are you trying to catch?

0831175903000075--.name: I set up traps on the beach to catch $npcPlural:29000033$. But those sneaky little crustaceans aren't falling for my tricky traps today. They're just too smart!

0831175903000076--.name: I'll bet if I have help, I could catch a bunch of $npcPlural:29000033$ though! I've been looking forward to a tasty seafood meal for ages!

0831175903000077--.name: If you've got the time, would you help me lure the nearby $npcPlural:29000033$ into the traps on the beach?

0831175903000078--.name: Prep the trap by opening it, then lure the $npcPlural:29000033$ right into it.

0831175903000079--.name: You'll find the traps I set up down on the beach. If you lure the $npcPlural:29000033$ into them, you'll have plenty of $itemPlural:20000056$ in no time!

0831175903000080--.name: Oooh! My mouth's watering already. I can't wait to cook these beauties up! Thank you!

0831175903000256--.name: What do you think? $itemPlural:30000140$! You caught so many $npcPlural:29000033$ for me, I was able to make a bunch of $itemPlural:30000140$! It's a veritable feast!!

0831175903000257--.name: My cooking is amazing, and this dish turned out even better than the last time I made it. I want the world to taste my cooking! But how is anyone supposed to hear about it?

0831175903000258--.name: Listen, I'll keep making $itemPlural:30000140$. While I do that, you can spread the word to tourists on the beach. What better person to tell everyone how great my food is than the person who caught the fresh ingredients for it?

0831175903000259--.name: Follow the beach to the east and you're sure to find tourists. Spread the word about my $itemPlural:30000140$, so the whole world can have the best crab they've ever eaten!

0831175903000262--.name: Even one is enough! So begins my career as a gourmet $item:30000140$ chef! Thank you so much!

0831175903000081--.name: <font color="#909090">(This pig is no more. It has ceased to be.)</font>

0831175903000083--.name: <font color="#909090">(The pig is surrounded by broken pieces of wood and a propeller that is still spinning. A cloud of dust hangs in the air, slowly settling to the ground.)</font>

0831175903000084--.name: <font color="#909090">(Was this pig... trying to fly? This oddity warrants further investigation)</font>

0831175903000085--.name: <font color="#909090">(It seems that before its untimely demise, this pig was attempting to fly on a homemade aircraft. It must have jumped from somewhere high. Perhaps you can retrace its short-lived journey.)</font>

0831175903000086--.name: Hello, my name is Fondue. All my life I've looked up at the sky in envy of the birds who soared so freely above.

0831175903000088--.name: My friends would merely laugh at me and say, "Only things with wings can fly. You don't have any." A lesser pig's dreams would be forever dashed. But I was inspired.

0831175903000089--.name: Couldn't I make my own wings? Why should I settle for the way the world made me? And so I set to work, sneaking wood and tools from nearby humans. And after a long effort, my wings are finally complete!

0831175903000090--.name: All that's left is to don my wings, and jump. Today is the day that a pig will finally fly!

0831175903000091--.name: And so, if you are reading this, look up to the sky. That's where you'll find me. Flying free with the birds.

0831175903000111--.name: Humans... they try to change everything to their taste!

0831175903000113--.name: Humans are trying to develop the $map:2000017$! $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ over there is one of them!

0831175903000114--.name: I can't understand why they are trying to destroy this beautiful forest. Take this potion made from dew and spray it on the seedlings around the path!

0831175903000115--.name: If they can't be driven out... I'm going to make it as difficult as possible for them to move here!

0831175903000116--.name: $MyPCName$, I trust that you won't do something like $npc:11000350[gender:0]$ and build a house in my already perfect forest!

0831175903000117--.name: You can get the potion from the basket next to me! Spray it in front of the portal to the human town!

0831175903000118--.name: Thank you! You taught those entitled humans a lesson while protecting the forest.  I call that a win-win deal!

0831175903000119--.name: Such raw power, it will be mine!

0831175903000121--.name: Let me guess, you look upon what's happening here in $map:02000145$ with horror. That is because you are shortsighted! When I look out there, I see beauty!

0831175903000122--.name: Observe the overwhelming power of those creatures as they overtake their prey. In nature, the strong triumph over the weak. But science is a tool that allows men to conquer nature itself!

0831175903000123--.name: We need only learn to harness nature's power, a task which requires data. Unfortunately, my assistants are cowards. A few light maimings, and they abandon all of our research!

0831175903000124--.name: That data is crucial to my research, perhaps even the future of humanity!

0831175903000125--.name: You'll note that this facility has three large structures. At the top of each is a computer used to store our research.

0831175903000126--.name: As our network was disrupted in the first attack, the computers' data must be retrieved manually. I however, am ill suited to deal with the monsters that surround them. And so it falls to you! Will you answer science's call?

0831175903000127--.name: What are you doing standing around gawking like a buffoon? Find the three computers and download their data!

0831175903000128--.name: Beep! Primary ingredient is rabbit saliva infused with shadow energy. Sample Contents by volume: Rabbit Saliva 55.75%. Slime Extract 44.25%.

0831175903000129--.name: Beep! Transfer data to terminal $npc:11000370$ for further analysis.

0831175903000130--.name: Beep! Transfer data to terminal $npc:11000370$ for further analysis.

0831175903000131--.name: Beep! High concentrations of dark energy contaminants detected. Tests Conclusion: Distillation of shadow energies viable. Prolonged exposure to sample not recommended.

0831175903000132--.name: Beep! Extrapolating. Serum synthesis viable using provided formula. Transfer data to terminal $npc:11000371$ for usage analysis.

0831175903000133--.name: Beep! Extrapolating. Serum synthesis viable using provided formula. Transfer data to terminal $npc:11000371$ for usage analysis.

0831175903000134--.name: Beep! Analysis Findings: Injection of 29 ml distilled proteins via syringe will trigger extreme spontaneous muscle growth, and diminished brain capacity. Effects irreversible.

0831175903000135--.name: Beep! Analysis concluded. Serum synthesis data processed for mass-production. Please deliver data to appropriate department representative.

0831175903000136--.name: Beep! Analysis concluded. Serum synthesis data processed for mass-production. Please deliver data to appropriate department representative.

0831175903000137--.name: Yes, yes! This research will prove most helpful. Hmm? Oh, you needn't worry, I will use it responsibly. Eheheh.

0831175903000138--.name:
Oh great beings from beyond the stars... Hear my call!
<font color="#909090">(He stands with his eyes closed and his arms outstretched toward the sky.)</font>

0831175903000140--.name: AN ALIEN!!! Huh? Oh, s-sorry... I thought you were one of them.

0831175903000141--.name: I'm trying to contact the aliens watching over Maple World from above! I set up messages of love all over the $map:02000087$ for them, so they know they are welcome.

0831175903000142--.name: Any alien culture advanced enough to reach our planet is probably waaaay more advanced than us. So they could squish us like bugs if they wanted to. That's why it's important to get on their good sides!

0831175903000143--.name: It's been a while since I set up my signals. Would you mind checking to see if the aliens have left a response? You can find my messages all over the hilltop!

0831175903000144--.name: You can find my messages all over the hilltop. Hurry and see if the aliens have responded!

0831175903000145--.name: What? My neighbors are complaining about my signals? They're the idiots! The universe is too big for us to be alone. We'll see who's laughing when the invasion comes!

0831175903000146--.name: All right! Ready to surmount your next challenge?

0831175903000148--.name: This time, you've gotta climb your way to my buddy $npc:11000382[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000148$!

0831175903000149--.name: What are you still doing here? Hurry up and climb your way to $npc:11000382[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000148$!

0831175903000150--.name: Impressive! I like your gumption, pal.

0831175903000151--.name: Ahh, the wind on your face and a view that can't be matched. A worthwhile reward after a long climb.

0831175903000152--.name: What are you doing up here?

0831175903000153--.name: Oh hey! Did you climb all the way up here? You might have what it takes to join the Wall Climbers!

0831175903000154--.name: Doesn't reaching the top just fill you with a sense of serenity and accomplishment?

0831175903000155--.name: In that case, maybe you would be a good fit for our crew.

0831175903000156--.name: But don't get your hopes up! Not everybody has what it takes to become a Wall Climber! You'll have to go through a series of rigorous tests and come out on top. Only then will you be able to call yourself one of us.

0831175903000157--.name: My associate $npc:11000379[gender:0]$ is somewhere high up in $map:02000135$. Put your climbing skills to the test, and find him.

0831175903000158--.name: Put your climbing skills to the test and find $npc:11000379[gender:0]$ high above $map:02000135$!

0831175903000159--.name: Well I'll be a mushroom's uncle. $npc:11000381[gender:0]$ said you were coming. Good work making it to the top!

0831175903000162--.name: This time you've gotta climb your way to a cool cat named $npc:11000380[gender:0]$ at $map:02000110$.

0831175903000163--.name: It's time for your final challenge! Climb your way to $npc:11000380[gender:0]$ at $map:02000110$. Well? Hop to it!

0831175903000164--.name: No way, you made it all the way up here!

0831175903000167--.name: It's my pleasure to officially welcome you to the ranks of the Wall Climbers! Congratulations, and keep climbing to greater heights!

0831175903000187--.name: You know, I wasn't always alone like this. When I was just a sapling, I had more tree friends than leaves!

0831175903000188--.name: But it's been many years since then, and all of my friends have gone. I'm so lonely. I have only myself to talk to now.

0831175903000189--.name: But you... You could plant new friends for me! Red trees if you please. Not those green ones. They're notorious sunlight hogs.

0831175903000190--.name: Red trees next to me, please!

0831175903000191--.name: Thanks! They don't talk much now, but I'm sure they will in time.

0831175903000194--.name: Haven't you heard? It's $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$</font>! $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is right here in $map:02000137$!

0831175903000195--.name: That vacant stare on your face... Do you really not know who $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is?! Have you been living under a rock?

0831175903000196--.name: $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is a really, really, really, ridiculously good looking superstar sensation with the voice of an angel. His singles constantly top the charts. Ladies want him, and men want to be him!

0831175903000197--.name:
And he's RIGHT OVER THERE ON THAT STAGE! I have to get a picture of him...
<font color="#909090">(She stares intently into the distance, her breathing intensifying).</font>

0831175903000198--.name: His stupid bodyguards are confiscating cameras from anybody who gets too close. Somebody could climb up that building <b>to the left of the stage</b to get a picture...

0831175903000199--.name: But since that building is swarming with monsters, all I can do is stand here and stamp my feet.

0831175903000200--.name: I can't let $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ just swoop out of my life without at least some kind of memento. But you... You could get past those monsters! Would you please take some pictures of $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ without getting caught by his bodyguards?

0831175903000201--.name: Here you can use my camera. Won't you help a girl in love? Just get me some shots from a few different angles. Pleeeeeeaaase?

0831175903000202--.name: What are you doing back here?

0831175903000205--.name: WHAT?! Do you know how much I spent on that camera? Sigh, it's a good thing I've got extras.

0831175903000206--.name: What? It's right there in your bag!

0831175903000207--.name: There's no room in your bag! Let me know when you've made some space.

0831175903000208--.name:
What are you waiting for? Go get me some pictures of $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$!
<font color="#909090">(She stares off into the distance and starts to drool.)</font>

0831175903000209--.name: Wow! Thank you so much! I'm going to keep these pictures under my pillow, heehee!

0831175903000240--.name: This is such pitiful art. It's breaking my heart.

0831175903000242--.name: Yo! Have you seen my magnificent art all over $map:02000110$?

0831175903000243--.name: What do you mean you don't know which art is mine? The magnificent ones are mine, of course! It's that weird mushroom stuff that's bringing down the class in this joint!

0831175903000244--.name: Don't you agree? I don't know who that artist is, but they're cramping my style. They must be stopped!

0831175903000245--.name: I'm going to find out who is doing this. In the mean time, you can go around and erase all those lame mushrooms! Just make sure you don't mess up my stuff by mistake, okay? It's gonna make me famous!

0831175903000246--.name: What are you doing wasting time?! Hurry up and erase those mushrooms! I can't stand too look at them anymore!

0831175903000247--.name: You're sure you got them all? Good! You're the best!

0831175903000248--.name: I finally found the culprit behind that eyesore art!

0831175903000250--.name: It's some hack named $npc:11000412[gender:0]$ living in $map:02000086$! Pah! That name is almost as pathetic as their art.

0831175903000251--.name: $MyPCName$! I need you to go to $npc:11000412[gender:0]$'s hideout in $map:02000086$ and replace all the art around their house with mine! I know you're not an artist but, it's more about payback than quality now anyway.

0831175903000252--.name: Time for some sweet revenge! I need you to go to $npc:11000412[gender:0]$'s hideout in $map:02000086$ and replace all the art around their house with mine!

0831175903000253--.name: Hey! I saw your art in $map:02000110$, and it's actually pretty cool. I guess we're kindred artist spirits, huh?

0831175903000270--.name: A real adventurer feels no pain!

0831175903000272--.name: Strength and daring, of course! Do you think you've got what it takes to be a real adventurer?

0831175903000274--.name: Ha! Maybe you think so, but you look weak to me. I'll bet you can't even handle a pinch on the arm!

0831175903000275--.name: You disagree? All right then. If you're so great, then prove it, hot shot! Bring me some of the $itemPlural:20000061$ that grow in the lava! Survive the heat, and I might just consider you worthy of my respect!

0831175903000276--.name: What? You still haven't gotten the $itemPlural:20000061$? You're scared, aren't you. I'll bet if you put some thought into it, you could figure out a way to get it without going into the lava.

0831175903000277--.name: Wow, you actually did it! Did you really go into the lava to get them?

0831175903000280--.name: Good job! I can admit when I'm wrong. You're a lot tougher than I thought!

0831175903000281--.name: I can't believe you actually got the $itemPlural:20000061$!

0831175903000282--.name: Adventurers should go on adventures all the time!

0831175903000283--.name: Now what are you talking about?

0831175903000284--.name: So, how did it feel to pluck those $itemPlural:20000061$ straight out of that lava? I've got to say, I find adventures like that to be completely exhilarating! You must be flying right now!

0831175903000285--.name: Of course. Who doesn't love a good soak in hot lava?

0831175903000286--.name: Well, now I've got another adventure that's sure to make your heart race! The Twingo workers around here mine something that's really hard to get. It's called $item:30000142$.

0831175903000287--.name: Now, the $npcPlural:21000086$ do the really tough work on the night shift. That's why they take a lot of naps.

0831175903000288--.name: So here's what I want you to do. Wake up the sleeping $npcPlural:21000086$ and while they're still confused, take them down and steal their $itemPlural:30000142$! If that doesn't get your heart racing, I don't know what will!

0831175903000289--.name: Follow the lava all the way down there, then bang on the smelting furnace to wake the $npcPlural:21000086$! They'll be so dazed, they won't know what hit 'em! Haha!

0831175903000290--.name: Just follow the lava down, and you can't miss the smelting furnace. Ha! These are the kind of adventures I live for!

0831175903000291--.name: You really did it! You really are a true adventurer!

0831175903000292--.name: Hmph! How rude! There's just no respect for business ethics anymore!

0831175903000294--.name: My mom owns a fish store here in $map:02000111$, but business has gotten really tough recently.

0831175903000295--.name: She was doing really well until $npc:11000362[gender:0]$ came and opened up a $item:30000140$ business! Now she can't get customers to even glance her direction.

0831175903000296--.name: I can't sit by and watch my mom's business fail! Ugh! I hate competition. What happened to a good old corner on the market?

0831175903000297--.name: We've got to tip the scales back in our favor. Stack those tubes over the $npc:29000033$ traps $npc:11000362[gender:0]$ set up! That'll teach him not to interfere with our business!

0831175903000298--.name: It's his own fault! He should have known better than to come into our territory and disrupt our business.

0831175903000299--.name: Quick! Put the stack of tubes on the traps. Business is getting worse by the second!

0831175903000300--.name: Good job! I would have liked to solve this amicably, but this is a cold, rough world. Sometimes you've got to be aggressive!

0831175903000303--.name: Well, we hardly sold any fish today, but our display is almost completely empty. There should be a lot more there...

0831175903000304--.name: There must be a fish thief in our midst! They're out to sabotage me!

0831175903000306--.name: I am not! I'll bet you anything those $npcPlural:21000101$ in the center of town are up to no good!

0831175903000307--.name: I'm so furious! $MyPCName$, I need you to go to the center of town, lay down the law with those $npcPlural:21000101$, and get my fish back. I refuse to tolerate thieves!

0831175903000308--.name:
I knew this would happen the moment those $npcPlural:21000101$ came to $map:02000111$!
I need you to go to the center of town and teach those meanies a lesson!

0831175903000309--.name: You're back! But where are the fish?

0831175903000310--.name: It turns out they weren't the fish thieves.

0831175903000311--.name: Wh-what? Hmph! Fine, just forget it! Whether they stole the fish or not, those $npcPlural:21000101$ still needed to be taught a lesson. They cause so much trouble!

0831175903000314--.name: My mom said drinking milk would make me taller, but I drank until I hurled, and I haven't grown an inch!

0831175903000315--.name: Look at those $npcPlural:21099049$ that wander around here. How did they get so tall?

0831175903000316--.name: There must be some secret allowing them to bulk up so quick.

0831175903000317--.name: I tried to ask one but he threw a tire at me... You look tough though. Would you mind investigating those crates of mysterious pill bottles they keep around?

0831175903000318--.name: Just rummage through those crates down there and let me know what you find!

0831175903000319--.name: Oh man! This'll make me tall, right? All right bottle of mystery pills, down the hatch!

0831175903000322--.name: Ahh! Oh, hey. You see all those $npcPlural:29000025$ in the maintenance tunnel behind me? If somebody doesn't do something, they're gonna keep multiplying.

0831175903000323--.name: Okay, so do something about them.

0831175903000324--.name:
That's what I was about to do right before you interrupted me! I've just... Gotta do some spider-squishing warm-ups first.
<font color="#909090"> (He starts stomping back and forth.)</font>

0831175903000327--.name: I've just gotta get my stompers ready before I go crawling into that dark, web-covered death trap, okay? If you're in such a hurry, why don't you go in there and squish them?!

0831175903000329--.name: Well, get to work then! I was totally going to squish them all when I finished my warm up, but since you've volunteered...

0831175903000330--.name: Weren't you going to squish those spiders? Don't tell me you're backing out now!

0831175903000331--.name: Oh man, you squished them all? That's a real shame, I was just about to send them on a one-way trip to Stomptown. Oh well, thanks!

0831175903000465--.name: Oh man... That was too close...

0831175903000467--.name: Huh? Oh, hey. I'm $npcName:11000599[gender:0]$, treasure hunter extraordinaire.

0831175903000468--.name: I was checking out the tunnels behind me. Seemed like the perfect place to hide a treasure chest...

0831175903000469--.name: Well, there wasn't a treasure chest. Instead, there were falling rocks!

0831175903000470--.name: My foot got stuck and I had to leave my lucky shoe behind to escape.

0831175903000471--.name: Do me a solid and find it, would you? The entrance to the tunnel system is behind me, just past the "do not enter" sign.

0831175903000472--.name: Sure, I have these spare shoes, but that was my lucky shoe. Good luck in those tunnels.

0831175903000473--.name: Oh man, my shoe is a mess. It's still lucky, I guess... Thanks for your help.

0831175903000480--.name: We Kiyos are great flyers, but even we need to practice. It's not as though we're born knowing how to fly...

0831175903000481--.name: But good luck getting my good-for-nothing husband to acknowledge that!

0831175903000482--.name: $npcName:11000630[gender:0]$ said he'd teach the kids how to fly. So what does he do? He zooms off to the other side of the mountain and tells them to catch him if they can!

0831175903000483--.name: My poor babies! That's too far for little buzzards to fly on their own.

0831175903000484--.name: Please save my babies! They're probably crying for help down below...

0831175903000485--.name: My babies, my babies. You must save my babies!

0831175903000486--.name: Ha! Look at the little brats go! I told $npcName:11000629[gender:1]$ she was worried for nothing!

0831175903000487--.name: Sigh. I suppose there's no helping it.

0831175903000489--.name: After recent developments in my research, I thought I would finally be able to realize a project of great importance to me.

0831175903000490--.name: However, things did not turn out as I had hoped...

0831175903000491--.name: We face many setbacks in science. Sometimes they change things for good. But the science... The science must go on.

0831175903000492--.name: Below us is the $map:02000240$. Inside, you will find what remains of my experiment.

0831175903000494--.name: Please... Go down there and end the abomination that lies within. It will bring nothing to this world but pain.

0831175903000495--.name: T-that note... Give that to me! You didn't read it, did you?

0831175903000497--.name: Merely a memory. One that should never have been unearthed.

0831175903000498--.name: Thank you. Now, I'd like to be left alone... I... I have much science to conduct.

0831175903000499--.name: I won't have this. I can't have it! This is unacceptable!

0831175903000500--.name: What are you going on about?

0831175903000501--.name: It's the T'oomba! It's all their fault!

0831175903000502--.name: The $map:02000048$ is my home. See the tipis everywhere? Those belonged to my neighbors!

0831175903000503--.name: Did the T'oomba care? Nooooo! They showed up one day and kicked us out of our own homes! Those good-for-nothing so-and-sos...

0831175903000504--.name: Oh, they think they can boss us around because there are more of them and they're stronger than us.

0831175903000505--.name: But I'll show them. I'll show them all!

0831175903000506--.name: You! Help me out. Gather a bunch of $item:30000198$ for me. There should be plenty laying around here.

0831175903000507--.name: You go get that $itemPlural:30000198$. I've got a plan...

0831175903000508--.name: The $map:02000048$ used to be a mine. You'll find the $item:30000198$ in no time.

0831175903000509--.name: This $item:30000198$ will do. This will do quite nicely...

0831175903000512--.name: I can't fight the T'oomba. I can't take our homes back. There's only one thing I can do...

0831175903000513--.name: I'll burn it all to the ground!!

0831175903000515--.name: Of course I have! I'm not a madwoman, after all. But if we can't have our houses, then no one can!

0831175903000516--.name: Don't hold back. Teach the T'oomba a lesson they'll never forget!

0831175903000520--.name: How can you be so irresponsible? Luckily for you, I have plenty to spare. Now get back to committing arson!

0831175903000521--.name: It's in your hand! Pay attention. You still have homes to burn down!

0831175903000522--.name: Losing your home is the worst feeling in the world. I want the T'oomba to know exactly how that feels.

0831175903000523--.name: Yes, burn... Burn! The T'oomba deserve what they got! Thanks. You're a real hero.

0831175903000593--.name: You didn't, did you? It's the wildest rumor I've ever heard of!

0831175903000594--.name: Just tell me the rumor already!

0831175903000595--.name: There's this wolf statue on the northwestern side of town, right? Well, I heard that it's actually alive!

0831175903000598--.name: When the moon is full at night, it howls and howls! Just like a real wolf!

0831175903000599--.name: How do you know you aren't hearing some other wolf?

0831175903000600--.name: No, this howl is different. Trust me.

0831175903000601--.name: This howl was... it was filled with pain...

0831175903000602--.name: $npcName:11000136[gender:1]$ didn't believe the rumors at first, either, but now she's looking for someone to help her get to the bottom of it.

0831175903000603--.name: If you're so sure it's nothing, why don't you take a look for yourself? The wolf statue is on a tower in northwestern $map:02000051$!

0831175903000604--.name: But, if you do discover something, you let $npcName:11000136[gender:1]$ know right away, okay?

0831175903000605--.name: What have you got for me?

0831175903000606--.name: This is $npcName:11000694[gender:0]$'s handwriting. I haven't seen him in ages...

0831175903000607--.name: I found it in the attic of the $map:02000081$.

0831175903000609--.name: This makes sense. And how is this note connected to the rumors about the howling wolf?

0831175903000610--.name: $MyPCName$, can you go back to the attic in the $map:02000081$?

0831175903000611--.name: Find a nice cozy place to hide. Somewhere you can see everything...

0831175903000612--.name: If this is really his note, then maybe $npcName:11000694[gender:0]$ will show up if he thinks he's alone. Then you can jump out and get some answers from him!

0831175903000613--.name: I'll leave you to stake out the $map:02000081$ and get answers from $npcName:11000694[gender:0]$. I've got to keep an eye on the pack.

0831175903000615--.name: Sure, I found him. Then he turned into a wolf!

0831175903000618--.name: I didn't exactly have a choice.

0831175903000619--.name: Th-thanks for your help. I need some time to figure out what's going on...

0831175903000691--.name: I'm depressed. I'm despondent. I'm just plain sad! I miss the music of the garden...

0831175903000692--.name: I could play you a tune.

0831175903000693--.name: That won't put the pep back in my step, I'm afraid. It's the music of our enchanted fountain that I miss! I don't know why it went silent, but I have some ideas...

0831175903000694--.name: I've noticed strange totems around here lately. I think they've cursed the fountain with quietness!

0831175903000695--.name: If the fountain doesn't sing, then all of the wondrous beauty of the gardens will wither up and die. It's science.

0831175903000696--.name: I'm begging you! Please, find the totems and get rid of them. It's the gardens' only hope!

0831175903000697--.name: If the fountain doesn't sing, then all of the wondrous beauty of the gardens will wither up and die. It's science. I'm begging you! Please, find the totems and get rid of them. It's the gardens' only hope!

0831175903000698--.name: You got rid of the totems, right? So the music will come back now, right?!

0831175903000699--.name: But it's still so quiet. Quickly now! Take the ladder over there and find my brother, $npcName:11000891[gender:0]$.

0831175903000700--.name: You tell him what happened! He'll know what to do.

0831175903000701--.name: I'd go with you, but I need to keep an eye on this rainbow! Quickly now. $npcName:11000891[gender:0]$ needs to know what we did.

0831175903000702--.name: Stop right there! What do you think you're doing?

0831175903000703--.name: $npc:11000890[gender:1]$ sent me. We got rid of the totems.

0831175903000704--.name: That was you? What a relief...

0831175903000705--.name: Thing is... our trouble's just getting started.

0831175903000707--.name: There are three fairfolk who watch over the fountain here. I need a special $item:30000261$ to summon them, but it was kind of... stolen.

0831175903000708--.name: Have you seen the $npcPlural:21000065$ wandering around the gardens? One of them ran off with the flute.

0831175903000710--.name: You will? I'm counting on you! The $npc:21000065$ who took the $item:30000261$ must still be around here somewhere.

0831175903000711--.name: Did you get the $item:30000261$ back yet?

0831175903000712--.name: Wow, you're amazing! Now we can get the guardian fairfolk here and put them to work!

0831175903000713--.name: Since you did all the hard work, I think it's only fair that you get to summon the guardian fairfolk.

0831175903000715--.name: It's easy! See the fountain over there?

0831175903000716--.name: Walk right up to it, put this $item:30000261$ up to your lips, and blow!

0831175903000717--.name: You didn't lose the $item:30000261$, did you? It's a long drop down from here. One of the $npcPlural:21000065$ might have picked it up...

0831175903000719--.name: The Picchu Picchus will never forget you, friend.

0831175903000720--.name: <font color="#909090">(This board has a fresh bulletin posted to it. It looks like a commission to hunt monsters in the $map:02000095$.)</font>

0831175903000722--.name: The monsters in the $map:02000095$ are a plague on the Picchu Picchu tribe!

0831175903000723--.name: Are you a fighter? Are you addicted to the thrill of battle? Then we need you to fight for the future of the Picchu Picchu!

0831175903000724--.name: Are you a fighter? Are you addicted to the thrill of battle? Then we need you to fight for the future of the Picchu Picchu!

0831175903000725--.name: On behalf of the tribe, thank you to all the heroes who fight to keep the $map:02000095$ safe.

0831175903000726--.name: Your reward has been attached to this thank-you note. Please only take your fair share. By working together, the gardens can once again be a marvel of nature enjoyed by all!

0831175903000820--.name: I didn't even tell her goodbye. I have failed as a mate...

0831175903000822--.name: I am blind, but in my mind's eye, I see visions. Visions of distant places and of the future.

0831175903000823--.name: These past few nights, I have dreamt of my mate. I see Anka standing alone in a desolate wasteland. A dark shadow passes over her, and when it passes, only her fur remains...

0831175903000824--.name: I could not accept it, but now... now I'm sure something terrible has happened to her.

0831175903000825--.name: You don't know that for sure.

0831175903000826--.name: I appreciate the thought, but I know it to be true. If only I had $item:30000270$... to give her a proper burial...

0831175903000827--.name: An old blind wolf like me wouldn't survive $map:02000267$, but you could go there. Please, find my mate. Or what remains of her...

0831175903000828--.name: In my dream, $item:30000270$ was burning amongst the lava flows. I don't know why she would have gone to such a dangerous place.

0831175903000829--.name: If... If you do find her fur, find somewhere in a sunny place to lay her to rest. Help her find peace in the afterlife.

0831175903000830--.name: Truly, I am wretched. All I can do is beg a stranger to do this thing in my place...

0831175903000831--.name: In my dream, $item:30000270$ is nestled in the lava flows of $map:02000267$. If you find her there, please find somewhere sunny to lay her to rest.

0831175903000832--.name: I have been watching for you to return. My vision has often been a boon, but it failed me when I needed it most...

0831175903000833--.name: I am pleased that she is at rest, at least. The love and warmth that she embodied in life continues on with the ancestors. Thank you.

0831175903000834--.name: Just look at this place. It's a cesspool of pollution thanks to the fat cats who rule $map:02000100$. It's a tale as old as time.

0831175903000835--.name: Rich companies get folks elected to city hall, who furnish them with private contracts in the name of "industrialization" and "development." The companies cut corners during production. Toxic chemicals enter the environment, and the city covers it up. And then...

0831175903000837--.name: Giant mutant frogs is what happens! I keep telling people, you can do things the right way and still make a profit. But they're insatiable. They're got to have every last meso they can squeeze out of you, no matter the cost.

0831175903000838--.name: Okay, but... How do you even get mutant frogs?

0831175903000839--.name: Easy. The frogs live in the brook. Improperly disposed industrial waste gets into that brook and mixes up their DNA. Next thing you know, the frogs weigh a thousand pounds and are dressing themselves like some kind of royalty!

0831175903000840--.name: We call it $npc:23000013[gender:0]$, because that's what his stomping sounds like when you hear him coming. Really, that frog is prodigiously fat. It's kind of impressive.

0831175903000841--.name: Anyway, city hall knows all about our buddy $npc:23000013[gender:0]$ here, but they couldn't do anything about him if they wanted to, and they don't. You know this place used to be a purification facility? Well, now it's where they dump their sludge, which I can only assume forms the base of $npc:23000013[gender:0]$'s diet.

0831175903000842--.name: Is there something I can do to help?

0831175903000843--.name: Help? You could start by putting $npc:23000013[gender:0]$ out of our misery, but really that's as good as shutting the stable door after the horses have bolted. Failing that, just get out of my face. I've already got a headache from this smell.

0831175903000844--.name: If you can't solve corporate greed, you could at least get rid of $npc:23000013[gender:0]$. It'd be one less thing I have to smell in the morning.

0831175903000845--.name: Wait, what? You really got rid of fatso the frog?

0831175903000847--.name: Well I'll be! Now if you could just address the corrupting influence of capitalism that spawned this whole mess, maybe we could start turning this water back the color it was before. You heard me. That green stuff down there is crisp, refreshing water. Yum yum!

0831175903000848--.name: No? Well, it was worth a try. Now if you'll excuse me, I'm off to toil for an unlivable wage so my kids can live in above-average squalor on a quietly dying rock.

0831175903000861--.name: They say that no news is good news, but I've got a bad feeling about this.

0831175903000862--.name: The captain sent a squad out a few days ago, and we haven't heard a peep from them since. They should be back by now.

0831175903000863--.name: There have been all kinds of rumors about the $map:02000013$ lately. We didn't take it seriously, but now I'm wondering if we should have...

0831175903000864--.name: If you happen to be headed out that way, would you mind swinging by the $map:02000013$ to see if my fellow Green Hoods are still there?

0831175903000865--.name: The captain is all about following procedures and making regular reports. The squad we sent to the $map:02000013$ wouldn't go this long without checking in. I'm worried...

0831175903000866--.name: Huh? What are you doing in this remote place?

0831175903000867--.name: $npc:11000961[gender:1]$ sent me to check on you.

0831175903000868--.name: I-I knew it... I knew $npc:11000961[gender:1]$ wouldn't forget about us! Listen, the situation here is bad.

0831175903000869--.name: We're fighting for our lives out here. Things seemed peaceful at first, but then a whole mess of monsters appeared from nowhere and ambushed us.

0831175903000870--.name: We've got wounded, and we don't have the medicine we need to cure them. We don't even have any basic field supplies left...

0831175903000872--.name: Me? I'm fine. It's the others that I'm worried about. If you're here to help, go find them, first.

0831175903000874--.name: Find $npcName:11000832[gender:1]$. She's the only person treating the wounded right now.

0831175903000875--.name: I'll head back to $map:02000076$ and get reinforcements.

0831175903000876--.name: Find $npcName:11000832[gender:1]$! She can't heal all the injured Green Hoods on her own.

0831175903000877--.name: $npc:11000962[gender:1]$ must have sent you. Glad to hear she's still on her feet!

0831175903000878--.name: I'm $npcName:11000832$. Quiet, you fool! This is no time for introductions!

0831175903000879--.name: You seem fit enough for the job. There's no time to waste. Get to it!

0831175903000881--.name: Helping the injured, of course! I'm fresh out of medicine, and their prognosis is not good without it.

0831175903000882--.name: Luckily, I happen to know a thing or two about field chemistry. You'd be surprised at all the tinctures and cures you can make up with the right mixture of goo and gunk!

0831175903000883--.name: What goo and gunk do you need?

0831175903000884--.name: Oh, good question! Let's see. A handful of $item:30000285$ and a cup of $itemPlural:30000286$ should do the trick!

0831175903000885--.name: The area is teeming with $npcPlural:21000353$ and $npcPlural:21000003$, so this should be a piece of cake for you. Probably.

0831175903000886--.name: Hunt the $npcPlural:21000353$ and $npcPlural:21000003$ nearby. Get $item:30000285$ and $itemPlural:30000286$. Simple, no?

0831175903000887--.name: There you are. I hope you didn't sample any of the ingredients while you were collecting them—I may have forgotten to mention they're pretty poisonous on their own.

0831175903000888--.name: Anyway, this should be enough to keep our medicine cabinets full. For now.

0831175903000889--.name: It's going to take me a while to mash this goop into something usable. In the meantime, I need you to check on my patients.

0831175903000890--.name: I've enlisted the aid of a traveling merchant named $npcName:11000963[gender:0]$. Go find him on the hill west of here.

0831175903000891--.name: The folks here deserve better than this. But I gotta say, my supplies are running low and I don't really know what I'm doing.

0831175903000892--.name: The nice lady over the hill gave me this medicine to ease the pain of all the injured people on the path below. I think you're better suited to that particular job.

0831175903000893--.name: I'm going to take a quick breather, then I'll head out and get more medicine from $npcName:11000832[gender:1]$. Good luck down there!

0831175903000894--.name: It won't cure them, but that $item:30000287$ should help with the pain.

0831175903000895--.name: I might have used up all the $item:30000287$.

0831175903000897--.name: You already ran out of $item:30000287$? I'm practically out of it, myself. I've gotta get back to $npcName:11000832[gender:1]$ for more...

0831175903000898--.name: I don't exactly have enough of the stuff. You'll have to make due with however much you have left for now.

0831175903000899--.name: Your bag is stuffed to the brim! Drop some stuff and ask me again.

0831175903000900--.name: We don't have time for this. Please hurry.

0831175903000901--.name: That stuff was potent. I saw a bunch of the survivors run off towards $map:02000076$!

0831175903000902--.name: What about you? Need some ointment?

0831175903000903--.name: Oh, no, no, I'm fine! Thank you for offering, though. Mighty kind of you.

0831175903000904--.name: Besides, teamwork is the best medicine. Or maybe kindness? Whatever it is, your good acts today have put a smile on my face.

0831175903000905--.name: I don't know what happened here. Honestly, I'm not sure I even care.

0831175903000906--.name: Look at those hideous creatures, swarming the fortress below. I've seen my share of action in my time with the militia, but this...

0831175903000907--.name: But if I let something like a little monster army be the end of me, I'd be a disgrace to the Green Hoods!

0831175903000908--.name: $MyPCName$, stand with me. We're the only ones left who can hold the fort!

0831175903000909--.name: I'll snipe any monsters trying to scale the walls. I want you on the ground, cutting through the $npcPlural:21000003$, $npcPlural:21000353$, and $npcPlural:21000306$ below.

0831175903000910--.name: There's an army of $npcPlural:21000003$, $npcPlural:21000353$, and $npcPlural:21000306$ at the base of the $map:02000013$. I suggest we do something to thin their numbers.

0831175903000911--.name: Blast it! We've hardly put a dent in their numbers. At least you've bought us some time to regroup...

0831175903000912--.name: When I get back to $map:02000076$, I'm letting $npc:11000015[gender:1]$ know that we couldn't have held this place without you.

0831175903000913--.name: Persistent gnat! Unsightly cretin! Have you come to taunt me with your CLANG CLANG and your THUMP THUMP and your... ugh! ...trendy music?

0831175903000915--.name: Don't interrupt me! I'm asking the questions here! If I hear another peep from you, I'll beat you 'round the ears!

0831175903000917--.name: Well, speak up! Are you deaf?!

0831175903000918--.name: You told me not to say anything!

0831175903000919--.name: And you'd do well to do so! Honestly, kids these days. It's impossible to have a civilized conversation with the likes of you...

0831175903000920--.name: What's got you in such a tizzy?

0831175903000921--.name: Don't you hear all that banging and clanging just outside my door? It's enough to drive a man mad! Trendy, uncultured drivel!

0831175903000922--.name: A man of culture—like me—should only subject himself to the finest of concertos! If you really aren't with them, then it is your duty to society to drive them from this place!

0831175903000923--.name: Sure. Who am I evicting, exactly?

0831175903000924--.name: I hesitate to say their names, lest the mere act of speaking them lowers my standing in polite society! But it must be done. I would have you defeat the $npcPlural:21000173$... ugh! ...and the $npcPlural:21000278$. Disgusting!

0831175903000925--.name: I cannot tolerate such uncouth percussion! Defeat the $npcPlural:21000173$... ugh! ...and the $npcPlural:21000278$.

0831175903000926--.name: Yes, yes, that's better. Say what you will about the peasantry, but you lot do know a thing or two about brute strength.

0831175903000927--.name: That will be all. I have my compositions to return to, and you really belong... Well, anywhere that isn't here, I suppose.

0831175903000928--.name: You just can't stay away, can you? It doesn't matter what you are—man, woman, disgruntled chicken—I'm simply irresistable! It's enough to get on a gal's nerves, I tell you. And this terrible hunger is not helping.

0831175903000929--.name: It's almost swimsuit season here in the $map:02000186$, so I'm working on shedding some pounds, but... this diet hasn't even shed one pound yet!

0831175903000930--.name: I don't get it. I made a super strict diet plan and everything! It makes no sense.

0831175903000931--.name: There's a lot that doesn't make sense here...

0831175903000932--.name: Stop mumbling to yourself and help me. That's what you hero-types do, isn't it?

0831175903000933--.name: There's a lady uphill from here, $npcName:11000974[gender:1]$. I hear she knows all about cooking.

0831175903000934--.name: Show her my diet regimen and figure out what I'm doing wrong. There's no point starving myself if I'm not getting my beach bod back!

0831175903000935--.name: What's the hold up? My diet regimen won't bring itself to $npcName:11000974[gender:1]$!

0831175903000936--.name: I may have lost the regimen...

0831175903000938--.name: Pay attention! I only have so many of these. If I didn't know any better, I'd think you were trying to sabotage my diet...

0831175903000939--.name: I can see it sticking out of your pack! You aren't trying to steal my secret diet plan, are you? For shame!

0831175903000940--.name: Your bag could stand to lose some weight, too! Drop some of the garbage and I'll give you another copy.

0831175903000941--.name: Hurry! Time waits for no $male:man,female:woman$, and swimsuit season is almost here!

0831175903000942--.name: Oh my! Look at all the rich food on this regimen. Surely this isn't meant to be a diet...?

0831175903000943--.name: If someone were to eat all of this food in a single day... Why, it's enough to kill a normal human!

0831175903000945--.name: Is that so? This might be an interesting challenge. All right, I'll try my best!

0831175903000946--.name: She'll be the slimmest pig in the pen. Hmm... am I allowed to say that? Anyway, I've got a delicious dish in store for her!

0831175903000948--.name: I call it $item:30000292$! I don't have all of the ingredients I need, though. Help a lady out?

0831175903000950--.name: Let's see here... $itemPlural:30000289$, $itemPlural:30000290$, and... $itemPlural:30000291$! Yes, those ingredients will do.

0831175903000951--.name: You can get $itemPlural:30000289$ from $npcNamePlural:21000160$. $itemPlural:30000289$ grow on the trees around here and there are $itemPlural:30000291$ all over the place.

0831175903000952--.name: Such lovely, fresh ingredients! Give me just a moment to pack this lunch box.

0831175903000953--.name: Ta-da! Presenting $item:30000292$! Doesn't it smell good?

0831175903000954--.name: Hurry it over to $npcName:11000973[gender:1]$ while it's still hot.

0831175903000955--.name: Oh! And let her know that I threw away her old diet regimen and put a new one in the lunch box.

0831175903000956--.name: I'd like $npcName:11000973[gender:1]$ to try the lunch before it gets cold, if at all possible. May I help you?

0831175903000959--.name: I'm a little hurt you lost it, to be honest. Oh well. I'll whip up another box, I suppose!

0831175903000960--.name: Oh-ho! You're a busy one, aren't you? The lunch box is in your bag. I can smell it from here!

0831175903000961--.name: Oh dear! Your bag is full, I'm afraid. Are you sure you can't make any room?

0831175903000962--.name: There aren't any preservatives in my cooking, so please get the lunch box to $npcName:11000973[gender:1]$ straight away. Until next time!

0831175903000963--.name: Mm, what's that smell? It's so... sweet!

0831175903000964--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She snatches $item:30000292$ from your hands and gobbles it down.)</font>
This's supposed to be healthy? Really? But it's so good!

0831175903000965--.name: That's it! Starting today, I'm on $npcName:11000974[gender:1]$'s diet!

0831175903000966--.name: With this diet and my natural good looks, I'll be unstoppable! Now, if only the beach wasn't so far away...

0831175903000976--.name: Hey, kid! You see that? My punch flew at the speed of light!

0831175903000978--.name: Hmph, of course you didn't. My fists are too fast to be seen by the naked eye!

0831175903000979--.name: But... Oh oh! I threw out my shoulder. That smarts.

0831175903000981--.name: O-of course I look fine! A martial arts master never reveals his weaknesses. I wouldn't want my opponent to see any openings, eh?

0831175903000982--.name: Aaaanyway... Since I need a minute to, um, set my shoulder, I can't collect the $itemPlural:30000294$ I came here for.

0831175903000984--.name: You ever hear of the Black Bamboo School? They—I mean, we're a school of the most powerful martial artists in the world. And our big tournament is coming out.

0831175903000985--.name: I need those $itemPlural:30000294$ to gain entry into the tournament and rise to the head of the school, but my shoulder...

0831175903000986--.name: You aren't busy, are you? Stroll on down to the lava flows and pick some $itemPlural:30000294$ for me.

0831175903000987--.name: You aren't busy, are you? Stroll on down to the lava flows and pick some $itemPlural:30000294$ for me.

0831175903000988--.name: Oh, they look just like they did in those old books! Yes! With these, the Black Bamboo School will have to let me join!

0831175903000989--.name: I thought you were already a member.

0831175903000990--.name: Ahem! Did I say become a member? I meant... become the leader! Wa-tcha!

0831175903000991--.name: A martial artist always repays his favors. Come find the Black Bamboo School someday and ask for $npcName:11000976[gender:0]$ if you ever need help.

0831175903000992--.name: This is a catastrophe! It is nearly time to begin our prayers, but I'm not nearly ready.

0831175903000994--.name: My people wake up every 777 days and devote ourselves to the rituals of our god... which, incidentally, also take 777 days.When we're done, we go back to sleep for another 777 days, and so on.

0831175903000995--.name: The humans of Perion know little of us, because we spend most of our lives either sleeping or tending to our duties. But we are as tied to this land as they are.

0831175903000996--.name: This place is holy to my people's god, and he is not a patient deity. The flowing lava is proof of his displeasure that the prayers have been delayed. Lava and heat are pretty motivating when you're made of straw...

0831175903000997--.name: I must complete the ritual and begin our 777 days of prayer before we all burn away. But this is not something I can do alone! For the sake of the kunkun, please help me gather the ritual components!

0831175903000999--.name: Hunt the monsters sent to test my people and retrieve their $itemPlural:30000295$, $itemPlural:30000296$, and $itemPlural:30000297$.

0831175903001000--.name: These monsters are the $npcNamePlural:21000374$, $npcNamePlural:21000377$, and $npcNamePlural:21000303$, and they wield terrible powers of flame. Sometimes I think our god doesn't like us very much...

0831175903001001--.name: Hunt the $npcNamePlural:21000374$, $npcNamePlural:21000377$, and $npcNamePlural:40000038$. Retrieve the $itemPlural:30000295$, $itemPlural:30000296$, and $itemPlural:30000297$.

0831175903001002--.name: Kunba, oh, kunba, oh, kunbaba kunbaba kunba, oh! That is everything I need. Now we must awaken the $npcNamePlural:11000978[gender:0]$ who will join me in our prayer.

0831175903001003--.name: The shamans are nearing the end of their 777-day slumber. Find their huts and shake the last of the sleep from their eyes.

0831175903001004--.name: If even a single shaman is missing, we will incur our god's wrath. And, you guessed it, that means more fire.

0831175903001005--.name: It may seem rude to awaken my fellow shamans from their huts, but it will be much more rude if our god awakens them with fire and brimstone.

0831175903001006--.name: Everything is ready and I must begin my 777 days of prayer. When I am done, I shall grant you a great blessing as thanks for the service you have done for the kunkun.

0831175903001032--.name: I... I can make it work! I don't care of the others think I'm mad. I won't give up on them...

0831175903001034--.name: It's my finest creations, the $npcPlural:21000241[gender:0]$. I created them to defend $map:02000023$. At first, it was going so well!

0831175903001036--.name: I assembled them each by hand. Chassis, arms, legs, and an advanced chipset that gave them intelligence and... life...

0831175903001037--.name: I don't know where it all went so wrong. The robots started attacking people and tearing down trees. It breaks my heart, but there's no other choice. They must be...

0831175903001038--.name: No! No, I can't do it. Please, you have to act in my place. Destroy the $npcPlural:21000241[gender:0]$ before they cause any more damage...

0831175903001039--.name: No! No, I can't do it. Please, you have to act in my place. Destroy the $npcPlural:21000241[gender:0]$ before they cause any more damage...

0831175903001041--.name: I can't give up yet. I'll rebuild them with a better AI, even if it takes me another forty years!

0831175903001042--.name: Data doesn't lie. If I analyze it long enough, then I can find the source of the error.

0831175903001043--.name: I'm afraid I need to rely on you one more time. While I get started up here, can you copy the data from my computer?

0831175903001044--.name: Take this chip and download all of my research records onto it.

0831175903001045--.name: Just insert the $item:30000302$ into the console below. The computer will take care of the rest automatically.

0831175903001048--.name: You need to pay more attention, kid. Luckily, I've got plenty of $itemPlural:30000302$ to spare. Here you go.

0831175903001049--.name: And what's that in your bag, hm? Looks like a $item:30000302$ to me.

0831175903001050--.name: Hey! These $itemPlural:30000302$ are fragile. Make some room in your bag or it'll get crushed under all that other junk!

0831175903001052--.name: Good. I don't know how long it will take, but I will not rest until I've succeeded with this research!

0831175903001053--.name: I will prove that I'm not mad with my next batch of high-power combat droids. Then they'll have no choice but to call me a genius!

0831175903001054--.name: Help me. Oh, please help me. The took my birthstones!

0831175903001056--.name: My parents are... they're no longer with us. After they went away, I wandered deep into the forest to be alone...

0831175903001057--.name: I made new friends there. They helped me work through the pain.
