0831175903001058--.name: I was going to craft some necklaces using my father's birthstones to thank them. But... but those monsters stole all of the stones!

0831175903001060--.name: R-really? The $npcPlural:21000052$ and the $npcPlural:21000004$ are the ones who did this!

0831175903001061--.name: Those birthstones are all that I have left from my father. Please get them back from the $npcPlural:21000052$ and $npcPlural:21000004$!

0831175903001062--.name: Those are my father's birthstones! Thank you! I'd better get to work on those necklaces...

0831175903001063--.name: I owe you a big reward for this. I know! I'll introduce you to my friends!

0831175903001064--.name: But first, you have to promise not to tell anyone else about them. It'll be our little secret, okay?

0831175903001065--.name: Come close and I'll whisper it in your ear. My friends are... the boroboro dwarves! Isn't that amazing?

0831175903001066--.name: They vanished years and years ago. Most people don't even know they exist anymore! Why, I wouldn't be surprised if you had no idea what I'm talking about.

0831175903001067--.name: Well, what do you say? Want to meet them? This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

0831175903001069--.name: Make sure you aren't being followed, then climb to the top of the Ellin Tree. You'll see the entrance to $map:02000197$ way up there.

0831175903001070--.name: Tell them hello for me, okay? Oh, and don't mention the necklaces I'm making for them. They're a surprise!

0831175903001071--.name: Do you still want to meet my friends? Just climb to the top of the Ellin Tree and find the entrance to $map:02000197$.

0831175903001072--.name: Speak up! What're you doing here, giant?!

0831175903001074--.name: That crybaby sent you? Hmph. Come to think of it, I haven't seen her in a while...

0831175903001075--.name: The other boroboros will be happy to see her again soon. But we don't got time for pleasantries right now!

0831175903001076--.name: Look, I'm not in the habit of sharing our worries with outsiders, but our beloved $npc:11000751[gender:1]$ was in a spot of trouble not too long ago.

0831175903001077--.name: Luckily for us, someone came along and saved her. Unluckily for us, the person who saved her was an outsider. Like you, but even uglier. And now it'll be impossible to keep our existence a secret any more!

0831175903001078--.name: That's why we're looking for a new home out in the world. If we don't have to squat in caves, then we may as well make the most of it.

0831175903001079--.name: At least, that was the plan. These lazy bums decided to nap the day away, instead.

0831175903001080--.name: Since you're here anyway, make yourself useful and rouse the others. They'll be happy to hear that $npc:11000986[gender:1]$ is visiting soon, anyhow.

0831175903001081--.name: You go ahead and wake up the other boroboros. Let them know that $npc:11000986[gender:1]$ will be here soon.

0831175903001082--.name: The boroboro are at a turning point, and they're all sleeping like babies. Sigh...

0831175903001083--.name: Can't say I'd mind a little nap myself... Lucky pups.

0831175903001084--.name: Out of the frying pan, into the fire. Defeat one and there's two to take its place. Cut down two, and three more appear...

0831175903001085--.name: The $map:02000091$ plays a key role in keeping $map:02000076$ safe. Which is too bad, because I don't know how much longer I can hold it.

0831175903001086--.name: The rest of my unit abandoned their posts when the monsters came. Now I patrol the ramparts alone, and let me tell you... it's not easy.

0831175903001087--.name: You're loyal to the empire, aren't you? I could use another strong arm to hold off the monster horde.

0831175903001088--.name: Just tell me what to do.

0831175903001089--.name: We've got too many monsters swarming the base of the watchtower. I'd like you to keep them busy while I shore up our defenses.

0831175903001090--.name: If you can thin out the $npcNamePlural:21000265$ and $npcNamePlural:21000306$, we may hold the tower yet.

0831175903001093--.name: I'm glad to hear it. We've held on for now, but this struggle is far from over.

0831175903001094--.name: I'll do my best to hold this position for a while longer. In the meantime, I want you to send a request for reinforcements.

0831175903001096--.name: You don't have to go far. There are carrier pigeons all over the watchtower. They can deliver the message.

0831175903001097--.name: All you need to do is send the birds on their way, and my fellow soldiers will get the message.

0831175903001098--.name: Don't let your guard down. The monsters sieging this place will not hesitate to fire at you with their cannons.

0831175903001099--.name: All over the watchtower are <font color="#ffd200">carrier pigeons</font> that carry messages for scouts to send and receive <font color="#ffd200">information</font>. Send the carrier pigeon to <font color="#ffd200">request reinforcements</font>.

0831175903001100--.name: All I can do now is clench my teeth and hold out for reinforcements.

0831175903001101--.name: I've never felt so exhausted in my life. But as long as the watchtower is in danger, I will stand my ground.

0831175903001130--.name: He'll understand, won't he? Of course he will. This is no problem. No problem at all...

0831175903001131--.name: Who am I kidding? If $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ finds out about this, he'll turn me into a shrub!!

0831175903001132--.name: Take a deep breath and start from the top.

0831175903001133--.name: It was all that little fur ball's fault! He kept nagging me to make him beautiful. Look at my face. Do you think I have that kind of power?

0831175903001134--.name: So... what did you tell him?

0831175903001135--.name: I... I told him that I could make him beautiful if he brought me the whispers that live in a spider's heart, three golden apples, and the seed of the great tree. I never thought he would believe it...

0831175903001136--.name: And I certainly never thought Lo would go to $npc:11000304[gender:1]$ and get the $item:30000329$!

0831175903001137--.name: I don't like the sound of that.

0831175903001138--.name: It's a mask with the power to brainwash monsters. Once it's on, you have no choice but to obey the person who put it on you.

0831175903001139--.name: The forest giant Moomoo is a gentle soul. Gentle, but powerful. Lo put the $item:30000329$ on him and now they're trying to steal the seed!

0831175903001140--.name: $npc:23000035$ must be stopped before they do any more damage! And, more importantly, before $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ finds out I had anything to do with this! That man can make a witch's blood turn cold...

0831175903001141--.name: I beg you. Defeat $npc:23000035$ and bring the $item:30000329$ to me.

0831175903001142--.name: This can't be allowed to go on! Defeat $npc:23000035$ and bring the $item:30000329$ to me.

0831175903001143--.name: I'm saved! Oh, that old $npc:11000304[gender:1]$ will be hearing from me! And I'll make sure no one ever gets their hands on this $item:30000329$ again.

0831175903001144--.name: It looks like I'm in your debt. Huh. A strange feeling...

0831175903001145--.name: Ellinia just doesn't smell as nature-y as it used to, you know?

0831175903001146--.name: I was walking through the forest the other day to listen to the ladybugs sing—you know how ladybugs are, always singing such beautiful songs—but something had turned them all purple!

0831175903001147--.name: Ladybugs are supposed to be red. A purple ladybug... Well, that's just not a very good ladybug at all!

0831175903001148--.name: It's all because of those goggy guys! I spotted them putting some purple goop in the water at the $map:02000022$ before, but I didn't think anything of it at the time...

0831175903001149--.name: And it's reached as far as the $map:02000215$. Just one drop of that purple water is enough to make the grass all withered and gross!

0831175903001150--.name: If this keeps up, the whole $map:02000215$ will be totally purple. Please get those goggy guys!

0831175903001151--.name: Oh, by goggy guys, I mean the $npcPlural:21090176$, $npcPlural:21090177$, and $npcPlural:21090175$.

0831175903001152--.name: Please kick the $npcPlural:21090176$, $npcPlural:21090177$, and $npc:21090175$ out of the forest before they totally ruin the $map:02000215$.

0831175903001153--.name: With the goggy guys gone, hopefully the $map:02000215$ can return to normal soon...

0831175903001154--.name: I can't wait to hear the ladybugs sing again. Thank you!

0831175903001155--.name: I say, what year is it? How long have I been traveling?

0831175903001157--.name: Don't you recognize your own king? It is I, $npc:11001016[gender:0]$! Tell me, peasant, which county are you from?

0831175903001159--.name: World, you say? Then that mage sent me a very far ways, indeed! Little matter. I've taken a liking to this $map:02000181$ and I've decided to take it as my own.

0831175903001160--.name: Your world is a tad more blocky than I'm used to, but I'm sure I'll be feeling right at home in no time. Nothing like some free real estate to put a smile on one's face, after all!

0831175903001161--.name: First order of business: I need to hire on some pest control! The wild beasties wandering around the palace grounds are simply unacceptable. Why, one of them could splash mud onto my fine clothes!

0831175903001162--.name: Attend me, my commoner friend. As the new king of this castle, I command you to remove these creatures from my sight!

0831175903001164--.name: The $npcPlural:21000220$, $npcPlural:21000222$, and $npcPlural:21000266$, of course! I detest such atrocious critters. I shan't tolerate them in my new kingdom!

0831175903001165--.name: As a reward for your service, I shall bestow upon you invisible silken garments, just like the robe I am wearing at this very moment. A tempting offer, no?

0831175903001166--.name: I'll have no $npcPlural:21000220$, $npcPlural:21000222$, or $npcPlural:21000266$ in my palace!

0831175903001167--.name: Good, very good. Now that that's done, I shall erect a statue of myself up front... and a statue on the side parapet... and in the rear courtyard, another statue, perhaps?

0831175903001168--.name: As for your reward, here you go. It may be invisible to the naked eye, but I assure you, this robe is woven from the finest silk!

0831175903001237--.name: The only thing worse than a terrifying scream... is a terrifying scream that you can't put to a face...

0831175903001238--.name: You must help me, $MyPCName$. I've been kept up for days by constant screaming... crying... wailing...

0831175903001239--.name: Around the time this started, primordial monsters from the last ice age started showing up nearby.

0831175903001240--.name: The last time I experienced such horror... the Blue Lapenta was destroyed...

0831175903001241--.name: I won't stand idly by while evil is afoot. It's time I performed a divination to get at the heart of this.

0831175903001242--.name: Will you help me? I need objects related to these disturbances in order to do my reading.

0831175903001244--.name: To learn where the monsters are coming from, I need $itemPlural:30000345$ and $itemPlural:30000346$.

0831175903001245--.name: For the ritual itself, I will need a mirror. I doubt we'll find any of those out here... But a reflective $item:30000344$ will do in a pinch.

0831175903001246--.name: You can hunt $npcNamePlural:21000199$ and $npcNamePlural:21000089$ for the $itemPlural:30000345$ and $itemPlural:30000346$.

0831175903001247--.name: As for $itemPlural:30000344$, just break some off the nearby ice blocks.

0831175903001248--.name: You can hunt $npcNamePlural:21000199$ and $npcNamePlural:21000089$ for the $itemPlural:30000345$ and $itemPlural:30000346$.

0831175903001249--.name: As for $itemPlural:30000344$, just break some off the nearby ice blocks.

0831175903001250--.name: Everything is ready. Please be quiet while I tune into the vibes of divination...

0831175903001253--.name: It's terrible... Simply terrible! The reason the monsters have come here... is to awaken $npcName:23000026[gender:1]$...

0831175903001255--.name: $npcName:23000026[gender:1]$ was a servant of the Demon King that commanded terrible shadow spirits. She was feared by all, even the greatest heroes and warriors.

0831175903001256--.name: It took great sacrifice for the Sages to freeze $npc:23000026[gender:1]$ deep below the ice of $map:02000260$.

0831175903001258--.name: I know why I haven't been able to sleep. I am haunted by the screams of those who suffered at her hand, all those years ago...

0831175903001260--.name: She'll still be in a weakened state, having spent so much time in the ice.

0831175903001261--.name: Please defeat $npcName:23000026[gender:1]$ before she recovers her power. If you don't...

0831175903001262--.name: Oh wanderer, the lives of everyone here depends on you. May divinity guide your steps.

0831175903001263--.name: Please defeat $npcName:23000026[gender:1]$ before she recovers her power. If you don't...

0831175903001264--.name: By heaven and earth, you have returned safely. Thank the divine!

0831175903001265--.name: You have averted a great disaster. Thank you.

0831175903001467--.name: You here for the special pardon, too? Hm. Looks like you can handle yourself in a fight.

0831175903001468--.name: The kingdom's cutting a deal with any convict who can beat $npcName:23100011$ 50 times in $map:02000311$. A small price to pay for freedom, eh?

0831175903001469--.name: It'd be a piece of cake for me, obviously. But, uh, hey... Wanna go in my place?

0831175903001471--.name: Sigh... Listen, I'm a pretty famous guy. They say my punches can go through six feet of rock. But I don't exactly get to fight these days, see? I'm rusty.

0831175903001472--.name: You do this for me, and I'll tell everyone how you helped me. You'll be famous by association! That's a great deal, right?

0831175903001473--.name: Don't spread this around, but my old man is a big deal back in $map:02000062$.

0831175903001474--.name: You'd have to be an idiot not to help me out here. So let's stop wasting time and start getting to business!

0831175903001475--.name: It's not hard. Just go to $map:02000311$ and beat up $npcName:23100011$. 50 times. Simple!

0831175903001476--.name: Go to $map:02000311$ and beat up $npcName:23100011$. 50 times. Simple!

0831175903001477--.name: Bravo! Great work! You're like my personal guardian angel.

0831175903001478--.name: Wait for me outside the prison. I'll pay you plenty just as soon as I come out. Honest!

0915214503001717--.name: Wow! There's so much work to do here that we're always busy, but that means we never have any time for safety. It's getting downright hazardous here!

0915214503001719--.name: I'm just so worried. We're really lucky we haven't had an accident already. But the conditions around here have gotten so bad. It's only a matter of time before something terrible happens.

0915214503001720--.name: I mean, just look at these rusty gas tanks leaking everywhere! It's like working in the middle of a minefield. One spark, and the whole place will go up!

0915214503001721--.name: It used to be that when the tanks started looking bad, they'd get replaced. Safety inspectors get mean when you're not following the rules. But not anymore.

0915214503001722--.name: And the $npcPlural:21000281$ around here aren't helping matters. Every time they throw a bomb, my heart skips a beat. What if they hit a gas tank?!

0915214503001723--.name: I can't stand it any more. If no one else is going to do anything, I'll fix the problem myself. $MyPCName$, will you help me?

0915214503001725--.name: Please make sure all the valves on the nearby gas tanks are closed, and check to see if any of them are leaking.

0915214503001726--.name: Just be careful! A lot of the tanks here are so rusty and old that just looking at them could make them explode. They're already venting a ton of soot and smoke.

0915214503001727--.name: Please make sure all the valves on the nearby gas tanks are closed, and check to see if any of them are leaking.

0915214503001728--.name: I'm relieved to hear there aren't any big problems, but this is just a temporary solution. I hope they replace the tanks soon.

0915214503001729--.name: I'm going to ask HQ to store the gas tanks somewhere safer until they can be removed.

1228034903001929--.name: Infuriating! Those shelled thugs won't get away with this!

1228034903001930--.name: It's those slow... foolish... block-headed turtles! They stepped on the tail of the salamander I was riding and sent him running for the hills!

1228034903001932--.name: Sigh... I was going to get back before $npcName:11001314[gender:0]$ noticed I was gone, but that plan's done for.

1228034903001933--.name: Since those turtles messed up my day, I want to mess up their day. They'll feel sorry they ever even heard of the great $npcName:11001328[gender:0]$!

1228034903001934--.name: Hey, you going to help me, or you going to stand their gawking? Why'd you ask me what's wrong if you aren't going to help?

1228034903001935--.name: We'll wipe those filthy turtles from the face of $map:02010043$! First the $npcNamePlural:21000143$, and then the $npcNamePlural:21000145$, and especially the $npcNamePlural:21000144$!

1228034903001936--.name: We'll wipe those filthy turtles from the face of $map:02010043$! First the $npcNamePlural:21000143$, and then the $npcNamePlural:21000145$, and especially the $npcNamePlural:21000144$!

1228034903001938--.name: Is this your first time to Karkar Island? Come see me sometime. I owe you one, after all!

1228034903001939--.name: Absurd. Absolutely absurd! There is only a one-in-sixty-five million chance of something like this ever occurring!

1228034903001941--.name: Last night, as I was stepping out for my nightly counting of the stars, a brazen band of $npcNamePlural:21000423$ and $npcNamePlural:21000417$  broke into the house and stole all of Master Oliver's portraits!

1228034903001943--.name: Surely you jest! Why, the odds that you've never heard of the great $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$ are less than 0.000002%!

1228034903001944--.name: The master is the famous oil baron of Karkar Island. There is no greater businessman in all of Maple World, or so I am contractually obligated to say. He is known throughout the lands for his opulent tastes and... gulp... utter ruthlessness...

1228034903001945--.name: Maybe I'll just pack up my things and leave before word gets out that his portraits were stolen. Yes, that would yield the highest chance of my survival...

1228034903001947--.name: Unbelievable! For precisely 0.01 seconds, I thought I was hearing things. For a complete stranger to offer $male:his,female:her$ aid...

1228034903001948--.name: Very well. I shall place my fate in your hands.

1228034903001950--.name: I estimate a 95% chance that the $npcNamePlural:21000423$ and $npcNamePlural:21000417$ that stole the $itemPlural:30000451$ are still nearby.

1228034903001951--.name: Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000423$ and $npcNamePlural:21000417$ and ensure the safe return of $itemPlural:30000451$.

1228034903001952--.name: You are back far too early. It is as I feared... The chance that an utter stranger could help me was one-to-thirty-five million...

1228034903001954--.name: I never thought this would happen! Out of the 3,527 people that passed me today, I never thought one of them would save my hide.

1228034903001955--.name: Thank you. I don't think I can ever repay you, but come to me if you ever have questions about Karkar Island. You will find that I am a font of information.

1228034903001956--.name: Ugh, my guts... What could be taking her so long?

1228034903001957--.name: Maybe you should slow down with the burgers.

1228034903001958--.name: Youngster! Everything aches when you get to be my age. But it isn't my tummy that's bothering me today. No, it's my... feelings.

1228034903001959--.name: I decided to join my wife at the mall today, but it's been hours and she still hasn't come back from her shopping.

1228034903001960--.name: Women, am I right? $female:No offense. $I don't know where she gets all that energy for shopping...

1228034903001961--.name: I've got a bad case of the ol' burger bloats to go find her. Would you be a friend and let her know that her doting husband is waiting for her?

1228034903001963--.name: $npcName:11001331[gender:1]$, of course. I'm sure you'll have no trouble finding her. Let's just say she stands out in a crowd.

1228034903001964--.name: You let my wife to get back straight away. I don't know how many more of these burgers I can take.

1228034903001966--.name: My husband sent you? Oh no! I completely lost track of the time...

1228034903001967--.name: But what am I going to do? I can't go back like this!

1228034903001969--.name: I was about to join my husband for a lovely lunch of cheeseburgers, but I was accosted by monsters. They took everything!

1228034903001970--.name: I am not moving one inch until I get my things back. Do you have any idea how much that cute new top cost?

1228034903001972--.name: Oh? You don't look like a mall employee... But I guess I have no choice.

1228034903001973--.name: Please get my things back from the awful, horrible, no-good $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ that are loitering about $map:02010010$.

1228034903001974--.name: Please get my things back from the awful, horrible, no-good $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ that are loitering about $map:02010010$.

1228034903001975--.name: Adore by Perika... Perion Pursery... Racheal's Rags... It's all here. No wonder the monsters picked on me. I have all the best brands!

1228034903001976--.name: Now, my husband... I won't ever hear the end of this, will I?

1228034903001977--.name: I can find him from my own. Poor dear is probably eating himself silly at our favorite burger place. Thank you!

1228034903001978--.name: Y-you look like you're tougher than our usual customers. Perhaps you can help!

1228034903001979--.name: You s-see those... those walking tin cans? Steel cans? I'm honestly not sure what their cans are made of. The important thing is, they're scaring off all our business!

1228034903001980--.name: I r-run the $map:02010010$ Merchant Society. But if the merchants all go out of business, there will be no society, right? S-so please, I beg you, help us with this inconvenient monster problem!

1228034903001981--.name: I will pay you h-handsomely for driving off the $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$.

1228034903001982--.name: I will pay you h-handsomely for driving the $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ away from $map:02010010$.

1228034903001983--.name: At $map:02010010$, we pride ourselves in providing the highest quality retail, entertainment, and dining experience for our customers.

1228034903001984--.name: Thanks to you, we can now boast that we offer the highest quality monster extermination service, as well.

1228034903001985--.name: Phew. I feel like I can finally get my nerves under control...

1228034903001986--.name: You're here to see my $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$, aren't you? He's world famous for his charms, you know.

1228034903001987--.name: But now he's got a bad case of the crankies. A cranky $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$ is not a charming $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$.

1228034903001988--.name: There's only one thing that can calm $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$ down when he's like this: $item:30000453$. But there are too many monsters for me to make it to the vending machine!

1228034903001989--.name: $MyPCName$, can you get some $item:30000453$ for me? $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$ is no good without it!

1228034903001990--.name: You can get $item:30000453$ from the vending machines all over $map:02010010$.

1228174803002165--.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. You're welcome to come by whenever you want to bask in $npcName:11001334[gender:0]$'s cuteness.

1228034903001992--.name: Hold on! Don't just walk away. We got to talk, you and me.

1228034903001994--.name: We're two of a kind. I can tell. Real skaters, deep down in our hearts. You heading up to see $npcName:11001336[gender:0]$?

1228034903001996--.name: Oh, I gotcha. You were too lazy to return your board, and now you're scared of what he'll say if you bring it back now. We've all been there, $male:bro,female:girl$.

1228034903001997--.name: I'm pretty sure I've never been "there."

1228034903001998--.name: Don't feel bad, $male:bro,female:girl$. It's never too late to start! Heck, I bet if you headed over to the skate shop right now, they'd be happy to hook you up with a sweet board.

1228034903001999--.name: And while you're at it, mind taking the board I rented back to $npcName:11001336[gender:0]$? You'd be doing me a real solid.

1228034903002000--.name: No time like the present, $male:bro,female:girl$. I bet $npcName:11001336[gender:0]$'s real eager to get that board back.

1228034903002001--.name: $npcName:11001335[gender:0]$, that slacker. Couldn't face me after waiting weeks to return this, eh? Well, thanks.

1228034903002002--.name: Man.. I don't want to be that guy. I remember how it is. I used to be a skater when I was younger, y'know?

1228034903002003--.name: But I'm trying to run a business here. These kids don't appreciate that.

1228034903002004--.name: They rent a skateboard and I never hear from them again. Most of them just ditch their boards in the park. It's not like the boards'll magically pick up themselves...

1228034903002005--.name: Maybe they'll come to their senses if I start charging late fees... See this? Half my boards are missing!

1228034903002006--.name: If you're headed out to the skate park anyway, mind grabbing the abandoned boards for me? I'll throw in a free rental to make it worth your time.

1228034903002007--.name: I'm in a bit of a hurry. It's skating season and I need those skateboards back to rent to new customers.

1228034903002008--.name: Look at all the boards you found! That does it. Let's see how those punks like paying late fees out the nose!

1228034903002009--.name: It was bad enough that nobody returns my board. But the bugs here are out of control!

1228034903002010--.name: You saw it, didn't you? Swarms of filthy insects all over the place! I stepped out of the shop for just a minute and they looted all my skateboard parts.

1228034903002011--.name: What do they even want with skateboard parks? Are they just in it to annoy me? Ugh, my head is throbbing...

1228034903002012--.name: You've got to help me. Track down those bugs and get my $itemPlural:30000458$ back.

1228034903002013--.name: I've got to watch the store. But if you do this for me, I'll pay you generously.

1228034903002014--.name: Hurry over to $map:02010014$ and defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000438$ and $npcNamePlural:21000434$. They're the ones who took my $itemPlural:30000458$

1228034903002015--.name: They better not have damaged these parts... Anyway, you did your part. Here's your pay.

1228034903002016--.name: First, the customers stopped coming. Then I complained that things couldn't get any worse. Then the bugs showed up...

1228034903002017--.name: Let's make a deal. You exterminate those bugs for me, and I'll cook you up a fresh dish. On the house.

1228034903002018--.name: I've got to keep sanitary, you know? I can't be seen touching those dirty bugs!

1228034903002019--.name: Take out any $npcNamePlural:21000434$ and $npcNamePlural:21000438$ you see. I beg you!

1228034903002020--.name: Take out any $npcNamePlural:21000434$ and $npcNamePlural:21000438$ you see. I beg you!

1228034903002021--.name: You got rid of 'em already? Amazing!

1228034903002025--.name: I came here because we got a report of an infestation. I had no idea things'd be this bad.

1228034903002026--.name: If the bug swarms keep growing, then soon all of Ludari will be infested!

1228034903002027--.name: Something must be done. Find $npcName:11001342[gender:0]$ out in $map:02010019$ and tell him I need help.

1228034903002028--.name: I'll be here. Fighting bugs. <font size='20'>Please hurry.</font>

1228034903002029--.name: We don't have much time! Please get my message to $npcName:11001342[gender:0]$ in $map:02010019$. If you don't hurry, $map:02010019$ may be lost!

1228034903002030--.name: $map:02010014$ is that bad? I can't exactly leave here. Not while there are so many bugs left...

1228034903002031--.name: What's the cause of all this? We'll never win if we can't cut them off at the source.

1228034903002032--.name: I can't understand it. Nobody's ever escaped Alikar before. So how did these louts manage it?

1228034903002033--.name: Yes, but they won't enjoy their freedom for long. I've tracked them to $map:52010008$.

1228034903002034--.name: They may have escaped before, but $npcName:11001344[gender:0]$ is on the job now. They're trapped like rats.

1228034903002035--.name: Lend me a hand. Go into the $map:52010008$ and drag them out of hiding.

1229155703002188--.name: I'll watch the exits to make sure they don't make a run for it. Any come out, and I'll be all over them.

1228034903002036--.name: $map:52010008$ is big, so be careful not to lose them. Check under all the beds and in all the closets!

1228034903002037--.name: Leave no bed unturned and no closet unchecked.

1228034903002039--.name: Thanks for the help. I'm glad to put this whole mess behind me.

1228034903002040--.name: Unexpected. Unplanned for. And, worst of all, unscheduled!

1228034903002042--.name: We put in an order for repairmen to fix up the subway, but the workers were actually monsters in disguise!

1228034903002043--.name: Without the rails, Ludari simply doesn't run. We're the lifeblood of the city!

1228034903002044--.name: We must eliminate these monsters to keep the peace. $MyPCName$, can I rely on you to take care of this matter?

1228034903002045--.name: Defeat the monsters near the tracks. The $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$ cannot be allowed to continue this charade!

1228034903002046--.name: I'm relieved. With your help, we were able to evacuate the passengers, at least.

1228034903002047--.name: The repairmen—the real repairmen—are still trapped inside the $map:52010009$.

1228034903002048--.name: I'm certain there are monsters in there with them... While I want the rails repaired, their safety is more important.

1228034903002049--.name: Please go into the $map:52010009$ and make sure my workers are okay.

1228034903002050--.name: Please go into the $map:52010009$ and make sure my workers are okay.

1228034903002051--.name: The last of the repairmen just made it out. They're being checked for injuries now.

1228034903002052--.name: Thanks to you, nobody was seriously hurt. I don't know if I can ever thank you enough.

1228034903002055--.name: I was on my home to my blessed hometown, and the train stopped... And th-then... And then!!

1228034903002056--.name: Take a deep breath and speak slowly.

1228034903002057--.name: I thought they were workers coming to help me with my bags... but they were monsters in disguise! They took all my things!

1228034903002058--.name: I've been busy lately, and I haven't had time to keep up with my parents back home. I was going to make it up to them with piles and piles of gifts, but now they're all gone...

1228034903002060--.name: R-really? You'll get my gifts back? While you're at it, teach those nasty $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$ for stealing my precious presents!

1228034903002061--.name: I'd rather not go home at all if I can't get my stuff back. Please get the gifts back from the $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$.

1228034903002062--.name: Th-thank you! Thank you so much! Sniff...

1228034903002096--.name: Bravo! Bravo! This is it! I've hit the jackpot!

1228034903002098--.name: Hey, come closer and I'll let you in on this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

1228034903002099--.name: I'm here to record the upcoming fight. But the thing is, there's not much money in these kinds of shows anymore. People want something fresh.

1228034903002100--.name: Something like... the monsters completely destroying the arena here! I already have a name in mind. "Arena Attack! A Special Seven Day Miniseries."

1228034903002101--.name: It doesn't get more real than this! We'll get ratings to die for. I promise you that.

1228034903002102--.name: We've got to hurry up or this opportunity will pass us by. Get the $itemPlural:30000482$ from the cameras around $map:02010020$. Quickly!

1228034903002103--.name: Collect the $itemPlural:30000482$ from the cameras around $map:02010020$. Hurry!

1228034903002104--.name: Now I possess all the tapes! Thanks. It's time for my star to rise at last...

1228034903002105--.name: This makes absolutely no sense! My calculations were perfect. I analyzed the last twenty bouts of both fighters. There's no way my prediction could have been wrong.

1228034903002106--.name: This match should have gone to $npcName:11001378[gender:0]$, no question. There must be something else going on here...

1228034903002107--.name: I hope you're not brushing me off. My calculations are never wrong! Somebody must have manipulated the data...

1228034903002108--.name: Let me think... The original copies of the data should be in the $map:52010010$. I'm sure of it.

1228034903002109--.name: The solution is simple, then. All you need to do is sneak into the $map:52010010$ and bring me the $item:30000483$.

1228034903002110--.name: You will do it, of course. I'm an extremely popular manager. People will notice if I go myself.

1228034903002111--.name: All you need to do is sneak into the $map:52010010$ and bring me the $item:30000483$.

1228034903002112--.name: And I was right, of course. The $item:30000483$ were in the office. I'd better hurry up and check out this data...

0831174201000260--.name: $MyPCName$... I don't know what brought you here, but do you think you could help me?

0831174201000262--.name: There is someone whom I owe my life. It was his final wish that I take care of his newborn son.

0831174201000263--.name: From that day forward, I made it my life's mission to look after that boy. Wherever I might go, we were never apart. But one day, I received an ominous fortune from $npc:11001046[gender:0]$ of $map:02000268$.

0831174201000264--.name: He said that the child would lose his life at the hands of the terrible $npc:23090005[gender:0]$... But the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ is immortal. It can be defeated, but never destroyed.

0831174201000265--.name: So where do I come into this?

0831174201000266--.name: $npc:11001046[gender:0]$ told me how to seal the beast away for a time. First, he told me to obtain a $item:30000157$ in $map:02000268$. But... try as I might, I couldn't find it, despite coming all the way here.

0831174201000267--.name: Please, will you help me by scouring $map:02000268$ for a $item:30000157$ while I search this place?

0831174201000268--.name: If you do find a $item:30000157$</font>, bring it directly to $npc:11001046[gender:0]$!  He will surely know a way to defeat the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$!

0831174201000269--.name: $npc:11001046[gender:0]$ told me how to seal the beast away for a time. First, he told me to obtain a $item:30000157$ in $map:02000268$. Please, will you help me by scouring $map:02000268$ for a $item:30000157$

0831174201000271--.name: Heh. He sure is a stubborn one. He should slow down a little. It's not like a dead man can collect on his debts. Trying to repay a life-debt at any cost... Ho-hum.

0831174201000272--.name: Long ago, a group of nameless swordsmen clothed adorned with simple bamboo hats sealed the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ in the $map:02000037$. They managed to seal the temple entrance and put the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ to sleep, but it cost them their souls.

0831174201000273--.name: This $item:30000157$ was the blade wielded by one of those heroes, so many years ago. It is old and worn, yes, but it can be restored to its former glory by means of an ancient magic. One designed to undo the toll of time.

0831174201000274--.name: I can restore the $item:13200028$ to its former power, so that you can it can be used to seal the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ away once more. There may also be a way to prevent the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ from ever awakening again. But first, give me some time to work on the blade...

0831174201000277--.name: Wooo! One try! I managed to restore the $item:13200028$ in a single attempt! All of those years of Shaman training really paid off. TAKE THAT, DAD!

0831174201000278--.name: I've placed the $item:13200028$ inside this $item:30000155$, please deliver it to $npc:11000144[gender:0]$. He will need it when he confronts the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$.

0831174201000279--.name: There's one more thing! The $item:13200028$ alone will not be enough to defeat the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$... What we need is the power of the one who wielded it.

0831174201000280--.name: The souls of the heroes rest within the grave markers in $map:02000200$. Find the $item:30000153$, and throw it into the $npcName:11000345$ which sits nearby! The heroes gave the last of their strength to ignite the $npcName:11000345$ before they fell. You can find it near the entrance of the $map:02000037$.

0831174201000281--.name: From the flames, you will draw forth the $item:30000154$, which can be used to unleash the true power of the $item:13200028$. Bring it to $npcName:11000144$. Also... tell him I wish him luck.

0831174201000284--.name: Nope! I just got turned around.

0831174201000285--.name: What are you thinking! This is it here. You should take better care of such things!

0831174201000286--.name: Didn't you put it in your bag? Maybe you should double-check.

0831174201000287--.name: Your bag looks full. Maybe you should make some space.

0831174201000289--.name: You're back! Did you talk to $npc:11001046[gender:0]$? What happened?

0831174201000290--.name: (Hand him the $item:30000155$, and tell him about the $item:30000154$.)

0831174201000291--.name: Could it be?! This is the $item:13200028$ used to seal away the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ long ago... Using this, I'll be sure to win!

0831174201000292--.name: I'm not sure how much good the $item:13200028$ is going to do me if I can't reach the $npc:23090005$ breaks free of the $map:02000037$...

0831174201000294--.name: While you were in $map:02000268$, I wandered deep inside the Ant Tunnel and found the door to the $map:02000037$. However... it was shut tight and could not be opened from the outside.

0831174201000295--.name: Maybe you can open the door using the $item:30000154$?

0831174201000296--.name: Hmm... Perhaps. We still need to find the $item:30000153$ $npcName:11001046[gender:0]$ spoke of. The resting place of the nameless heroes... $MyPCName$, lets search the Ant Tunnel for the $item:30000153$ together. You start in the $map:02000200$ where the $map:02000037$ entrance is located.

0831174201000297--.name: According to the prophecy, time is short. If you find the $item:30000153$, take it straight to the $npcName:11000345$ and place it inside. If all goes well, it should be transformed into the $item:30000154$.

0831174201000298--.name: $npcName:11001046[gender:0]$ said the $npcName:11000345$ is found near the entrance to the $map:02000037$ in the $map:02000200$, right? Then there's no time to waste! Get going!

0831174201000299--.name: According to the prophecy, time is short. If you find the $item:30000153$, take it straight to the $npcName:11000345$ and place it inside. If all goes well, it should be transformed into the $item:30000154$.

0831174201000300--.name: You found the $npc:11000345$ burning amidst the boiling lava.

0831174201000301--.name: Casting the $item:30000153$ into the $npc:11000345$ should awaken the power of the soul that sleeps within, transforming it into the $item:30000154$,

0831174201000304--.name: All that remains is to throw the $item:30000153$ into the flames.

0831174201000306--.name: Ah... That's the $item:30000154$! With the $item:13200028$ restored to its true power, I should be able to defeat the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$... Ugh...

0831174201000308--.name:
It's no big deal... I was in a hurry, and I tripped and fell off a cliff.
Agh... It's probably just a minor internal injury...

0831174201000309--.name: Uhh... You should see a doctor.

0831174201000310--.name: There's no time for that! If the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ awakens, and I'm not here to stop him...!

0831174201000312--.name: Ugh... It looks like I'm in your debt yet again. I'll leave it to you, but don't try and face the $npc:23090005[gender:0]$ alone.

0831174201000313--.name: Here, take the $item:13200028$. Gather the strongest warriors you can find and travel to the $map:02000037$. Ugh... I'll follow you when I can. I need to look after my wound and check in on the boy. I have to set my affairs in order, in case...

0831174201000314--.name: Just beyond the Cleansing Flames in the deepest part of the $map:02000200$, you'll find the entrance to the $map:02000037$.

0831174201000315--.name: Take this. I have embedded the $item:30000154$ within the $item:13200028$. Gather the strongest allies you can find... Face the$npc:23090005[gender:0]$. I'll follow as soon as I can!

1016135801000488--.name: Ah, $MyPCName$! Just the adventurer I was hoping to see. I have a new project that I'd love your help with. I'm making an illustrated guide to monsters all around the world! It will tell you what they look like, how to fight them, when to run away... all sorts of useful facts!

1019210701000620--.name: My monster guide is going to sell like hotcakes when it's finished! I would be more than happy to credit you as a co-author if you help me with my research.

1019210701000621--.name: Of course, there's still a lot of data to gather. For instance, I know very little about mechanical monsters. I heard there are many mechanical monsters to be found near $map:2000270$... Do you think you could face them in combat and tell me what you learn?

1022185201000838--.name: There are many kinds of mechanical monsters throughout this world. I want you to face various kinds in battle, and learn all you can about them.

1016135801000489--.name: Have you already faced off against those mechanical monsters? Tell, me! What sort of fascinating things did you learn about them? Do they have any special weaknesses?

1019210701000622--.name: (Tell him everything you observed about the monsters.)

1019210701000623--.name: Oh! What fascinating details! I'll be sure to jot all of this down. Thank you so very much for your help! Why don't you stop by tomorrow, and we can continue our research?

1016135801000495--.name: Have you already plucked those plant monsters? Was there anything you had to look out for? What did you learn?

1019210701000641--.name: Of course, there's still a lot of data to gather. For instance, I know very little about divine monsters. I have heard that divine monsters are especially rare. The best-known among them are likely $npc:23000019[gender:0]$ and $npc:23000020[gender:1]$, but I am certain you will encounter others.

1019210701000642--.name: Not long ago, I heard a story about a divine monster in the vicinity of $map:2000023$. Please defeat various types of divine monsters and tell me all you learn.

1022185201000842--.name: You will surely encounter divine monsters as you travel the world. Please face them in battle and learn all you can about them.

1016135801000497--.name: Have you already defeated those divine monsters? How did you do it? Any special tips?

1016135801000501--.name: Have you already bashed those beast monsters? What kinds did you face? Was there any trick to defeating them?

1022185201000845--.name: In your journeys you will surely encounter undead monsters. Defeat them and learn what you can!

1016135801000503--.name: Have you already undone those undead monsters? That must have been a frightening experience. What did you learn about them?

1022185201000846--.name: You will surely encounter fairy monsters as you travel the world. Please face them in battle and learn all you can about them.

1019210701000672--.name: Of course, there's still a lot of data to gather. For instance, I know very little about spirit monsters. I heard there are many spirit monsters scattered throughout the world... Do you think you could face them in combat and tell me what you learn?

1022185201000848--.name: Spirit monsters can be found all over this wondrous world! Face them in combat and tell me what you learn about them.

1016135801000509--.name: Have you already smashed those spirit monsters? They must have made spooky opponents. How did you manage to defeat them?

1019210701000673--.name: (Tell him everything you observed about the monsters.)

1019210701000674--.name: How interesting! I had no idea, I'll be sure to put that in my book. Thank you so very much for your help! Why don't you stop by tomorrow, and we can continue our research?

1016135801000565--.name: Well, did you try using public Shower Stalls as a weapon? Was it very effective?

1020213401000786--.name: Getting smacked with a shower rendered them all speechless.

1020213401000787--.name: I see! Now if I could only find a way to package and sell Shower Rooms...

1016135801000566--.name: A true warrior knows how to take advantage of their surroundings. Sometimes, an improvised weapon is the best one. For example, unattended Public Toilets can be wielded to devastating effect.

1020213401000788--.name: An object's use is determined by the people who use it. Finding new uses for things is one of the way we merchants turn a profit. Maybe you could help me test something out...

1020213401000789--.name: I have heard that Portable Toilets crop up in all sorts of unusual places, so they won't be easy to find. Would you mind investigating whether they make an effective weapon?

1022211001000877--.name: I have heard that Portable Toilets crop up in all sorts of unusual places, so they won't be easy to find.

1016135801000567--.name: Well, did you try using Portable Toilets as a weapon? Was it very effective?

1020213401000790--.name: I think the monsters were as disgusted as they were shocked.

1020213401000791--.name: I see! Now if I could only find a way to package and sell Restrooms...

1016135801000568--.name: I'm sure you have encountered all sorts of objects that can be used as weapons, but some are much more powerful than others. For example, the EMP Bomb.

1020213401000792--.name: An object's use is determined by the people who use it. Finding new uses for things is one of the way we merchants turn a profit. Maybe you could help me test something out...

1020213401000793--.name: I've heard EMP Bombs can be found in laboratories or factories... Of course, I'm sure you can find them elsewhere too. Would you mind investigating whether they make an effective weapon?

1022211001000878--.name: I've heard EMP Bombs can be found in laboratories or factories... Of course, I'm sure you can find them elsewhere too.

1016135801000569--.name: Well, did you try using EMP Bombs as a weapon? Was it very effective?

1020213401000794--.name: It exploded the monsters real good.

1020213401000795--.name: I see! Maybe EMP Bombs are too dangerous for me to responsibly sell...

1016135801000570--.name: I'm sure you have encountered all sorts of objects that can be used as weapons, but some are much more powerful than others. For example, the Wind-Up Bomb.

1020213401000796--.name: An object's use is determined by the people who use it. Finding new uses for things is one of the way we merchants turn a profit. Maybe you could help me test something out...

1020213401000797--.name: I've heard Wind-up Bombs can be found in the areas north of $map:2000100$ affected by the spread of Ludibrium energy... Of course, I'm sure you can find them elsewhere too. Would you mind investigating whether they make an effective weapon?

1022211001000879--.name: I've heard Wind-up Bombs can be found in the areas north of $map:2000100$ affected by the spread of Ludibrium energy... Of course, I'm sure you can find them elsewhere too.
