1021215901000837--.name: Rumor has it, $npc:23000012$ freezes everything it touches... It is said to appear in $map:02000176$. Please analyze $npc:23000012$'s strengths and weaknesses, so that I can document them for my guide. Of course, anything else you learn about them would be welcome information indeed.

1022211001000898--.name: Rumor has it, $npc:23000012$ freezes everything it touches... It is said to appear in $map:02000176$. Please analyze $npc:23000012$'s strengths and weaknesses, so that I can document them for my guide.

1016221201000619--.name: You're alive! You'd been gone so long I thought something had happened.... Well, tell me about your encounter with $npc:23000012$! What did you learn?

1016135801000588--.name: Have you heard of $map:2000325$? It is said to be the ultimate challenge! Surely there's no better way to hone your combat skills.

1023190701000899--.name: Why not go there and test your mettle? And... while you're there, perhaps you can collect some data on the unique monsters that appear there, for my book? I would be very grateful, of course! What do you say, will you take on $map:2000325$?

1026122901000946--.name: Weren't you going to challenge $map:2000325$? You can get there by way of $map:02000217$.

1016135801000589--.name: Tell me, did you discover any rare and unusual monsters? What were they like?

1023190701000900--.name: There were a bunch of powerful spirits. They didn't go down without a fight.

1023190701000901--.name: Ah, I see. Spirits... Well, in any case, I'm glad you returned from the trial none the worse for the wair.

1016135801000590--.name: Have you heard the rumors about the time machine? That's right! A time machine is being developed in $map:2000298$!

1023190701000902--.name: Can you imagine everything I could do with a time machine? ...I could sell them, and get filthy rich! A time machine in every home! Forget to pick up the kids? Go back in time! Do something embarrassing at work? Jump forward to when everyone's forgotten! I can't see a single flaw in my plan.

1023190701000903--.name: I've heard the time machine is located in the deepest room within $map:2000298$. They call the place the "$map:02000304$" or something…  Anyway, go and see for yourself if this time machine is the real thing!

1026122901000947--.name: I have to know, is the time machine real?! Hurry up and go to $map:02000304$ and find out!

1016135801000591--.name: You're back! Well, was there really a time machine?!

1023190701000904--.name: So... there is a time machine, but no one should ever, ever own one.

1023190701000905--.name: W-what? Oh... How disappointing. I was so excited about being the exclusive vendor of time machines...

1016135801000592--.name: Have you heard the rumors? A Vayarian who disappeared long ago has resurfaced at $map:02000191$. If what they say is true, its body is covered in chunks of ice imbued with magical, disease-curing powers! I'm not sure how they discovered that...

1023190701000906--.name: I know it's a big favor to ask, but do you think you could retrieve some of that magic ice for me? If the rumors are true, the commercial implications are staggering!

1026122901000948--.name: I know it's a big favor to ask, but do you think you could retrieve some of that magic ice for me? I know it won't be easy separating it from the giant's body...

1016135801000593--.name: You're back! Did you bring me some magic ice?

1023190701000907--.name: I couldn't collect any ice, but it didn't have a medicinal use anyway.

1023190701000908--.name: Is that so? Oh dear... I guess the rumors were false. Well, it's back to the drawing board...

1016135801000594--.name: Have you heard? $npc:23100033$, who appear in $map:2000098$, have fur whose softness and warmth cannot be matched! If I were to line boots with their fur, it would be an incredible hit!

1023190701000909--.name: I've seen a number of strong adventurers toting around hats and garments woven from their fur. But these creatures are violent. Shearing the beasts and making it out with your life is no easy task, so I haven't been able to get my hands on any. If you could bring me some of their fur so that I could verify these rumors, I would be most grateful.

1026122901000949--.name: Please investigate whether $npc:23100033$'s fur is as soft and warm as people say. If you can, bring me back some. You can find them at $map:2000098$.

1016135801000595--.name: Well, was $npc:23100033$'s fur as cozy as described?

1023190701000910--.name: It was soft, but they were too violent for me to bring back a sample.

1023190701000911--.name: Ah… If you had brought me some, I would've been able to see for myself. A pity. If you should happen to get a hold of some of $npc:23100033$'s fur in the future, I'd be grateful if you would bring it here for me to see.

0523110101001211--.name: Have you heard of the ancient shaman who wields a dark and terrible magic? I speak of course of $npc:24002005$.

0523110101001212--.name: I was wondering if I could harness that magic to help me lift heavy objects and restock the shelves... Although i worry that using such dark magic could drive me insane. I know! All I have to do is investigate whether $npc:24002005$ seems like a well-adjusted person.

0523110101001213--.name: Would you go to $map:02010047$ in $map:02010054$ and see if $npc:24002005$'s mind has been affected by the use of dark magic?

0523110101001214--.name: Well, was $npc:24002005$'s still in their right mind? Is their dark magic safe to use?

0523110101001215--.name: Considering he tried to take control of my mind, I'm going to say no.

0523110101001216--.name: Ah... R-Really? Hm... If it's that dangerous... Maybe I should just stick to lifting things the old-fashioned way.

0401111101000956--.name: I'm so glad I finally get to meet you!

0401111101000957--.name: Did you know that outfits can be enhanced with sockets? It's true!

0401111101000959--.name: You can embed sockets in standard outfits. Suits that take up two equipment slots get twice as many! Once socketed, you can put lumistones in your outfits for a little boost. Of course, you need $itemPlural:40100027$ to even get started.

0401111101000960--.name: Putting sockets in gear is tough enough...

0401111101000961--.name: I can't help you with that. But I can tell you all about special outfit crystals!

0401111101000962--.name: This is starting to sound like a sales pitch.

0401111101000963--.name: D-don't go! If I don't finish my lesson, I'll get fired!

0401111101000964--.name: Fine. Where can I get these amazing crystals?

0401111101000965--.name: Wh-what an excellent question. I'm glad you asked! So, you just go and... you get them...

0405180601001112--.name: Breathe, $npcName:11001612$, breathe! I'll just... read you this pamphlet...

0405180601001113--.name: "You can get special outfit crystals by participating in events or by dismantling most outfits!"

0405180601001114--.name: "The number of special outfit crystals you can get from dismantling an outfit depends on its quality and where you got it. If you dismantle an outfit where you unlocked the sockets yourself, you will get more than half of the amount you spent on unlocking the sockets in return. But make sure to check the tooltip as there are outfits that can't be dismantled."

0405180601001115--.name: That's a lot to take in.

0405180601001116--.name: Uh... Did you get all that?

0405180601001117--.name: Let's say I did and move on.

0405180601001118--.name: Thanks for your patience. There's just a little more I have to read... If you listen to the end, I'll give you an extremely nice gift!

0405180601001120--.name: "UGC outfits can't be dismantled, but they can be dismantled if you unlocked their sockets. The portion of the unlocking amount being returned is the same."

0405180601001122--.name: Just one more and I'm done! This is the most important part! The outfits you get from your Ducky Outfit Capsule won't give special outfit crystals when dismantled because they already have all sockets unlocked!

0405180601001123--.name: You really take this job seriously, don't you?

0405180601001124--.name: Unemployment is no joke! What with everything getting automated these days, it's hard to find steady work! Anyways, thanks for listening.

0407114101001181--.name: You're under a lot of pressure. I hope you know how much everyone is counting on you.

0407114101001183--.name: The empress has prepared a special gift for you, as thanks for everything you've done. It would be rude of you not to accept it.

0407114101001185--.name: $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ will be waiting in $map:02000031$ to present your gift. I've heard it's something else.

0407114101001186--.name: Oh, $MyPCName$! I've been waiting for you. The empress asked me to deliver this rare gift.

0412201401001200--.name: The empress tasked me with delivering this lumistone to you, $MyPCName$. With it, she passes on her blessings, and her profound hope for your future.

0412201401001201--.name: You must have done something quite noble and exceptional for the empress to bestow you with such a rare gift... $MyPCName$, you must feel so honored.

0412201401001202--.name: Err... What's this lumistone again, and why's it so great?

0412201401001203--.name: W-why is a lumistone so great? It's... a lumistone! Have you really not heard of them before?

0412201401001204--.name: What makes this lumistone so rare?

0412201401001206--.name: If you don't appreciate it, I'd be happy to... No. No, that won't do...

0412201401001207--.name: I will not disobey the empress. You clearly have no concept of the value and use of lumistones, I will be happy to answer any questions you might have.

0412201401001208--.name: I'm sure once you understand what it is you hold, you will appreciate what an incredible gift this is. And what exceptional quality... Frankly I'm jealous. I'd be happy to take the stone of your hand, if you don't want it.

0412201401001210--.name: Ha... Hahaha... Nevermind. That is a rare gift indeed, please make good use of it!

0831174201000057--.name: I'm a friend. Are you okay?

0831174201000058--.name: It's my glasses. I left them on my desk last night, but now they're gone!

0831174201000059--.name: They must have fallen, but I'm not exactly a graceful guy. Can you help me look for them? I'm worried I'd step on them.

0831174201000060--.name: My glasses have to be around here somewhere...

0831174201000062--.name: <font color="#909090">(The note on the table is in a language you don't understand. It also has a picture of glasses on it. Tell $npcName:11000595[gender:0]$ what you found.)</font>

0831174201000063--.name: That note... Was the word "Ruff" written on it?

0831174201000065--.name: Oh, I should've known. That little scamp! Ruff should be in hibernation by now...

0831174201000067--.name: He's one of my fairfolk friends. Mischievous little critter. He just loves shiny things. This isn't the first time he's done this, either...

0831174201000068--.name: I'm helpless without my glasses. I can't even make out your face when you're standing right in front of me. Will you help me?

0831174201000069--.name: Just tell me what to do.

0831174201000070--.name: Head to the top of the $map:02000103$ and find the $npcName:11000598$. The entrance to $map:02000320$ is behind it. I've never been inside, myself, but Ruff should be there.

0831174201000071--.name: Ruff told me that he has a special place where he keeps all of his treasures. I bet my glasses are in there, too.

0831174201000072--.name: If he really is hibernating, like he said, then try to be quiet. He didn't mean any harm, and there's no need to disturb him. I'll give him a stern talking to about my glasses after he wakes up.

0831174201000073--.name: According to my notes, "Sha merby keenteroa" roughly translates to "Thanks!" Ruff means well, even if he's left me in a tight spot here...

0831174201000074--.name: The entrance to $map:02000320$ should be behind the $npcName:11000598$ at the top of the $map:02000103$.

0831174201000075--.name: Go to $map:02000320$ and find my glasses. Please!

0831174201000076--.name: If he really is hibernating, like he said, then try to be quiet. He didn't mean any harm, and there's no need to disturb him. I'll give him a stern talking to about my glasses after he wakes up.

0831174201000077--.name: <font color="#909090">(This must be the tree that $npcName:11000595[gender:0]$ mentioned.)</font>

0831174201000078--.name: <font color="#909090">(You see the entrance to $map:02000320$ behind the tree.)</font>

0831174201000079--.name: <font color="#909090">(The entrance to $map:02000320$ is just ahead. Look for $npcName:11000595[gender:0]$'s glasses inside.)</font>

0831174201000080--.name: I can see. I can see! You have my thanks.

0831174201000081--.name: By the way, there were a whole bunch of $npcPlural:11000677$ there.

0831174201000082--.name: That can't be right. Ruff is a sprite with soft, white fur. You say there were more than one of him?

0831174201000084--.name: That can't be. Is the Ruff who comes by to play... actually a whole clan of fairfolk...?

0831174201000085--.name: Just in time, $MyPCName$. I need your help!

0831174201000087--.name: A few days ago, some of the others left for $map:02000169$. Sure, I was a tiny bit worried when I didn't hear back, but now that one of them has returned, I'm really worried.

0831174201000088--.name: $npc:11000696$ is the one who made it back. She looked just awful! She said $npc:23000034$ captured the others, and she barely managed to escape with her life.

0831174201000089--.name: She was too exhausted to say more, but now that she's rested up, maybe you can go talk to her? She should be catching her breath in the middle of town.

0831174201000090--.name: Ask her where the others are. If they're trapped or in trouble, we have to help them!

0831174201000091--.name: Talk to $npc:11000696$ to find out where the others who left town with her are now. She said $npc:23000034$ captured them, but we need more details! She should be resting up at the center of town.

0831174201000092--.name: Who are you? What do you want!?

0831174201000093--.name: Relax. I'm just here to talk. $npcName:11000136[gender:1]$ sent me.

0831174201000094--.name: Who? $npcName:11000136[gender:1]$?? Ahh, why is the world still spinning?

0831174201000095--.name: A key is required to enter the $map:02000230$. Find the $item:30000137$ on $npc:23000034$.

0831174201000096--.name: A key is required to enter the $map:02000230$. Find the $item:30000137$ on $npc:23000034$.

0831174201000097--.name: You saved the others! I was worried at first when you didn't return with them, but I'm so glad you're all right. Thank you for what you did.

0831174201000098--.name: $MyPCName$, we are greatly indebted to you. I'm going to tell my father what you did for us.

0831174201000099--.name: It's all coming back to me! The others... They're still trapped! Please, you have to save them!

0831174201000100--.name: Calm down. Tell me exactly what happened.

0831174201000102--.name: A few days ago, a bunch of us left for $map:02000169$ to find $npc:23000034$. We wanted to save Googoo from being used by Toh.

0831174201000103--.name: Googoo is strong, but he was always on good terms with us, like a gentle giant. But one day, he started causing trouble... We think it's because of Toh's influence.

0831174201000104--.name: After they became friends, Googoo stopped coming to visit us. Whenever we ran into him, he was mean! We almost gave up on him, but...

0831174201000105--.name: Someone overheard Toh whispering lies to Googoo, making him question his own self-worth. Googoo was good once! When I was repairing my house, he carried a bunch of heavy stuff for me. He even gave me a boost so I could hammer the roof!

0831174201000106--.name: When we heard that $npc:23000034$ were seen in $map:02000169$, those of us who remembered what Googoo used to be like decided to find him and free him from Toh. But before we could even find him...

0831174201000107--.name: We were ambushed! Before we knew it, we were surrounded by Toh's Mirror Images and locked up. Those guys were awful, pointing and laughing at me until my head hurt.

0831174201000109--.name: I snuck out when the Mirror Images were all taking a potty break together. I think the place they were keeping us was... the $map:02000230$? That must be Toh's base!

0831174201000110--.name: Ugh, I can't believe this happened to us!

0831174201000111--.name: Don't worry. I'll save the others.

0831174201000112--.name: It won't be easy. I tried to get back in after I escaped, but the $npc:11000686$ was shut tight. The door must have locked automatically behind me. I'll bet that vile Toh carries the $item:30000137$ with him at all times!

0831174201000113--.name: $npc:23000034$ always stick together. To get the key from Toh, you'll have to separate them first. But be careful, Googoo isn't the same gentle giant he used to be. That scary mask... It's like he doesn't even remember me!

0831174201000114--.name: Head down $map:02000169$ to get to the $npc:11000686$. Then get the $item:30000137$ from Toh to get in.

0831174201000115--.name: A bunch of us ventured to $map:02000169$ to try to save Googoo before we were ambushed.

0831174201000116--.name: I snuck out when the Mirror Images were all taking a potty break together. I think the place they were keeping us was... the $map:02000230$? That must be Toh's base!

0831174201000117--.name: You found the $npc:11000686$. It's locked, just like $npc:11000696$ said it would be.

0831174201000118--.name: Just you wait, my little prince! It's almost done!

0831174201000119--.name: I'm flattered, but I'm not a prince.

0831174201000120--.name: Huh? Not you! I'm making my newest concoction—I call it $npcName:11000695[gender:1]$'s Trueform Tincture—to help my friend turn back into a prince.

0831174201000121--.name: Your friend? You mean the toad?

0831174201000122--.name: Of course I mean the toad! Listen, have you ever heard of a regular toad wearing a crown before? It's ridiculous! When I found this little guy down by the lake, I knew in an instant that he was a prince who'd fallen under a terrible curse!

0831174201000123--.name: It took some doing, but I managed to get a recipe for a potion to cure him. It's taken me days just to mix the stuff... But it's almost complete! Almost...

0831174201000126--.name: Please, you must help me. I can't take my eyes off my cauldron, or the potion will spoil! You need to get the $item:30000138$ for me!

0831174201000127--.name: There's no shortage of $npcPlural:21000038$ in the $map:02000090$. Hurry back with that $item:30000138$... unless you want the prince to spend the rest of his days covered in warts!

0831174201000128--.name: If you don't hurry, the potion will boil over! Quickly, gather $item:30000138$ from the $npcPlural:21000038$ in the $map:02000090$!

0831174201000129--.name: You were cutting it a little close there! But I think if I sprinkle it in just now...

0831174201000130--.name: Let's hope this works! You know, if things work out between me and the prince here, I bet we could get you a little barony of your own as a thank-you gift... Heheh...

0831174201000131--.name: The potion is finally complete! But... it's a little... thick.

0831174201000132--.name: Let me check the recipe... Oh no! It's actually an ointment? Then I have to rub it into his skin, and... Oh my...

0831174201000134--.name: I-is that a problem?! He isn't wearing anything but a crown. What do you think's going to happen when I r-r-rub the lotion into his skin?!

0831174201000135--.name: He'll turn back into a prince, right?

0831174201000136--.name: Y-y-you really don't have a problem with any of this? Fine! You take the ointment, then. Apply it to the toad... I mean the p-p-prince, since you're so shameless!

0831174201000137--.name: I thought you were going to put the lotion on the prince! Or are you too embarrassed, after all?

0831174201000138--.name: Tell me about this lotion again.

0831174201000140--.name: There! He's right there! The big toad wearing the crown. Don't tell me you're having second thoughts!

0831174201000141--.name: This stuff? I made it myself! You were there for that part, weren't you? Anyway, we're wasting time. The prince won't cure himself, after all.

0831174201000142--.name: Your bag looks a little heavy. Clear it out and I'll give you another vial of my potion.

0831174201000143--.name: Here, take it. Just rub it... rub it all over the toad. And be gentle, okay? We don't want to leave a bruise.

0831174201000144--.name: Nothing happened? Oh no... Were we too late when we added the sap?

0831174201000145--.name: Don't worry, my prince! Just wait a little longer. I'll cure you!

0901101205000102--.name: Don't hit me! I'm feeling queasy.

0901101205000104--.name: Oh, sorry... I don't really know. All these adventurers keep coming up and trying to hit me. I guess they don't like how I dress. And to top it all off, I can't see very well.

0901101205000105--.name: Is the mask getting in the way?

0901101205000106--.name: Huh? ...mask? I got dust on my glasses while I was getting ready to cross the bridge. So I cleaned them and started to put them on again, when I saw a cobra not ten inches away!

0901101205000107--.name: I got startled and dropped my glasses under the bridge, and now I'm terrified to cross it for fear of falling.

0901101205000109--.name: Really? You'd do that for me? Gee, thanks, buddy! You should find them glinting in the sunlight if you just take a good look under the bridge.

0901101205000110--.name:
<font color="#909090">(You feel as though his mask is squinting at you.)</font> 
Didn't you find my glasses yet? They might not be the only shiny thing down there. Keep looking.

0901101205000111--.name: You found them! A little scratched up, but no worse for wear. Thanks buddy! I think I'll try wearing them under my mask this time.

0901101205000114--.name: I really appreciate you getting my glasses back, but I'm actually afraid of heights.

0901101205000115--.name: Then how did you get over here?

0901101205000116--.name: ...To be honest, I crawled across. I was shaking the whole time. But the reason I came over here was to transport firewood.

0901101205000117--.name: I barely managed to cross on my own. Just the thought of trying to take the $itemPlural:30000207$ with me gives me anxiety.

0901101205000119--.name: Really? You'd do that? Golly, thanks! Just take it across the bridge.

0901101205000121--.name: Wow! Weren't you scared? You're amazing! Thanks again.

0901101205000130--.name: Where oh where has that old snail gone?

0901101205000132--.name: Not me you silly child! My foolish old husband who thinks he's still a young mollusk.

0901101205000134--.name: Are you so bored that you must bother the elderly? My husband is $npc:22000059$.

0901101205000135--.name: He has become obsessed with a flower he picked during one of his afternoon crawls. I do not know what has gotten into him but now he carries it on his back wherever he goes.

0901101205000137--.name: Do not be silly. My husband may be a fool but he is no botanical addict. If you insist on meddling then you might as well tell him to come home.

0901101205000138--.name: I am told that snails are exceptionally slow. I cannot believe that though. If I am the slow one then why are you still here?

0901101205000139--.name: Your tale is outlandish but I do not suppose you would lie to me. Maybe there really was something about that flower.

0901101205000140--.name: Have you ever heard of crabs that graze on grass?

0901101205000142--.name: I come here on vacation every year, and each time I'm reminded that the charm of $map:2000111$ is more than just the white sandy beach and blue sea. The lush, grassy hills beside us are the town's pride and joy.

0901101205000143--.name: The problem is, the whole place is full of bare spots now, because the $npcPlural:21000025$ and $npcPlural:21000058$ keep chewing it to bits!

0901101205000144--.name: They're gobbling up the grass at an alarming speed, and if we don't put a stop to it, they might just eat everything in sight!

0901101205000145--.name: Would you please drive the $npcPlural:21000025$ and $npcPlural:21000058$ out of $map:2000111$ while we still have a chance to save it?

0901101205000146--.name: It makes me so sad to see that beautiful field so damaged.

0901101205000147--.name: I'm so glad the grass will finally have a chance to re-grow. Hopefully all of those bare patches will fill in quickly.

0901101205000219--.name: <font color="#909090">(He stares at the top of Fellowstone Tower for a long time in silence.)</font>

0901101205000220--.name: Y'know, when you're so different from everybody else, you'll go to all kinds of trouble to fit in.

0901101205000221--.name: It wasn't easy, but I managed to climb all the way to the top of Fellowstone Tower. I wanted to know what it was like to see the world from so high up.

0901101205000222--.name: And y'know what? It felt pretty great. I've spent so long looking up at the tower from down below. It was really cool to see it the other way around for once.

0901101205000223--.name: I wanted to remember it forever, so I took a bunch of pictures from the top. But I got scared by some monsters and I dropped my camera while I was running away.

0901101205000224--.name: I know exactly where I dropped my camera, but I'm too afraid to go back there. It fell between some boxes at the very top of the tower. I hope you're not scared of heights!

0901101205000225--.name: Were you able to find my camera?

0901101205000226--.name: You found it! I can't wait to look at the pictures. Thanks!

0901101205000238--.name: I'm doing breathing exercises to steady my balance. Haaaaa... Hwoooo...

0901101205000240--.name: See the wire fence behind me? Seems like some of them have come loose and need to be re-fastened.

0901101205000241--.name: Some poor unsuspecting soul could lose their balance and reach for the fence to steady themselves, only to end up pulling the whole thing over the edge with them.

0901101205000242--.name: So, I'm doing these exercises to get ready to go in there and safely repair the fencing. And not because I'm afraid of $npcPlural:29000025$, or of heights, because I'm not.

0901101205000243--.name: Okay, so go fix the fence then.

0901101205000244--.name: I'm getting to it! I just have a few more warm-ups to get through. Hwoo... Haaa... Hwoo...

0901101205000246--.name: Sorry, I can't talk right now, I need to focus on my breathing. Hwooo...

0901101205000247--.name: Still a few more warm-ups before I can fix that fence.  Haaaaaa... Hwooooo...

0901101205000248--.name: Did you secure the links and drive the posts in deep? No more shaking?

0901101205000249--.name: Uhh... I did some stuff, but it's still shaking.

0901101205000250--.name:
You shouldn't take on a job if you can't do it properly. 
<font color="#909090">(He mumbles angrily to himself.)</font>

0901101205000253--.name: Ah, are you here because of the rumors too? Darn. I should've known somebody else'd have the same idea.

0901101205000255--.name: Don't play dumb. I know you're here to collect the shiny trinkets hoarded by the monsters of $map:02000006$.

0901101205000256--.name: Huh, do you really not know? Well, you seem nice so I'll let you in on the secret. You know how the fairies of $map:02000023$ are suckers anything shiny, right?

0901101205000257--.name: The monsters of $map:02000006$ have taken to antagonizing the fairies by stealing their shiny baubles and hiding them away. Now, everybody knows that shiny stuff is valuable.

0901101205000258--.name: So, if I collect shiny stuff from the monsters, I can sell them on the market and get filthy stinkin' rich! That's just basic math. Hehehe. I get excited just thinking about it.

0901101205000259--.name: Actually, I've got a business proposition for you. How about you help me collect some shiny stuff, and I'll give you a cash advance on the profits?

0901101205000261--.name: What, do you prefer not being rich? Suit yourself!

0901101205000262--.name: Once I'm rich, I'm gonna buy a sweet house in $map:02000064$.

0901101205000263--.name: Is this... Is this all you collected? I was expecting gold and diamonds, not useless junk! You're not lying to me and keeping the good stuff to yourself, are you? Hmm... Maybe fairies just have awful taste.

0901101205000264--.name: I figured out the flaw in our plan. Those monsters would never just carry the valuable stuff around with them.

0901101205000265--.name: If I were them, I would hide it out of sight. Like say, those conspicuous piles of earth around $map:02000006$...

0901101205000266--.name: Hehehe, I'm a genius! I don't know why I didn't see it before. See all those weird mounds around the lake?

0901101205000267--.name: Dig through the mounds and bring me whatever treasures you find. And don't try any funny stuff, I'll be watching!

0901101205000268--.name: What's wrong, afraid of getting your hands dirty? Just wash them in the pond!

0901101205000269--.name: Did you dig through all those earth mounds? Well don't leave me in suspense, what did you find?

0901101205000271--.name: Huh. I was sure those gross mounds of dirt would be full of valuable treasures. Looks like I came out here for nothing!

0901101205000272--.name: I climbed as far as I could, but I'm at the end of my strength.

0901101205000274--.name: The magical stream that flows down through the great tree waters this entire forest. Everything that lives and thrives here drinks from its life-giving waters.

0901101205000275--.name: But recently, its flow was obstructed by an earthquake, and now the forest is withering. Without the water, the grass, the animals, and even the fairfolk who dwell here will die.

0901101205000276--.name: I've grown too weak to climb up, even if I used the last of my strength.

0901101205000278--.name: Up there at the top of the tree is the water's source. If you collect some and sprinkle it around the area, life should begin to return to the forest.

0901101205000280--.name: You'll really help us? Here, take this water bottle. I have to warn you, it's a long climb. Light guide you!

0901101205000283--.name: So... Do you like, live out here?

0901101205000284--.name: The $item:30000259$? You left it right here.

0901101205000285--.name: Look again, it's already in your bag.

0901101205000286--.name: The $item:30000259$? You left it right here, but you'll need to make room for it in your bag.

0901101205000287--.name: Most fairfolk make their homes in magical forests invisible to the eyes of mankind. You wouldn't see it even if it were right in front of you.

0901101205000288--.name: Ahh. Thanks, I was thirsty! Now I need to go and sprinkle the rest of this on the forest.

0901101205000289--.name: I need to hurry and sprinkle this water around the forest, but there are monsters all over the place!

0901101205000290--.name: I'll take care of the monsters.

0901101205000292--.name: Not all fairfolk can use magic.

0901101205000293--.name: Now I can move around the forest freely, thanks!

0901101205000370--.name: What am I going to do? Everyone is staring at me. Even the monsters are making fun!

0901101205000372--.name: Don't get me started! I was out for a stroll when a witch appeared with a great big jeweled staff. She said it could be mine... if I won a little wager...

0901101205000373--.name: It was just a little game of rock-paper-scissors. That's my game, you know! But she beat me soundly. Several times in a row...

0901101205000374--.name: First, she took my clothes. Then she turned my servants into monsters. At least I still have my crown...

0901101205000375--.name: She says she'll give it all back if I just win one game. But my spirit is broken... Perhaps you could challenge her in my place?

0901101205000376--.name: You have nothing to lose. Just keep trying until you win!

0901101205000377--.name: My clothes? Oh, thank you, thank you! I wish I could give you more, but I'm afraid I'm a tad empty-handed at the moment.

0901101205000378--.name: This little hamlet of a kingdom isn't on any of my maps, so I thought I'd pop by and take a look. But I've never been to such a dreadfully boring place!

0901101205000379--.name: Before I leave, I'd like to turn everything back to normal. I may be a witch, but that doesn't make me a bad guy, after all.

0901101205000380--.name: Since that pathetic excuse of a king already has his clothes back, all we need to do now is return his servants back to their original forms.

0901101205000381--.name: I'll need their souls, of course. Which I've conveniently placed inside the monsters here. Defeat the monsters and extract their souls.

0901101205000382--.name: Hurry back with those $itemPlural:30000324$. I'm eager to leave this place!

0901101205000383--.name: Good, good. Now hand over the souls and get out of my sight!

0901101205000670--.name: (He gives you a goofy smile. Suddenly and without warning, he throws a kick.) Hi-yah!

0901101205000673--.name: Sure, but why are you training so hard?

0901101205000674--.name: Have you ever noticed that monsters tend to come in groups of 18? I'm training so I can take on 18 enemies at once.

0901101205000675--.name: Fighting when you're outnumbered isn't pretty. I was pretty scared the first time I took on two monsters at the same time. But nowadays, I win 2-on-1 matches all the time—against foes like $npcName:23100033$, for example.

0901101205000676--.name: You're a fighter too, aren't you? Then this should be obvious to you! If you can't even grasp these basic concepts, then I'm wasting my time on you.

0901101205000677--.name: Prove me wrong. Beat $npcName:23100033$, just like me. Then you'll have my respect.

0901101205000678--.name: Here's some free advice. Do all of your training in a snowstorm so you're ready for $npcName:23100033$'s frosty attacks!

0901101205000679--.name: Want to see my new and improved kicks? Hi-YAH! Terrifying, right?

0901101205000680--.name: Come to think of it, you've been gone a while. Glad you survived the fight. I'd hate to think I sent you to your death!

0901101205000681--.name: There's hardly a mark on you. No way you actually fought $npcName:23100033$.

0901101205000682--.name: I suppose that's for the best. A duo like that is way too strong for a shrimp like you.

0901101205000683--.name: But I did fight $npcName:23100033$. And won. A lot.

0901101205000684--.name: R-really? F-fighters have to have honor, you know! So don't you dare lie to me!

0901101205000686--.name: W-well, then... That was just an easy 2-on-1 fight. Nowadays I fight... 4-on-1... all the time! So you still got nothing on me!

0901101205000687--.name: You can't just beat $npcName:23100033$ a few dozen times and think you're my equal. No, you need to beat them dozens and dozens of times! Do that, and I'll admit you're good.

0901101205000688--.name: If you want, I'll show you some of my signature kicks. All I've gotta do is lift up my foot, and enemies cower in fear. Hi-YAH!

0901101205000691--.name: You... you really beat $npcName:23100033$... that many times...?

0901101205000693--.name: Fine. I have no choice. I'll accept you as my new disciple! You're responsible for your own food. Go ahead and find a soft patch of dirt to use as your room.

0901101205000695--.name: That's the spirit. Just remember, I'm your teacher now. Good luck, my young disciple!

0914223505000750--.name: It's time I moved on from this place, but there's one thing still on my mind... A good friend of mine who lives here.

0914223505000751--.name: His name is $npc:11001142[gender:0]$, and he lives alone in the treetops due to his temper. He may act mean, but he's really a sweet guy.

0914223505000752--.name: I can't leave without saying goodbye, but every time I try to work up the courage to go and see him, I start to cry.

0914223505000753--.name: So... I was wondering... Would you mind saying goodbye to him for me?

0914223505000754--.name: The last time we talked we got in a fight. It was over something really silly too.

0914223505000755--.name: Who are you, and why are you here?

0914223505000757--.name: Ugh. That jerk? What does he want now?

0914223505000758--.name: He asked me to say goodbye.

0914223505000761--.name: If you see $npc:11000293$ again, could you do me a favor?

0914223505000763--.name:
Give this to him, will you?
<font color="#909090">(He pulls a $item:30000389$ from his pocket and hands it to you.)</font>

0914223505000764--.name: I was going to give him this as an apology the next time he came over, but... I guess I'm not going to get the chance. Well, I guess it's a parting gift now.

0914223505000767--.name: Is there anything you want me to tell him?

0914223505000768--.name: You stupid jerk! It may just be a leaf to you, but it means a lot to me. Here's another $item:30000389$ to bring him. Don't you dare lose this one!

0914223505000769--.name: You're not going to extort me for more $itemPlural:30000389$. I know you still have it.

0914223505000770--.name: And just where in that full bag are you going to put it? You need to part with some of that junk.

0914223505000771--.name: Just give him the leaf. He'll know what it means.

0914223505000772--.name:
This... This is my favorite snack... Despite how he acts, $npc:11001142[gender:0]$ is so thoughtful.
<font color="#909090">(He starts to cry.)</font>

0914223505000773--.name: I'm sad that I won't get to see my friend often, but... I'm really glad to be leaving things on a good note.

0915024505000774--.name: You might not believe it, but I used to be good friends with the $npcPlural:21091166$. They never used to be violent.

0915024505000775--.name: I'm sure that the $npcPlural:21091166$ are being controlled by an evil spirit. One day the earth shook and a dark shadow covered the forest, and then the $npcPlural:21091166$... changed.

0915024505000776--.name: And ever since they attack anyone who comes near them.

0915024505000777--.name: Inside, I can hear them crying. They long to be free of the evil controlling them.

0915024505000778--.name: There is only one way to help $npcPlural:21091166$, and it breaks my heart. You must destroy their bodies so their spirits can be free.

0915024505000780--.name: My friends are finally free from their pain... I would like to be alone now.

0915024505000781--.name: Everything in the forest started transforming after the toys arrived.

0915024505000782--.name: At first everyone wanted to play with them. We'd never seen anything like them.

0915024505000783--.name: But then they started changing... Their bodies hardened, and they forgot how to feel. Before long, they became lifeless toys themselves.

0915024505000784--.name: I'm sure those toys were the source of all this pain and devastation. The forest will never be restored until they are destroyed.

0915024505000785--.name: There are some who went near the toys but weren't affected. No one knows why.

0915024505000786--.name: I don't want the forest to change anymore. I want the grass to grow and the butterflies and animals to run free!

0916022405000803--.name: Hey! Don't be so quick to walk away! What's the big hurry?

0916022405000805--.name: No, no, you misunderstand. I may not look it, but I am a great fortune teller. And I see a great fortune within you!

0916022405000806--.name: I really don't have any money.

0916022405000807--.name: I'm not interested in money, pup!

0916022405000808--.name: Fortune telling is fun for me, so you don't have to pay me a single meso for this. So just relax and listen, will you?

0916022405000809--.name: It wouldn't hurt to try, after all! This will be a blast. Trust me.

0916022405000811--.name: I see that you've experienced great suffering in your past...

0916022405000813--.name: No, I've had it pretty easy.

0916022405000814--.name: But you have the glint of destiny in your eye. You have a noble future. In time, you will be rewarded for your suffering!

0916022405000815--.name: Okay, but what about my fortune?

0916022405000816--.name: Yes, I can see it in your face. And you still have much suffering before you. A terrible future... but keep fighting, and one day you will have your reward.

0916022405000817--.name: Okay, but what about my fortune?

0916022405000818--.name: Ah, and you have a positive personality! Even when you suffer, you see the hope and possibility in life. Truly, a noble soul...

0916022405000819--.name: Okay, but what about my fortune?

0916022405000820--.name: You cannot hide the past from me! I see it in your eyes. Many blows at the hands of monsters. Falls from great places. Unexpected wedgies. These things are all suffering, pup!

0916022405000822--.name: Love. Life. Items. What would you like to know about?

0916022405000823--.name: Is there any romance in my future?

0916022405000825--.name: I want to know about items!

0916022405000829--.name: You are destined to hunt all day today. But if you buy a new outfit and wander around $map:02000064$, there's a slight chance for you to meet someone special.

0916022405000831--.name: Let's see. Oh... you're destined to meet your lover on the wings of $npc:23000020[gender:1]$! Don't back down if you come face-to-beak with a big bird!

0916022405000833--.name: You should go to $map:02000107$ first thing today. This is all I can tell you.

0916022405000835--.name: Go adventuring in a party today! Your soul mate is looking for adventure, too.

0916022405000837--.name: Don't be afraid of getting tombstoned today. Your soul mate will break your tombstone!

0916022405000839--.name: Beware of anyone strong enough to carry their house on their back. That doesn't mean you should avoid them, of course! Just be sure to carry enough potions.

0916022405000841--.name: Don't put all of your faith in $skill:20000021$. What goes up, must come down.

0916022405000843--.name: Beware of monsters wearing flowers on their heads. Also beware of monsters with flowers on their backs!

0916022405000845--.name: If you face a big monster, you might get tombstoned if you don't have enough potions. So always be sure to carry more than enough!

0916022405000847--.name: Don't let $npc:23000021$ blow you off his perch. It's a long drop down!

0916022405000849--.name: Don't underestimate weak monsters. If you aren't paying attention at the wrong moment, you'll find yourself smooshed under a tombstone. If you have to zone out, do it at a healing spot!

0916022405000851--.name: Oh no... I'm out of... fortune-reading... energy...

0916022405000853--.name: Be sure to bring plenty of $itemPlural:40100023$ next time you go to $npc:11000508[gender:1]$. Your persistence is laudable!

0916022405000855--.name: How can this be? Behind you, I see a purple light... No, an orange light. And now it's blue...!

0916022405000857--.name: Your clothes are pretty shabby. It's time to get some new clothes. Believe me, I know all about shabby clothes.

0916022405000859--.name: Don't be greedy. Luck comes to those with a clear mind! Your day could end as a normal day... or it could turn out amazing!

0916022405000861--.name: Swallow thrice. Wave at a stranger thrice. Do not go hunting today until you've done so!

0916022405000863--.name: Do you want to know more about your fortune?

0916022405000865--.name: I think that's enough for one day.

0916022405000866--.name: Then I wish you luck as you face the day. As promised, this reading was completely free.

1020152905000890--.name: You ever hear of Dingulele Island? The people there climb everywhere, and I mean everywhere. You better believe they've got a killer grip!

1020152905000891--.name: I bet it's good exercise, too. Why don't you give it a try?

1020152905000892--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020152905000893--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000894--.name: You ever hear of the Barbar? Their warriors aren't afraid of nothing. Heck, they go play in tiger dens just for fun!

1020155405000895--.name: That's pretty scary, but not as scary as the Land of Darkness. You'd have to be real brave to go there!

1020155405000896--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000897--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually go there! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000898--.name: Most folks don't know this, but birds have a whole lot to say. Next time you hitch a ride on one, you should try saying hello!

1020155405000899--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000900--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000901--.name: The people of Fergina Island are giants. How'd they get so tall? Simple. They jump everywhere, and it makes their bodies stretch out!

1020155405000902--.name: It really works, too. Try it if you don't believe me!

1020155405000903--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000904--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000905--.name: I met all kinds of great warriors and adventurers on the road, but if you're talking raw strength, then the strongest I ever met was a guy who spent all day long hanging from a ladder. I guess it's just a really good workout!

1020155405000906--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000907--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000908--.name: The $male:guys,female:ladies$ of Syrecuse Island really know how to flirt. Did you know they hang from ropes to get cute singles to notice them?

1020155405000909--.name: You look desperate and lonely. You should try it!

1020155405000910--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000911--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000912--.name: Water is the source of life! At least, that's what the people on Seesunni Island say. They love swimming so much, they never get out of the water!

1020155405000913--.name: They say it awakens the spirit and cleanses the soul. Don't you think your soul could use a little cleansing?

1020155405000914--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000915--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000916--.name: Did you know that grass grows better after you stomp on it? It's because getting stomped on gives the grass extra determination to get really, really tall!

1020155405000917--.name: You should try it. Go stomp on some grass!

1020155405000918--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000919--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000920--.name: We Allicari are great sailors, but even the best sailor wrecks sometimes. That's why we gotta be good swimmers, too!

1020155405000921--.name: Swimming's like riding a bike. If you don't practice every day, you forget how to do it forever. Are you a good swimmer?

1020155405000922--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000923--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1020155405000924--.name: I've gone on hunting trips with the famous hunters of Murubemog Island. Really! Did you know they'll follow a monster for miles crawling on their bellies, just so they don't get spotted?

1020155405000925--.name: The monster doesn't know it's being followed, and before they know what's going on, it's been hunted! Amazing, right?

1020155405000926--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1020155405000927--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000928--.name: I wonder what this place is like? I want to explore every nook and cranny, but I feel bad leaving $npcName:11001179[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001180[gender:1]$ behind every time I wander off...

1021194405000929--.name: I heard about these telescopes you can use to look around. I wonder if they're any good?

1021194405000930--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000931--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000932--.name: Are there really golden treasure chests hidden all over this island? Why would someone leave so much treasure lying around?

1021194405000933--.name: If you can get great treasures just by searching around, why would anyone want to buy stuff from us? This'll ruin the business! We've gotta snatch up those treasures before it's too late!

1021194405000934--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000935--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000936--.name: There's a rumor about a magical hat that sometimes appears out in the world. Instead of putting it on your head, you jump in, and it takes you to an ice mage. Or a potion factory! Or somewhere even crazier!

1021194405000937--.name: Have you ever visited such a place? It sounds wondrous!

1021194405000938--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000939--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually go there! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000940--.name: This's never happened to me, but if you ever get pinned under a metal tombstone, not even your friends will be able to bust you out. That's why you got to see the doctor right away if you ever get pinned under a normal tombstone.

1021194405000941--.name: $npc:11000273[gender:0]$'s supposed to be a good doctor. You ever visit him?

1021194405000942--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000943--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually go there! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000944--.name: This's never happened to me, but if you ever get pinned under a metal tombstone, not even your friends will be able to bust you out. That's why you got to see the doctor right away if you ever get pinned under a normal tombstone.

1021194405000945--.name: $npc:11000274[gender:0]$'s supposed to be a good doctor. You ever visit him?

1021194405000946--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000947--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually go there! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000948--.name: One of the first things we do when we come to a new place is find the local bank.

1021194405000949--.name: I was using $map:02000034$, since it's close, but I heard good things about $map:02000155$... Think it's worth checking out?

1021194405000950--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000951--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually go there! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000952--.name: My hobby is clapping. Who doesn't like to clap? The problem is, I need to find just the right place to do it!

1021194405000953--.name: I hear there's a place where people are clapping every day. I want you to check it out. It's some kind of hall for weddings, I think.

1021194405000954--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000955--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually go there! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000956--.name: Do you ever feel totally freaked out about life? Y'know, about how meaningless it all is? Whenever I feel like that, I like to walk through some big cities. It really helps take my mind off things!

1021194405000957--.name: I hear there are lots of big cities on Victoria Island. Do you ever walk their streets?

1021194405000958--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000959--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually go there! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000960--.name: When I was really little, we stopped at an island that was being used as a prison colony. Seeing what life's like for those criminals scared the heck out of me! Isn't there a place like that for Victoria Island? $map:02000062$?

1021194405000961--.name: It's good to see what happens to bad people. It reminds us to be honest.

1021194405000962--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000963--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually go there! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1021194405000964--.name: What do you think prison guards do with old prison clothes? They probably just throw them away, right?

1021194405000965--.name: Hey, I bet if you dug through their trash cans, you'd be able to find a prison outfit and wear it around town. That'd be great!

1021194405000966--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1021194405000967--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205000968--.name: Wooden treasure chests sure look plain. Still, I hear that whoever opens one gets to keep what's inside.

1023201205000969--.name: Most people just run right past them. They don't expect anything good from an old, beat-up treasure chest, after all.

1023201205000970--.name: But just because they don't want what's inside, that doesn't mean you don't want it! Why, there could actually be something really good in there!

1023201205000971--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205000972--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205000973--.name: This one time, we stopped at Suncham Island, where everybody runs all day long. I got exhausted just watching them.

1023201205000974--.name: If we ever go back, I'm going to bring a boatload of running shoes. I bet they'd sell real well. Do you like running?

1023201205000975--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205000976--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205000977--.name: You won't believe this, but one time we visited an island with these yellow cars called 'taxis.' The people of the island ride the taxis all over the place. They never walk anywhere! Isn't that amazing?

1023201205000978--.name: They were so fast and convenient! I wish we had taxis here...

1023201205000979--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205000980--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205000981--.name: Whenever I see someone ride a mount, I think of Parda Island. The folks there sure hated walking!

1023201205000982--.name: It wasn't a problem for them, 'cause everyone had a mount. The moms and dads, the grandmas and grandpas—even the little babies had mounts.

1023201205000983--.name: If you ever get sick of walking, you should give riding a try. It's way better than using your own stupid feet to get around!

1023201205000984--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205000985--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205000986--.name: The world's full of beautiful sights to see, if you just open your eyes.

1023201205000987--.name: The best way to use your eyes is with a telescope, of course. It's so nice that there are telescopes all over this island for people like me to take in the scenery.

1023201205000988--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205000989--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205000990--.name: The main reason I joined the Allicari was to see the world! Well, that and my parents made me.

1023201205000991--.name: When I'm scared or angry, nothing makes me feel better than looking out over the ocean. I do that, and all my worries just melt away.

1023201205000992--.name: You look like someone who's had a rough time. If you ever feel down, why don't you take a trip to the beach and look at the water through a telescope?

1023201205000993--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205000994--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205000995--.name: When I first started out, I'd always be dazzled by the shiny lights and the tall buildings whenever we reached a big city.

1023201205000996--.name: As I got older, I started noticing other things. The homeless people on the streets. The smell of the sewers. The rats fighting over an empty can of pop and thirteen mesos. It makes you wonder what else you miss when you don't look closely...

1023201205000997--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205000998--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205000999--.name: Is there really baba fruit in the Land of Darkness? The people on Herere Island use that stuff to cure itchy bug bites. They'll pay out the nose for it, since it doesn't grow naturally on their island!

1023201205001000--.name: Bring me some of that fruit and we'll hit the big time!

1023201205001001--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205001002--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually get this for me! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205001003--.name: They say that golden treasure chests are hard to find. Hmph.

1023201205001004--.name: I could find a golden treasure chest with one arm tied behind my back. Maybe the people of this land are bad at looking for things?

1023201205001005--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205001006--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1023201205001007--.name: I liked this place when I first got here, but now, I've gotta say that I'm not too happy to be here. Why are there monsters squatting in all of this island's dungeons?

1023201205001008--.name: I'm definitely going to tell all my friends not to come here. It's just too dangerous. Some one should do something about all those evil beasties.

1023201205001009--.name: Someone strong. Someone with really great weapons. Someone who can't resist doing everything anyone asks of $male:him,female:her$...

1023201205001010--.name: I may be a kid, but I bet I've seen more of the world than you!

1023201205001011--.name: I was only joking. I didn't think you'd actually do it! Well, here's a gift for giving me such a good laugh.

1228034005001070--.name: I don't believe we've met. You weren't thinking of going over to pet the $npcNamePlural:21000392$ and $npcNamePlural:21000400$, were you?

1228034005001071--.name: They may look cute, but don't be fooled. They will bite you without a second thought, and bite you again without a third! And their venom will leave you on the brink of death!

1228034005001072--.name: Most of the adults here know well enough to keep their distance. The children... not so much.

1228034005001073--.name: Every other week, it seems some new family moves here only to have their darling babies bitten by snakes. All because the snakes are so adorable...

1228034005001074--.name: I recently heard a child's cries from $npcName:11001456[gender:1]$'s house. I told them to gather some $itemPlural:30000505$ and put them on the child's bite wound.

1228034005001075--.name: Unfortunately, I forgot an important detail... the $itemPlural:30000505$ must be chewed by a snake to be effective.

1228034005001076--.name: We could use another pair of strong arms to help, if you're willing. $npcNamePlural:21000392$ and $npcNamePlural:21000400$ love to chew the stuff, so you could get the $itemPlural:30000505$ directly from them.

1228034005001077--.name: $npcNamePlural:21000392$ and $npcNamePlural:21000400$ practically chew $itemPlural:30000505$ like it's gum.

1228034005001078--.name: My husband went out to look for $itemPlural:30000505$, but he hasn't returned yet. Meanwhile, our poor child...

1228034005001079--.name: Thank you! I'll use this on my poor dear right away.

1228034005001080--.name: My husband is still out there, looking for $itemPlural:30000505$. But we don't need any more petals...

1228034005001081--.name: I have to stay here and watch our child. Could you go find my husband for me?

1228034005001082--.name: He won't be hard to find. Even in this weather, he never takes off his lab coat.

1228034005001083--.name: Please let him know that we don't need any more $itemPlural:30000505$. All we need is him back home, safe and sound.

1228034005001084--.name: I'm relieved you were able to help my family. I don't think I'm cut out for this $item:30000505$-gathering business...

1228034005001085--.name: I'm a geologist, here to study unique rock formations. Did you know that Karkar Island and Victoria Island used to be the same continent?

1228034005001086--.name: That's the theory, anyway. There's plenty of evidence to back it up here on this island, and I'm going to gather it.

1228034005001087--.name: Which reminds me... There's a telescope up there. I can't reach it, but it's in the perfect vantage point for me to get the lay of the land.

1228034005001088--.name: Hey, do you think you could get up there? Just pop on up, peek through the telescope, and tell me what sort of rocks you see.

1228034005001089--.name: It's too bad I don't have the $skill:20000021$ skill...

1228034005001090--.name: So, what did you see? Were there any basalt formations?

1228034005001094--.name: I know basalt when I see it, and that was basalt!

1228034005001096--.name: There's no record of volcanic activity here. For there to be volcanic rock... Was it scattered?

1228034005001099--.name: You're not sure? I guess I'd better find a way to see it for myself...

1228034005001100--.name: You! You made eye contact with me! That means you have to talk to me now.

1228034005001102--.name: Hmph. Stupid question. I'm waiting for you to take out your wallet. You can put your donation right in this tin can here.

1228034005001103--.name: Do you always do your begging in construction zones?

1228034005001104--.name: Trying to steal old Monliver's trade secrets, are you? If it'll get you to cough up some cash, then sure, I'll tell you.

1228034005001105--.name: You know what they're building here? A race track. And then this place will be crawling with filthy rich tourists. I've got to get my spot now, before the other beggars move in!

1228034005001106--.name: Heck, there are already looky-loos here to check out the construction. You, for example. I can't let primo real estate like this go to the lesser beggars.

1228034005001107--.name: I'll have it made with this spot. Or I would, if those robot workers weren't trying to drive me off. I squatted here fair and square!

1228034005001108--.name: Don't they know who I am? My brother is $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$, the very guy who's building this race track!

1228034005001109--.name: If only my business hadn't gone belly up... Argh, that's beside the point! Look, if you're not going to cough up some mesos, the least you could do is tell those robots to leave me alone.

1228034005001110--.name: Doesn't my tin can look lonely?

1228034005001111--.name: I owe you one. Here. Honest pay for honest work.

1228034005001112--.name: Oh, no, it's too much. I can't accept that.

1228034005001113--.name: What, you're too good to work for me? I ran an honest business, and I won't stop now just because I'm a beggar!

1228034005001114--.name: What's taking these lazy workers so long? They started construction ages ago...

1228034005001115--.name: They need to finish this place and put the cherry on top so it can start drawing in the tourists! Don't they know I'm starving out here? My brother's really dropping the ball here.

1228034005001116--.name: Go complain to the manager for me. And demand an estimate for when they'll finish!

1228034005001117--.name: I'd go myself, but they started ignoring me after the... incident...

1228034005001118--.name: This can won't fill itself, you know!

1228034005001119--.name: Listen, I'd love to tell you when construction'll be done, but it's no good hurrying a job like this.

1228034005001120--.name: I won't risk the lives of my men just to get the races started a few days early. Especially not for a total stranger!

1228034005001121--.name: Now that you mention it, $npcName:11001468[gender:0]$ is late with his status report...

1228034005001122--.name: Look, if you want to know how things are going, ask $npcName:11001468[gender:0]$ for his report. Why do you care, anyway?

1228034005001123--.name: I can't wait to see the races. Vroom vroom!

1228034005001124--.name: Ah, a car racing... fanatic. Great. Well, go bother $npcName:11001468[gender:0]$.

1228034005001125--.name: I could take a nap today... But that's what I did yesterday...

1228034005001126--.name: Hmph... What does $npcName:11001467[gender:0]$ suddenly want a report for?

1228034005001127--.name: Tell him things are going nice and slow, just like we planned.

1228034005001129--.name: Your answer didn't exactly fill me with confidence.

1228034005001130--.name: Hey, $male:buddy,female:lady$, I already answered one question for you today. Keep this up, and it'll start to feel like work...

1228034005001131--.name: If you're gonna hassle me about this, I guess I can check the $item:30000506$. Thing is, I gave my copy to one of the robot workers. You may have to rough 'em up a little to get it back...

1228034005001133--.name: Who are you, anyway? The boss wouldn't ask for a report out of the blue on his own. You working $npc:11001350[gender:0]$?

1228034005001134--.name: I'm just a fan who's eager to see the races.

1228034005001135--.name: Well, why didn't you say so from the beginning? Look, friend, if you want to see some fast-paced racing action, you... are going to have to wait a long time.

1228034005001136--.name: The second construction wraps up, we're out of a job. Most of us have families. You want to see us on the street?

1228034005001137--.name: $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$ just wants to sell more oil. That's why he funded this whole track.

1228034005001138--.name: But he lost interest in us. He lost interest in the whole area. If he's not going to look out for us, we got to look out for ourselves.

1228034005001139--.name: Don't tell anyone else, okay? The only reason I told you this much is 'cause you're such a die-hard racing fan.

1228034005001140--.name: You just follow my lead, and you'll be rolling in dough. How about it?

1228034005001142--.name: Oh, I'm on the level, friend. You know my brother, $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$? He's the richest man on Karkar Island!

1228034005001144--.name: Listen, just because that brat kicked me out for swindl—I m-mean, my brother and I get along great. Best friends, practically!

1228034005001145--.name: Just hear me out. I may not look like much, but I know how to turn a profit.

1228034005001146--.name: Do exactly what I say and don't ask any questions. Run along the bridge and beat up some robot workers on the way.

1228034005001147--.name: Stick with me, and we'll be on easy street in no time.

1228034005001148--.name: Good work! Don't ask me how, but we're already turning a profit. Here's your share.

1228034005001149--.name: Now that you're my business partner, I guess I better get you up to speed. This bridge here? Even though it's in terrible shape, it only went up last year.

1228034005001150--.name: The one spot that's in good shape is already starting to fall apart again. And I know why!

1228034005001151--.name: You aren't the only one running around and jumping on the bridge. I send everyone I talk to out that way. It makes the bridge nice and shaky, and before you know it, the city's in a panic trying to fix it.

1228034005001152--.name: On a good day, I'll have a bunch of people jump on the same side all at once. That really makes the place rumble and shake!

1228034005001153--.name: My brother paid for this bridge to be built, but I got the contracts for maintenance and repair before he kicked me to the curb. Every hour of repair work is another stack of mesos in my pocket.

1228034005001154--.name: I make a pretty penny, and I poke a stick in my brother's eye at the same time. Is there anything better?

1228034005001155--.name: Oh, and get a load of this—I took out a huge insurance policy on all the robot workers, so every destroyed robot also greases my palms.

1228034005001156--.name: You want in on this racket? Wreck some more robots for me. Don't worry—the insurance company that's paying me is also owned by my rat of a brother!

1228034005001157--.name: Nobody needs to know who's the one breaking all the robots. Got it?

1228034005001158--.name: I knew you were a stand-up $male:guy,female:gal$ when I first saw you. Anyone gives you trouble, you send them to me, all right?

1228034005001159--.name: Whoa! You scared me! Did you see? There was a ghost running along the bridge!

1228034005001160--.name: You got a death wish, kid? What are you doing here?

1228034005001161--.name: I came to see the evil dragon! Or the ghosts of the workers... Or the ghost of the evil dragon? I can't remember exactly what the rumors said...

1228034005001163--.name: The ones about the bridge! There's got to be a reason for the weird fog in the middle, right?

1228034005001164--.name: And the bridge is slowly sinking. They say that an evil dragon is dragging it down to the underworld. But I also heard that it's because of the ghosts of workers who died building it...

1228034005001165--.name: I'm pretty sure I saw a ghost running around earlier. Hey, I bet you could see everything if you climbed up to the tippy top of the bridge support in the middle! But I'm too scared to do it myself...

1228034005001166--.name: You do it instead. Just don't let the dragon get you, okay?

1228034005001170--.name: No dragons? No ghosts? Maybe they're taking today off. Dang...

1228034005001171--.name: This place is a trap. We were too blinded by our paychecks to see it...

1228132105001201--.name: What do you mean by that?

1228034005001172--.name: Me and $npcName:11001401[gender:0]$ came out here to earn some easy money. The deepest pockets in $map:02010002$ are funding this construction, you know? But it's hard to get workers in a place like this, so they kept raising the salary.

1228034005001173--.name: Lately, the robot workers started acting up. There's too many of them, and they're getting... violent. But we can't just cut and run.

1228132105001202--.name: If we just run away, we won't get paid. But $npcName:11001401[gender:0]$ doesn't care about that anymore. He was so desperate to get away, he climbed up the bridge support.

1228132105001203--.name: And now he's stuck. The idiot must be afraid of heights... He loves $itemPlural:30000507$, so I'm hoping a few might calm his nerves.

1228132105001204--.name: There are supply packages near here. If you dig through them, I'm sure you'll find some $itemPlural:30000507$. Please bring them to $npcName:11001401[gender:0]$.

1228034005001174--.name: I'll be happy to get out with my life...

1228034005001175--.name: Wh-what are you doing? Trying to trap me?

1228034005001176--.name: These apples... $npcName:11001400[gender:0]$ sent you, didn't he? Thanks.

1228034005001177--.name: I feel better now. I'm ready to climb back down, but first I have a request.

1228034005001178--.name: The robots used to be our buddies, but now they're threatening to wipe out my real buddies. Please do something about them.

1228034005001179--.name: When you're done, let $npcName:11001400[gender:0]$ know that I'm okay. And ask him if he's changed his mind about my idea. He'll know what you mean.

1228034005001180--.name: This way? No, no, that would have been bad.

1228034005001181--.name: That idiot... $npcName:11001401[gender:0]$'s idea is another get-rich-quick scheme.

1228034005001182--.name: He wants to go look for $npcName:11001381[gender:0]$... But this isn't the time for that kind of thing. Right now, we need to get to safety.

1228034005001183--.name: Persuasive argument: check. Inflated income projections: check. But still, there's something missing... Ah, a dynamic photo!

1228034005001184--.name: This business plan needs to be convincing. A lot of the locals aren't so happy with the idea of turning their dusty desert into a modernized paradise, but if I can get a picture that really shows off $map:02010036$, I'm sure I can win them over.

1228034005001185--.name: Take this camera and get some great shots for me, will you? Just climb to the top of $map:02010036$ and let your artistic vision take over. While you're at it, defeat any monsters who get in your way.

1228134505001220--.name: I found the $item:30000511$ lying on the ground. I can't believe you dropped it...

1228134505001221--.name: I'm sure I saw you shove it into your bag earlier!

1228134505001222--.name: I found it lying on the ground. I can't believe you dropped it... And now you don't have room in your bag to take it back!

1228134505001223--.name: Go take the picture. Quickly now!

1228034005001187--.name: With this picture, the business plan is unbeatable. Just have to find the right spot for it...

1228034005001188--.name: If this works out, we'll have you to thank for some small part of it. If there's anything you need in the future, feel free to ask me.

1228034005001189--.name: Finally, my $item:30000509$ is finished! We'll start by showing it to $npc:11001386[gender:0]$. If he agrees, then getting the other locals on board will be a cinch.

1228034005001190--.name: Before we start constructions, we need the villagers to clear the area. But there are a lot of them, and they're not all keen to move...

1228034005001191--.name: Will you take the $item:30000509$ to $npcName:11001386[gender:0]$? Not that I'm worried for my safety, of course.

1228132105001207--.name: I found the $item:30000509$ lying on the ground. I can't believe you dropped it...

1228132105001208--.name: I'm sure I saw you shove it into your bag earlier!

1228132105001209--.name: I found it lying on the ground. I can't believe you dropped it... And now you don't have room in your bag to take it back!

1228034005001193--.name: So, this is the $item:30000509$ I've been waiting for. That was faster than I thought.

1228034005001194--.name: $npcName:11001381[gender:0]$ is efficient. Thank you for delivering it.

1228034005001195--.name: Do I have to read this whole thing? I'm sure everything's in order. Well, let's see...

1228034005001196--.name: Words... Words... Words... Ah, a picture! And a pretty one, too.

1228034005001197--.name: Here's the $item:30000510$ for our investor in $map:02010036$. His name is... $npcName:11001382[gender:0]$, I believe.

1228132105001213--.name: I found the $item:30000510$ lying on the ground.

1228132105001214--.name: I could have sworn you had it earlier...

1228132105001215--.name: I found it lying on the ground. I'd give it back to you, but your bag's full.

1228132105001216--.name: I see. I was wondering what happened.

1228034005001199--.name: Now that I have the $item:30000510$, we can get to business.

1228034005001200--.name: What do you have to do with this, anyway? Not planning to nose in on our business, I hope.

0106232405001233--.name: The best part of coming to market is meeting new friends! And it is good to see you, new friend.

0106232405001234--.name: Don't you think the people in this extravagant city look stiff? They are surrounded by many luxurious things, and yet they find no joy in life. Perhaps someone should teach them how to have fun, no?

0106232405001235--.name: Let us get to work. And by work, I mean play! Why don't you try climbing the walls?

0106232405001237--.name: Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!

0106232405001238--.name: The best part of coming to market is meeting new friends! And it is good to see you, new friend.

0106232405001239--.name: Don't you think the people in this extravagant city look stiff? They are surrounded by many luxurious things, and yet they find no joy in life. Perhaps someone should teach them how to have fun, no?

0106232405001240--.name: Let us get to work. And by work, I mean play! Why don't you try flying through the air?

0106232405001242--.name: Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!

0106232405001243--.name: The best part of coming to market is meeting new friends! And it is good to see you, new friend.

0106232405001245--.name: Let us get to work. And by work, I mean play! Why don't you try crawling around?

0106232405001247--.name: Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!

0106232405001248--.name: The best part of coming to market is meeting new friends! And it is good to see you, new friend.

0106232405001250--.name: Let us get to work. And by work, I mean play! Why don't you go for a dip?
