0106232405001253--.name: The best part of coming to market is meeting new friends! And it is good to see you, new friend.

0106232405001254--.name: Don't you think the people in this extravagant city look stiff? They are surrounded by many luxurious things, and yet they find no joy in life. Perhaps someone should teach them how to have fun, no?

0106232405001255--.name: Let us get to work. And by work, I mean play! Why don't you go for a ride on your mount?

0106232405001257--.name: Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!

0106232405001258--.name: The best part of coming to market is meeting new friends! And it is good to see you, new friend.

0106232405001259--.name: Don't you think the people in this extravagant city look stiff? They are surrounded by many luxurious things, and yet they find no joy in life. Perhaps someone should teach them how to have fun, no?

0106232405001260--.name: Let us get to work. And by work, I mean play! Why don't you gaze at the desert through a telescope?

0106232405001262--.name: Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!

0106232405001263--.name: The best part of coming to market is meeting new friends! And it is good to see you, new friend.

0106232405001264--.name: Don't you think the people in this extravagant city look stiff? They are surrounded by many luxurious things, and yet they find no joy in life. Perhaps someone should teach them how to have fun, no?

0106232405001265--.name: Let us get to work. And by work, I mean play! Why don't you start by sprinting without any particular destination in mind?

0106232405001267--.name: Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!

0106232405001268--.name: The best part of coming to market is meeting new friends! And it is good to see you, new friend.

0106232405001375--.name: What do you say to becoming an action hero? It will be a thrilling escape from the everyday humdrums! Do you know that the darkest moment of the day is when the moon wanes and the sun rises?

0106232405001376--.name: In that moment, $npcName:24002005$ speaks an incantation to throw the world into darkness! Go to $map:02010054$ and stop these evil shenanigans!

0106232405001385--.name: What do you say to becoming an action hero? It will be a thrilling escape from the everyday humdrums! There are plenty of evil-doers in Karkar Island who need to be put in their place.

0106232405001386--.name: A hero cannot take even the smallest threat lightly. Round up those monsters for the sake of the local villagers!

0106232405001388--.name: Marvelous! You, my new friend, are a master of the art of fun!

0323144205001429--.name: Ahh, you scared me! I thought you were one of the those onion-tops. Are they still out there?

0323144205001431--.name: Damn it. Those dirty ground-dwellers won't leave me alone. And all this because something I said when I thought no one was listening.

0323144205001433--.name: I just said "I absolutely love frying onions, I'd fry them all up if I could." Don't look at me like that! I meant regular onions, not gross onion-people who walk on two legs.

0323144205001434--.name: Listen, I haven't eaten in hours and staring at all those onion-folk is making me hungry. Do me a favor and drive them away, will you?

0323144205001435--.name: I think I'm gonna pass out... How much longer do I need to hide here?

0323144205001436--.name: You know, I'm gonna have to ask for a refund for that invisibility potion, considering how easily you found me.

0323144205001437--.name: Oh! Did you drive the onions away? Whew, now I can finally relax.

0323144205001438--.name: So, after you got rid of all those smelly onions, I decided to rest my eyes for a moment and ended up falling asleep. Then I wake up to find they've all come back.

0323144205001439--.name: So instead of collecting $npc:11000285[gender:0]$'s tears like I came here to do in the first place, I'm stuck here hiding from those stupid sprout-heads.

0323144205001440--.name: What do you need $npc:11000285[gender:0]$'s tears for?

0323144205001441--.name: Well, I'd be happy to tell you. That is if you don't mind getting some for me.

0323144205001442--.name: Tell me, and I'll think about it.

0323144205001443--.name: Hmph, fine. There's this huge cooking competition coming up, and as an aspiring chef, it's a great way to get my name out there.

0323144205001444--.name: So I'm preparing a special dish for the judges, boiled in the spring waters which are supposedly made up of $npc:11000285[gender:0]$'s tears.

0323144205001445--.name: Rumor is, people will fall in love with any dish cooked in the spring water. I know it doesn't sound that likely, but I'll do whatever it takes to win!

0323144205001447--.name: Great! Here's a bottle. Go over to the spring $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ and fill it up with water.

0323144205001451--.name: Ugh, you're as clumsy as a sprout-head. Lucky for you I brought an extra. Don't lose it this time.

0323144205001452--.name: I'm sure I saw you shove it into your bag earlier!

0323144205001453--.name: Are you kidding? There's no room in your bag.

0323144205001454--.name: The trick to a good onion stew is to catch them while they're young. Err... I mean, pick them while they're fresh.

0323144205001455--.name: You got it? Awesome, thanks! Now all I need to do is harvest some onions at peak freshness, and I'll be ready to cook an award-winning dish.

0323144205001456--.name:
What a fruitless journey...
<font color="#909090">(She sighs.)</font>

0323144205001458--.name: I ventured here from afar to meet with $npc:11000285[gender:0]$, and beseech him to aid me in a matter of the heart.

0323144205001460--.name: In my town there are whispers on the wind that $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ can salvage even the most hopeless case of unrequited love. Though vast oceans and treacherous mountains bocked my path, I persevered and made it here.

0323144205001461--.name: But when I finally spoke with $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ he said there was nothing he could do to assist me, and requested that I leave.

0323144205001463--.name: $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ told me that he holds no power over love but that, if it was truly meant to be, my love would be returned in kind.

0323144205001464--.name: I never expected $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ to grant my wish without receiving anything in return...

0323144205001465--.name: That is why I visited the most prestigious pet store in my land and acquired a generous helping of premium turtle feed. Even so, he refuses to aid me!

0323144205001466--.name: Please, adventurer, won't you try and persuade $npc:11000285[gender:0]$ to change his mind?

0323144205001467--.name: I would not have traveled so far were I not desperate!

0323144205001468--.name: Have you too come to have a wish granted? I'm afraid there's no truth to the rumors.

0323144205001469--.name: Why have you come to see me?

0323144205001471--.name: Ah. Poor girl. I hope that she finds what she is looking for, but there is nothing I can do. After all, I could not even protect my own love.

0323144205001472--.name: I have no special powers. I am merely a lonely widower. All I can do is hope the girl's love is returned.

0323144205001473--.name: Go and tell the girl that I wish to see no more visitors showing up in my spring with turtle feed. It's sad and demeaning for the both of us.

0323144205001474--.name: I am just like any other turtle. This foolish myth was created by those afraid to take responsibility for their own lives.

0323174205001477--.name: To learn this after coming so far... If I cannot have love, then I will have vengeance. I will find the ones responsible for spreading this myth, and destroy them!

1224195911002062-KarkarIsland-.name: Oh dear, where did she disappear to? We're toast if the general finds out...

1224195911002063-KarkarIsland-.name: $MyPCName$... you're level $MyPCLevel$, right? That's plenty strong enough to help out a meerkat in trouble.

1224195911002064-KarkarIsland-.name: <font color="#909090">(Three meerkats stare at you intently. It's a little awkward.)</font>

1224195911002065-KarkarIsland-.name: We're the Meerkat Patrol, and we've always been a three-kat team. But we've had a lot more to do lately, which led us to add a fourth. That's $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$.

1224195911002067-KarkarIsland-.name: I was getting to that! She's gone missing! Since she's new, I wanted to see how she could perform on her own. So I sent her to patrol $map:02010026$... and she never came back.

1224195911002068-KarkarIsland-.name: Wouldn't it be against the rules to give solo orders like that?

1224195911002069-KarkarIsland-.name: Shh! Shh! That's a secret! Don't say that out loud! If the other meerkats tell the leader I did that, I'm done for! That's I need you to look for her in secret.

1224195911002070-KarkarIsland-.name: $MyPCName$, please search $map:02010026$ for any sign of $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$. If I go looking for her myself, it's going to raise all kinds of uncomfortable questions about why $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ was out there alone.

1224195911002071-KarkarIsland-.name: $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ is small but she knows how to make plenty of noise. She really likes flowers, so you might find her admiring the flowerpots out there. $map:02010026$ has tons of flowerpots, if you hadn't noticed.

1224195911002072-KarkarIsland-.name: You're back. Did you find $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$? Where is she?

1224195911002073-KarkarIsland-.name: Nope, all I found was this $item:30000496$.

1224195911002074-KarkarIsland-.name: Huh? This smell... Hm. Thank you, human. That will be all.

1224195911002075-KarkarIsland-.name: What? No, we need to go and rescue $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$!

1224195911002076-KarkarIsland-.name: There's no need for that. She's definitely safe, just laying low somewhere. I just need to figure out what to tell the leader...

1224195911002077-KarkarIsland-.name: How can you say that just from sniffing some fur?

1224195911002078-KarkarIsland-.name: Excuse me? Are you going to humansplain to me about my nose? And my ways? I know by scent that $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ collapsed from illness, and our allies in $map:02010026$ rescued her. So, as I said, that will be all.

1224195911002079-KarkarIsland-.name: What is this, human? Stay out of our affairs. I never took you for such a nosy creature.

1224195911002080-KarkarIsland-.name: But what if $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ was eaten by a monster?

1224195911002081-KarkarIsland-.name: Seriously? How incompetent do you think we are? If anyone ever got eaten on our watch, we'd be disbanded in an instant. I'm telling you, she's safe and sound at the base.

1224195911002082-KarkarIsland-.name: A leader who doesn't look after their followers is no leader.

1224195911002083-KarkarIsland-.name: Good thing I didn't ask you then, human. You simply don't understand our ways. But if you continue to insist on this foolishness, perhaps I can profit from it. I'll make you a bet. I bet my belt that $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ is in $map:02010006$ right now. This is rare silk from $map:02010002$! It's really expensive!

1224195911002085-KarkarIsland-.name: Of course I'm confident. Go to $map:02010006$ and you'll see $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$, completely untouched. We've got $map:02010033$ completely under control.

1224195911002086-KarkarIsland-.name: Isn't that funny? Our all-important base, right there without anyone noticing. Just sitting there, next to a small lake in the desert, hidden beneath the three great trees...

1224195911002087-KarkarIsland-.name: A human? How did you find this place?

1224195911002088-KarkarIsland-.name: I made a bet with $npcName:11001406$, and he spilled the beans.

1224195911002089-KarkarIsland-.name: Wait, you made a bet with a meerkat? Hee hee hee, you're a funny one!

1224195911002090-KarkarIsland-.name: The mighty members of the Meerkat Patrol help keep order on Karkar Island. We gather information about current events and use that to thwart any plots which could disturb the peace.

1224195911002091-KarkarIsland-.name: Yeah, it's great! $npcName:11001406$ seems so proud of the patrol's accomplishments.

1224195911002092-KarkarIsland-.name: Now that you mention it, you made a bet with $npcName:11001406$, didn't you? What's that all about?

1224195911002093-KarkarIsland-.name: Oh, he wanted to bet that $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ is safe and sound at base.

1224195911002094-KarkarIsland-.name: Ah. Well, $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ collapsed in $map:02010026$. Our members found her behind a rose flowerpot and brought her back. She's not in the best shape, but she is safe now. Go see her if you're curious.

1224195911002095-KarkarIsland-.name: Honestly, I'm pretty disappointed in $npcName:11001406$ over this. Sending $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ out alone like that isn't something a responsible leader does. I'm sure $npcName:11001412[gender:1]$ could use some sympathy after her ordeal.

1224195911002098-KarkarIsland-.name: I've definitely been better. I tried to tell the chief I was in pain, but he wouldn't listen. Said it was my duty as a meerkat to support the patrol. Didn't seem to matter that I'd been feeling bad for a week and a half...

1224195911002100-KarkarIsland-.name: It's my stomach. I don't know why, but I can't... y'know... go. To the bathroom.

1224195911002102-KarkarIsland-.name: Thanks. I hope my pipes will finally clear out soon! I should probably get some rest now. Don't be a stranger.

1225192211002158-KarkarIsland-.name: Maple Island? Never heard of it. Is the kid from there too? You know, the girl with the umbrella and the weird thing on her head.

1225192211002159-KarkarIsland-.name: Oh, you must be talking about $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$.

1225192211002160-KarkarIsland-.name: Calibre Island? Never heard of it. Is the kid from there too? You know, the girl with the umbrella and the weird thing on her head.

1225192211002161-KarkarIsland-.name: Oh, you must be talking about $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$.

1225192211002162-KarkarIsland-.name: Whoa there buddy, no need to get steamed. I'm trying to figure out where that girl is from. You know, the one with the umbrella and the weird thing on her head.

1225192211002163-KarkarIsland-.name: Oh, you must be talking about $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$.

1225192211002164-KarkarIsland-.name: So do you know where she is now? Can you get her over here? There's something I want to ask her.

1225192211002165-KarkarIsland-.name: Err, I'm not sure about that...

1225192211002166-KarkarIsland-.name: Well then what are you good for? Fine, you don't want to help, that's up to you. I just want to know more abou that golden aura I felt on her.

1225192211002168-KarkarIsland-.name: You probably already know, but I'm not from around here. I was engulfed by a blinding stream of light, and when it cleared I found myself alone in this place.

1225192211002169-KarkarIsland-.name: What's frustrating is how I can't remember anything. Not even my name. This flower is the only thing that came with me... And it reminds me of a name when I look at it. $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$... Maybe that's my name. Maybe not.

1225192211002170-KarkarIsland-.name: Even without my memories, I want to find a way back to my home. Who knows, that might be the key to remembering everything I've forgotten. And now that you know my secret, I think it's only fair that you help me.

1225192211002171-KarkarIsland-.name: (You can't help but note how sarcastic he sounds.)

1225192211002172-KarkarIsland-.name: Don't misunderstand me. I intend to help you, too. For now, let me direct you to someone even more sarcastic than me. You should talk to the sunset fox, because he was there when I appeared in this world.

1225192211002173-KarkarIsland-.name: I asked him to tell me what happened on that day, but for some reason he's holding out on me. You might have more luck, I think. If he pretends to not understand human language, call him $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$.

1225192211002174-KarkarIsland-.name: If that funky fox pretends he can't understand you, call him $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$. That should get his attention.

1225192211002175-KarkarIsland-.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ is watching you. Just as $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ warned, he's pretending he doesn't understand you.)</font>

1225192211002177-KarkarIsland-.name: What? What is this? Did $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ send you?

1225192211002178-KarkarIsland-.name: What a strange person he is. Why didn't he come talk himself? And what do you want?

1225192211002179-KarkarIsland-.name: What happened the day that $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ appeared?

1225192211002180-KarkarIsland-.name: First of all, it was at night. It was a perfectly normal night, too. But then, the sky started to spin and there was a bright light. The light came down, down, down, like a shooting star.

1225192211002181-KarkarIsland-.name: I was so surprised, I couldn't move. I just stood there and stared. But then the ground started to shake, so I ran over to where the light fell. I found $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$, surrounded by a blue light.

1225192211002182-KarkarIsland-.name: Interesting. Did you notice anything else unusual?

1225192211002183-KarkarIsland-.name: Well... To be honest, everything seemed too clean. No hole, no dirt, no bits of space rock, nothing! If something fell from the night sky, it should leave a hole or bits, right? Whatever happened must have been entirely magical.

1225192211002184-KarkarIsland-.name: I told him all this already, you know. He refused to believe me, I don't know why. At least now he can hear it from someone else. And tell him not to call me that name anymore.

1225192211002185-KarkarIsland-.name: To be fair, it's a really nice name. $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$!

1225192211002186-KarkarIsland-.name: He gave me that name! We sunset foxes live free here in the desert and have no need for names.

1225192211002187-KarkarIsland-.name: There, I said my piece. Go back to $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ and tell him to get over it already.

1225192211002188-KarkarIsland-.name: I see you're back. So, what did $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ say?

1225192211002189-KarkarIsland-.name: You've probably heard this before, but $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ said...

1225192211002190-KarkarIsland-.name: Well, that's more detail than what he told me. I think there might be a clue there...

1225192211002191-KarkarIsland-.name: I didn't have a mark on me that day. And there weren't any traces of whatever brought me here, either. The only clue I have is that blue light that surrounded me.

1225192211002192-KarkarIsland-.name: Something that powerful couldn't have left absolutely no trace. Perhaps the creatures in this area still bear its mark.

1225192211002193-KarkarIsland-.name: Do you see those round things? And the long ones? The round ones are $npcNamePlural:21000645$ and the long ones are $npcNamePlural:21000424$. They hold a lot of food and water in their bodies to help them survive in the desert, and that means they should still be holding clues to my arrival.

1225192211002194-KarkarIsland-.name: I need those clues if I'm ever to have a chance at getting home. Please bring me whatever you can find on those creatures. Or in, I suppose.

1225192211002195-KarkarIsland-.name: Obviously you'll need to beat those creatures down to examine them as closely as is necessary.

1225192211002197-KarkarIsland-.name: I beat up tons of those critters, and didn't find a thing.

1225192211002198-KarkarIsland-.name: That's not such a big deal. One thing I didn't mention was how those monsters stung me when I first ended up here. I was hoping you'd sort them out for me.

1225192211002199-KarkarIsland-.name: You were just using me to get petty revenge?!

1225192211002200-KarkarIsland-.name: No, not really. I'm a big believer in multi-tasking. Now, I have something to show you. A payment, of sorts.

1225192211002201-KarkarIsland-.name: There are plenty of mysteries to unravel in $map:02010047$. More than a few historians have cataloged the clues left behind, and I've gathered as many of their discoveries as I could in my research journal.

1225192211002202-KarkarIsland-.name: I'd very much like to see that.

1225192211002203-KarkarIsland-.name: Of course. I'm bringing it up because I'd like you to review it. The problem is that I've hidden it, and I can't leave this spot while I'm making observations. You'll have to find it yourself, under the table.

1225192211002205-KarkarIsland-.name: If it was that obvious, it wouldn't be hidden, would it? I think you can find something like that.

1225192211002206-KarkarIsland-.name: Just tell me where you hid it.

1225192211002207-KarkarIsland-.name: I'm getting tired of these games!

1225192211002208-KarkarIsland-.name: I have a place where I keep the materials I collect. I call it $map:02010007$. It's some distance from here. Head south and look for the entrance.

1225192211002209-KarkarIsland-.name: I don't play games. I just need to know you can keep up with me. I have a place where I keep the materials I collect. I call it $map:02010007$. It's some distance from here. Head south and look for the entrance.

1225192211002210-KarkarIsland-.name: You can't find $map:02010007$? I suppose I hid it pretty well, then. Head south and look carefully. Don't go too far, it's definitely in $map:02010047$.

1225192211002211-KarkarIsland-.name: Looks like you read it. Do you understand now?

1225192211002212-KarkarIsland-.name: I couldn't read it, let alone understand it!

1225192211002213-KarkarIsland-.name:
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001430[gender:0]$ gives you a gentle look of pity.)</font>
$MyPCName$... You can't read? Shouldn't have paid more attention in school.

1225192211002214-KarkarIsland-.name: It's in a different language, you...!

1225192211002215-KarkarIsland-.name: Oh, right... I wrote it in my language. Guess I can't blame you for that. Hehe. I'll read it to you. Give it here.

1226220411002231-KarkarIsland-.name: This passage was inscribed in an ancient language on the stones here. I witnessed many strange things in the moonlight, and I've written it all down. Are you ready?

1226235211002297-KarkarIsland-.name: "As for the relic, gift of the divine's sacrifice, a benevolent light will remain here for those who must overcome a great crisis."

1226220411002232-KarkarIsland-.name: "The great power is given only to those who are pure, just, and worthy. Those selected must first have inherited the golden memory. They must also recall the value and significance of the noble sacrifice."

1226220411002233-KarkarIsland-.name: "Second, the worthy must understand the great power if they wish to control it. If the worthy cannot nurture the seed of light to blossom in this corrupt world, then the power will be lost. When the seed blossoms, the light shall shine upon a path to another world and permit the worthy to pass on to their just reward. "

1226220411002234-KarkarIsland-.name: Brace yourself, if you dare to approach.

1226220411002235-KarkarIsland-.name: It's obviously about a relic that opens portals.

1226220411002236-KarkarIsland-.name: Spot on. That's what caught my attention when I was doing my research. And that's why I've been searching for someone with a unique wavelength. I've been on their trail, and finally narrowed it down to a certain child with a golden aura. That's $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$, the child you found.

1226220411002237-KarkarIsland-.name: The power surrounding her was entirely different from the others of our world. It might be that of the relic of light... which means if I can tap into it, I might be able to go back.

1226220411002238-KarkarIsland-.name: Since you were with $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$, I thought you would help me turn up some clues. But you turned out to be rather wary of me.

1226220411002239-KarkarIsland-.name: So why the story if you already knew?

1226220411002240-KarkarIsland-.name: I thought you could be my... friend. You have a good heart, and I thought if you heard my story, you'd care about my situation.

1226220411002241-KarkarIsland-.name: Oh! Well, we can be friends if you like.

1226220411002242-KarkarIsland-.name: Fine. Let's be friends. So, friend, can I make a request? $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ needs a favor but I'm busy right now. If you've got the time, maybe you could help $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ in my place?

1226220411002243-KarkarIsland-.name: It won't be hard. $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$'s favors are always really simple. But it's okay if you're busy. Just ask what it is. Thanks, friend.

1226220411002244-KarkarIsland-.name: You. Don't tell me he sent you again. What is it now?

1226220411002245-KarkarIsland-.name: I'm here to do you a favor, in place of $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$.

1226220411002247-KarkarIsland-.name: Did you have any idea what you'd be asked when you agreed to this? Did he explain anything to you, $MyPCName$?

1226220411002248-KarkarIsland-.name: He said it would be simple.

1226220411002249-KarkarIsland-.name: He's my friend, so I'm willing to help with anything.

1226220411002250-KarkarIsland-.name: Right. Well... It is simple. I need someone to water the starflowers that have bloomed all over $map:02010047$. But to do that, you'll have to prepare a few things first.

1226220411002251-KarkarIsland-.name: Start with 5 $itemPlural:30000498$. You can get it by sifting through the purple star sands scattered at the edge of $map:02010047$. Just watch your step. After that, get 10 $itemPlural:30000499$ from $npcName:21000645$ out there. You'll have to check carefully after you defeat each $npcName:21000645$... they don't all carry what we need.

1226220411002252-KarkarIsland-.name: Friend, huh... Yeah, I think I have a general idea of what he told you. Alright, all I need is for you to water the starflowers. Care for them just as you would your beloved friend... just with more water. Oh, and you'll need a few items to do it right.

1226220411002253-KarkarIsland-.name: Start with 5 $itemPlural:30000498$. You can get it by sifting through the purple star sands scattered at the edge of $map:02010047$. Just watch your step. After that, get 10 $itemPlural:30000499$ from $npcName:21000645$ out there. You'll have to check carefully after you defeat each $npcName:21000645$... they don't all carry what we need.

1226220411002254-KarkarIsland-.name: Get $itemPlural:30000498$ from the star sands on the edge of $map:02010047$. Just watch your step. After that, get $itemPlural:30000499$ from $npcName:21000645$ out there. Bring everything back to me once you're done.

1226220411002255-KarkarIsland-.name: Let's see... Yep, that's everything. Heh, is this the power of friendship? On to the next step, then.

1226220411002256-KarkarIsland-.name: Here, this is what I needed those items for. This $item:30000500$ is the perfect tool for brightening up those lonely starflowers.

1226220411002257-KarkarIsland-.name: Come back after you water five lonely starflowers. I'd like the $item:30000500$</font> back when you're done, too.

1226220411002258-KarkarIsland-.name: What's wrong? Is there a problem?

1226220411002260-KarkarIsland-.name: Where can I find these starflowers?

1226220411002261-KarkarIsland-.name: Wow... not cool. I worked hard on that, y'know? Here. I'll give you this spare one. You better not lose this one!

1226220411002262-KarkarIsland-.name: $MyPCName$... Did you check your bag? Even I can tell you still have it. Now, you have work to do.

1226220411002263-KarkarIsland-.name: You really need to straighten up your bag first. I can't give you anything if it's full.

1226220411002264-KarkarIsland-.name: Head a little ways southwest. Remember, you're looking for lonely starflowers, meaning ones that bloom alone. Not the ones in groups of four.

1226220411002265-KarkarIsland-.name: Did you see the lonely starflowers bloom? Nice, isn't it?

1226220411002266-KarkarIsland-.name: Yeah! I never thought the one starflower would become four...

1226220411002267-KarkarIsland-.name: I... what? That's... not possible. Did you do something with $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$ before coming here?

1226220411002268-KarkarIsland-.name: We just shook hands. We're good friends now.

1226220411002269-KarkarIsland-.name: So that's it. He put magic in your hands. $item:30000498$ can't be dug up by anyone, and the $item:30000500$ has an enchantment on it that makes it too heavy for most folks to lift.

1226220411002270-KarkarIsland-.name: But he has magic and can easily use the power of the stars. I told him to water the starflower, but he found a way out of it. That flower he's always holding... It's withering. Maybe because it's from a different land, but nothing could perk it up.

1226220411002271-KarkarIsland-.name: Until that flower is saved, he wasn't willing to help any of the others. I think he wants to return to his home just to save that flower. I guess he can't be that bad of a guy. He must've put the magic in your hands that helped the starflowers bloom.

1226220411002272-KarkarIsland-.name: You really are a good friend to $npcName:11001430[gender:0]$</font>, $MyPCName$. I'd like to count you as a friend as well.

1224195911002138-KarkarIsland-.name: The Meerkat Patrol is always working to improve, both individually and as a team. You see our dashing bronze fur? Underneath that is all muscle.

1224195911002139-KarkarIsland-.name: Is that all muscle in your jowls, too?

1224195911002140-KarkarIsland-.name: Oh, silly human! You still don't understand the meerkat way. Our special training gives us a strong body AND adorable cheeks! It's win-win! You can't tell me you don't want some of this.

1224195911002141-KarkarIsland-.name: Okay, you got me. What's your secret?

1224195911002142-KarkarIsland-.name: The key, as it turns out, is patience. You need the tenacity to see your goals to the end! Time to prove your steady will, human.

1224195911002143-KarkarIsland-.name: Tsk tsk, human. Where is your patience? Surely even you can complete the most basic training! Finish what you started!

1224195911002144-KarkarIsland-.name: How was that? Didn't you feel your muscles awakening? Keep at it, $MyPCName$, and you'll have the lithe body of a meerkat in no time!

1224195911002145-KarkarIsland-.name: We meerkats spend most of our time patrolling and observing from high places. That doesn't mean we're softies, mind you. When things get serious, we have to lay down some serious hurt.

1224195911002146-KarkarIsland-.name: Anyone in the patrol needs to be able to fight, and I'm pretty sure you do too! If you want to train your combat skills, go out to $map:02010033$ and battle the monsters there.

1224195911002147-KarkarIsland-.name: Human, what's taking so long? This is one of our most basic courses. If you can't do this, you can't hope to ever measure up to a meerkat!

1224195911002148-KarkarIsland-.name: Very nice, human! I'm starting to see you differently. As... useful.

1226220411002273-KarkarIsland-.name: One of the valuable skills our meerkats have to master is the art of conversation. Gathering information from the people you talk to is key, no matter who you're dealing with.

1226220411002274-KarkarIsland-.name: There's been a rumor that a ghost has shown up in $map:02010033$. $MyPCName$, I want you to find that ghost and talk to it. Find out everything you can from it. If you bring me enough info from your meeting, you pass this test.

1226220411002275-KarkarIsland-.name: Heh heh... Are you afraid of the ghost? It's fine if you are. I wouldn't expect a human to be as brave as a meerkat. And if you think I'm wrong, maybe you should find yourself a ghost.

1226220411002276-KarkarIsland-.name: Hee hee hee... You've got guts, human. Aren't you scared of me?

1226220411002277-KarkarIsland-.name: Honestly, I think you're a meerkat in a costume.

1226220411002278-KarkarIsland-.name: I'm not scared, I'm angry! Let's fight!

1226220411002279-KarkarIsland-.name: What are you talking about? I'm no meerkat! Look at me, I'm $npcName:11001407[gender:0]$! I'm the great and terrible ghost who conquered this desert, hee hee hee!

1226220411002281-KarkarIsland-.name: Hey, is that a giant eagle coming this way?

1226220411002282-KarkarIsland-.name: Fine! I accept your challenge! What game shall we play?

1226220411002283-KarkarIsland-.name: No games. I want an argument.

1226220411002285-KarkarIsland-.name: Are you even listening? I'm not a meerkat! I'm $npcName:11001407[gender:0]$! How many times do I need to remind you? Hee hee hee!

1226220411002286-KarkarIsland-.name: Hey, is that a giant eagle coming this way?

1226220411002287-KarkarIsland-.name: My, that's a tasty insect in the water there.

1226220411002288-KarkarIsland-.name:
E-eagle? No! I need to hide! Hide me!

<font color="#909090">(Yep, that's definitely a meerkat.)</font>

1226220411002289-KarkarIsland-.name: I'm pretty sure I win this round.

1226220411002290-KarkarIsland-.name: You're such a strange human. Not afraid of ghosts? Not even of a big, spooky ghost in these dark, spooky ruins?

1226220411002292-KarkarIsland-.name: One-legged fight? Hee hee hee... You messed up, human. I never skip leg day! Let's do this!

1226220411002293-KarkarIsland-.name: What exactly does a ghost do on leg day?

1226220411002294-KarkarIsland-.name: Really? Let me have it, then! Ooh, I'm so hungry.

1226220411002296-KarkarIsland-.name: Argh... You're pretty smart for a human. Alright, you got me. I'm a meerkat. And I owe you a reward.

0704155711003078-Striker-.name: Wait, wait, hold the phone... Where the heck did you get this? No wonder $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$ sent you to me... do you even know what you have here? What's the story? Come on, out with it!

0704155711003079-Striker-.name: Well, it all started after I beat $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$...

0704155711003080-Striker-.name: Ah. Ahhhh. So. You tried to purify your prize from defeating $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$, going so far as to use $item:30000421$, but in the end all you had to show for it was cursed junk. Do I have this right?

0704155711003082-Striker-.name: Ha ha ha! Well, it's a good thing you found me. I've been applying a scientific approach to studying the darkness here, treating it as a waveform instead of a force, entity, or some spooky gooey thing like most people assume. The unsettling aura your weapon has here emits a similar frequency to the power of this place. And if that's the case... I might just be able to help you.

0704155711003083-Striker-.name: I'll try to explain as simply as I can, so stop me if all this goes over your head. It's very scientific. Ahem. So, when two power sources meet on the same wavelength, they, uh, get into a little fight, and the big one beats up the little one until it runs home to mommy. Does that make sense?

0704155711003084-Striker-.name: Now, we've established that the weapon and this place have power on the same wavelength. If we could find a way to focus the energy of this place, we could use it to drive out the curse in your weapon and break its seal. The darkness'll run home to mommy, and everyone wins. Sound good?

0704155711003086-Striker-.name: Great! Alright, so, I'll get your weapon ready for the experiment. All I need you to do, is gather up some darkness to mash into this thing.

0704155711003087-Striker-.name: How am I supposed to do that? A net?

0704155711003088-Striker-.name: A net! Ha, that's a good one. Nope, we need to head to $map:02000350$. That's... hmm, how do I explain this... like a faucet of fountain of darkness that the handle broke off of. It's nasty... Long ago, it started to spread near $map:02000023$ and $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ and the fairies were barely able to stop it in time. Even then there were some fairies poisoned by Havi after being in $map:02000350$ too long. Like I said, nasty.

0704155711003089-Striker-.name: Okay, here's where it gets gross. Every day, one $item:59200180$ grows on those poisoned fairies. Inside is something called $item:30000437$, and unfortunately that's what we need. We'll need a bunch, too, if we're going to gather enough darkness to shove the other darkness out of your thing. It's all very technical, you see.

0704155711003090-Striker-.name: Now, there's a way into $map:02000350$ from $map:02000048$. Pass through there, look for $item:59200180$ and get the $item:30000437$ inside. And get a bunch. A whole bunch.

0704155711003091-Striker-.name: The entrance to $map:02000350$ is at $map:02000048$. Pass through and find enough $itemPlural:30000437$ for us to fix your weapon.

0704155711003092-Striker-.name: Yes, perfect! Boy, I've always wanted an assistant like you. Right, okay, I'll get everything ready for the experiment.

0704155711003094-Striker-.name: This goes here... Need one of these... Is that... Yep, extra dark...

0704155711003096-Striker-.name: Does it go like this? Looks right... feels wavy...

0704155711003097-Striker-.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001242[gender:0]$ has a funny look on his face.)</font>

0704155711003148-SoulBinder-.name: Wait, wait, hold the phone... Where the heck did you get this? No wonder $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$ sent you to me... do you even know what you have here? What's the story? Come on, out with it!

0704155711003149-SoulBinder-.name: Well, it all started after I beat $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$...

0704155711003150-SoulBinder-.name: Ah. Ahhhh. So. You tried to purify your prize from defeating $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$, going so far as to use $item:30000421$, but in the end all you had to show for it was cursed junk. Do I have this right?

0704155711003152-SoulBinder-.name: Ha ha ha! Well, it's a good thing you found me. I've been applying a scientific approach to studying the darkness here, treating it as a waveform instead of a force, entity, or some spooky gooey thing like most people assume. The unsettling aura your weapon has here emits a similar frequency to the power of this place. And if that's the case... I might just be able to help you.

0704155711003153-SoulBinder-.name: I'll try to explain as simply as I can, so stop me if all this goes over your head. It's very scientific. Ahem. So, when two power sources meet on the same wavelength, they, uh, get into a little fight, and the big one beats up the little one until it runs home to mommy. Does that make sense?

0704155711003154-SoulBinder-.name: Now, we've established that the weapon and this place have power on the same wavelength. If we could find a way to focus the energy of this place, we could use it to drive out the curse in your weapon and break its seal. The darkness'll run home to mommy, and everyone wins. Sound good?

0704155711003156-SoulBinder-.name: Great! Alright, so, I'll get your weapon ready for the experiment. All I need you to do, is gather up some darkness to mash into this thing.

0704155711003157-SoulBinder-.name: How am I supposed to do that? A net?

0704155711003158-SoulBinder-.name: A net! Ha, that's a good one. Nope, we need to head to $map:02000350$. That's... hmm, how do I explain this... like a faucet of fountain of darkness that the handle broke off of. It's nasty... Long ago, it started to spread near $map:02000023$ and $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ and the fairies were barely able to stop it in time. Even then there were some fairies poisoned by Havi after being in $map:02000350$ too long. Like I said, nasty.

0704155711003159-SoulBinder-.name: Okay, here's where it gets gross. Every day, one $item:59200180$ grows on those poisoned fairies. Inside is something called $item:30000437$, and unfortunately that's what we need. We'll need a bunch, too, if we're going to gather enough darkness to shove the other darkness out of your thing. It's all very technical, you see.

0704155711003160-SoulBinder-.name: Now, there's a way into $map:02000350$ from $map:02000048$. Pass through there, look for $item:59200180$ and get the $item:30000437$ inside. And get a bunch. A whole bunch.

0704155711003161-SoulBinder-.name: The entrance to $map:02000350$ is at $map:02000048$. Pass through and find enough $itemPlural:30000437$ for us to fix your weapon.

0704155711003162-SoulBinder-.name: Yes, perfect! Boy, I've always wanted an assistant like you. Right, okay, I'll get everything ready for the experiment.

0704155711003164-SoulBinder-.name: This goes here... Need one of these... Is that... Yep, extra dark...

0704155711003166-SoulBinder-.name: Does it go like this? Looks right... feels wavy...

0704155711003167-SoulBinder-.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001242[gender:0]$ has a funny look on his face.)</font>

0704155711003099-Striker-.name: Hold it. We're not done yet. Well, I am, but if you want to use that weapon you most definitely are not.

0704155711003101-Striker-.name: Look at it! That thing is completely worn down from years of battle and seething evil. You try to swing it around without reforging it and it's going to snap in half or explode or something. And for a weapon like that, you'll need to travel to $map:02000203$ to reforge it. That's the only way.

0704155711003102-Striker-.name: You know what you need to do, right? I did the hard part, now you need to head off to $map:02000203$ and get that weapon reforged.

0704155711003103-Striker-.name: Good to see you, $MyPCName$! How are you doing?

0704155711003104-Striker-.name: Pretty good. Hey, do you think you could help me reforge this $item:15500064$?

0704155711003105-Striker-.name: This...! Holey moley, did you break the curse? Are you... okay? Didn't that take some harrowing deeds and descents into madness?

0704155711003106-Striker-.name: Nothing too mad or harrowing. Anyway, about reforging...?

0704155711003107-Striker-.name: Everything's cool, it's just $npcName:11001242[gender:0]$ said I should reforge it before it explodes or something.

0704155711003108-Striker-.name: It's not that simple... not with a weapon like this, anyway. You gotta understand, what makes that thing so powerful is the limitless life force of $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ within it. Once it passes to another, it'll begin to draw on their life force instead. And unless they're more powerful than $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$... well, I'm sure you can see the issue.

0704155711003109-Striker-.name: Wait... is this the weapon that exploded after I infused it? I think I'd like an explanation here!

0704155711003110-Striker-.name: Okay, but there's a lotta darkness involved...

0704155711003111-Striker-.name: You... actually forced out the evil using a more concentrated form of evil? That's absurdly clever. And you did end up with something you could use, just not something as useful as you were expecting.

0704155711003112-Striker-.name: Exactly! So... how do I make it useful again?

0704155711003113-Striker-.name: Lucky for you, my ancestors studied the mechanics of enchanted weapons and left exhaustive notes. They explain that the power that makes these weapons so potent is actually sourced from the wielder. That means this weapon was so incredible because $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ was using it. And that means we'll need a different method.

0704155711003114-Striker-.name: $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ is both powerful and immortal, and we still don't fully understand how either of those things came to be true. If we could uncover the secrets behind that power, we might find a way to empower this weapon again.

0704155711003115-Striker-.name: The day I tried to infuse it, I checked every note, journal, and record I could find to understand why. I'm getting closer to the answer, especially after what you've told me... but I'm not there yet. Bear with me, and I promise you we can make this weapon legendary!

0704155711003169-SoulBinder-.name: Hold it. We're not done yet. Well, I am, but if you want to use that weapon you most definitely are not.

0704155711003171-SoulBinder-.name: Look at it! That thing is completely worn down from years of battle and seething evil. You try to swing it around without reforging it and it's going to snap in half or explode or something. And for a weapon like that, you'll need to travel to $map:02000203$ to reforge it. That's the only way.

0704155711003172-SoulBinder-.name: You know what you need to do, right? I did the hard part, now you need to head off to $map:02000203$ and get that weapon reforged.

0704155711003173-SoulBinder-.name: Good to see you, $MyPCName$! How are you doing?

0704155711003174-SoulBinder-.name: Pretty good. Hey, do you think you could help me reforge this $item:15600064$?

0704155711003175-SoulBinder-.name: This...! Holey moley, did you break the curse? Are you... okay? Didn't that take some harrowing deeds and descents into madness?

0704155711003176-SoulBinder-.name: Nothing too mad or harrowing. Anyway, about reforging...?

0704155711003185-SoulBinder-.name: The day I tried to infuse it, I checked every note, journal, and record I could find to understand why. I'm getting closer to the answer, especially after what you've told me... but I'm not there yet. Bear with me, and I promise you we can make this weapon legendary!

0704155711003116-Striker-.name: Aren't you $MyPCName$? Could I have a moment? I heard something strange not long ago and thought I should let you know.

0704155711003118-Striker-.name: It's a little vague... But it's still interesting. A shaman from a faraway land passed through here recently. He explained he was researching demons and asked if I heard the rumors of a powerful fire demon the blacksmiths of this place had been talking about.

0704155711003119-Striker-.name: I remembered the demon called $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ that you defeated and told him of that. He was very interested, so I told him about the way into $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s lair somewhere in $map:02000200$.

0704155711003120-Striker-.name: He was really happy to hear that, and left for $map:02000200$ straightaway. As he was leaving, he said something I won't soon forget. He said he would remove the curse from within the demon.

0704155711003121-Striker-.name: What in the world are you talking about?

0704155711003122-Striker-.name: Look, according to the ancient records, you can enter the consciousness of a demon in moments when their power wanes. In those moments their defenses falter, and you can learn their darkest secrets. Their desires, their weaknesses, and of course, how to break their curses.

0704155711003123-Striker-.name: This might be the chance you need to break that curse on your weapon! What do you have to lose?

0704155711003124-Striker-.name: Besides my life? Fine, how do I get into a demon's head?

0704155711003125-Striker-.name: Huh? How should I know? The shaman said it, I didn't! He left for $map:02000200$ not so long ago, so perhaps you can catch him if you hurry. His name's $npcName:11001485[gender:0]$.

0704155711003126-Striker-.name: The shaman called $npcName:11001485[gender:0]$ left for $map:02000200$ not long ago. You should be able to find him around there... he has a very peculiar aura.

0704155711003127-Striker-.name: I'm sure I heard a sound. It seems like something has changed. Ahh, if only it wasn't so dark here! On top of all my troubles, I still have this accursed night blindness...

0704155711003128-Striker-.name: This demon, $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$... If he really is responsible for my misfortunes, I can't go back until I've settled the score!

0704155711003130-Striker-.name: Huh? Is someone there? Who are you, and how do you know my name?

0704155711003186-SoulBinder-.name: Aren't you $MyPCName$? Could I have a moment? I heard something strange not long ago and thought I should let you know.

0704155711003193-SoulBinder-.name: This might be the chance you need to break that curse on your weapon! What do you have to lose?

0704155711003194-SoulBinder-.name: Besides my life? Fine, how do I get into a demon's head?

0704155711003195-SoulBinder-.name: Huh? How should I know? The shaman said it, I didn't! He left for $map:02000200$ not so long ago, so perhaps you can catch him if you hurry. His name's $npcName:11001485[gender:0]$.

0704155711003196-SoulBinder-.name: The shaman called $npcName:11001485[gender:0]$ left for $map:02000200$ not long ago. You should be able to find him around there... he has a very peculiar aura.

0704155711003197-SoulBinder-.name: I'm sure I heard a sound. It seems like something has changed. Ahh, if only it wasn't so dark here! On top of all my troubles, I still have this accursed night blindness...

0704155711003198-SoulBinder-.name: This demon, $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$... If he really is responsible for my misfortunes, I can't go back until I've settled the score!

0704155711003200-SoulBinder-.name: Huh? Is someone there? Who are you, and how do you know my name?

0704155711003131-Striker-.name: Why would you come to this dark place? And how did you know my name? Do you serve the demon?

0704155711003132-Striker-.name: No way! I just want to break the curse on this here $item:15500064$.

0704155711003133-Striker-.name: My goodness, that is a dreadful curse. Tell me, was it placed by the demon known as $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$? The one who resides here?

0704155711003134-Striker-.name: Is it possible to enter $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s consciousness to break the curse?

0704155711003135-Striker-.name: I... um... Well, yes. In theory, anyway. The ancient texts describe the process of entering the consciousness and unraveling their true nature, giving the visitor power over the demon. But wait, where did you even hear about this?

0704155711003136-Striker-.name: No time for that now. I need to get into $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s head.

0704155711003137-Striker-.name: You could hardly have picked a trickier target. A demon that powerful isn't going to be easy to subdue, which is the first step to opening the path. You may find an advantage if you battle it during a lunar eclipse, during a ritual, or on a white night. Or you can just pound on it super hard and force open the path to its consciousness.

0704155711003138-Striker-.name: If you can lay $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ low, search the area for a portal. A lot has changed about this place since I first came here, so don't assume it will be easy to find.

0704155711003139-Striker-.name: Now, if you do manage to enter $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s consciousness, I want to hear all the details. During my studies I was also cursed, leaving me in this sorry state you see before you. It's possible my nemesis is the same demon you seek to battle, and if so... well, that would be terribly convenient.

0704155711003140-Striker-.name:
You might also want to take the cursed weapon with you. I don't know what exactly you'll need to break the curse but having the actual cursed item certainly can't hirt. Oh, and I recommend you take that weapon.
You don't know what form the clues to break the demon's curse will take on.
You may regret it if you don't take it.

0704155711003141-Striker-.name: If you enter $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s consciousness, keep that weapon close. You don't know what form the clues to break the demon's curse will take on.

0704155711003142-Striker-.name: You're back! And you're alive! Tell me, what did you see in $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s consciousness?

0704155711003143-Striker-.name: Hoo boy, where do I start...

0704155711003144-Striker-.name: The eternal flame... So, you broke the curse with intense heat? That's ingenius, $MyPCName$! You look like you've been through a lot, but at least it was worth it!

0704155711003145-Striker-.name: Speaking of which, do you think your curse is connected to $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$?

0704155711003146-Striker-.name: No, I'm afraid not. My curse chills me to my very bones, and it's clear that $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s power is rooted in fire. But I'm happy to have learned more about demonkind from your exploits.

0704155711003147-Striker-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$! Be sure to fill me in on any other demons you get up close and personal with.

0704155711003201-SoulBinder-.name: Why would you come to this dark place? And how did you know my name? Do you serve the demon?

0704155711003214-SoulBinder-.name: The eternal flame... So, you broke the curse with intense heat? That's ingenius, $MyPCName$! You look like you've been through a lot, but at least it was worth it!

0704155711003217-SoulBinder-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$! Be sure to fill me in on any other demons you get up close and personal with.

0105153412001487--.name: The $item:30000419$ of $npcName:23190005[gender:0]$ himself... There's definitely something ominous about this blood.

0105153412001488--.name: After touching it for just a moment, I felt my vitality drain away. They say that $npcName:23190005[gender:0]$ devoured the life force of anything that came near him...

0105153412001489--.name: This isn't exactly something you should keep in your pocket. I will be returning to the $map:2000173$ for now. Find me when you get there and we can discuss this in greater detail.

0105153412001490--.name: This isn't exactly something you should keep in your pocket. I will be returning to the $map:2000173$ for now. Find me when you get there and we can discuss this in greater detail.

0105153412001491--.name: So, tell me. Did you notice anything strange about the $item:30000419$?

0105153412001493--.name: Did you feel any weakness? Sudden bouts of despair? Terror at the horrors that will doubtless befall you?

0105153412001495--.name: Just as I expected! When I saw the $item:30000419$, I felt indescribable dread in the very pit of my stomach. But there's something more to it. Something beneath the evil...

0105153412001496--.name: Can you be a little more precise?

0105153412001497--.name: I wish I could. All I can tell you is that this $item:30000419$ isn't normal.

0105153412001498--.name: This is all beyond my area of expertise, you see. I can speculate, if you really want me to, but if you want answers, then... I'm going to have to refer you to someone else.

0105153412001499--.name: Who should I ask for advice?

0105153412001500--.name: I haven't met him personally, but there's one of the fairfolk who's made a name for himself in the field of life magic. I believe he may be able to solve the mysteries of this $item:30000419$.

0105153412001501--.name: Where can I find that fairfolk?

0105153412001502--.name: $map:2000023$ is a place of wise men and sages. I'm certain you will be able to find $npcName:11001210[gender:0]$ there.

0105153412001503--.name: I thought you'd be in more of a hurry to see $npcName:11001210[gender:0]$. I wouldn't hold onto that blood any longer than you have to.

0105153412001504--.name: I sense a vile presence. What have you brought me?

0105153412001506--.name: $item:30000419$...? Is this the evil presence I detected?

0105153412001508--.name: Incredible... All life must return to nature. That is the law of mortality that binds us all. But somehow this blood exists in defiance of that law...

0105153412001509--.name: Eternal life that rejects the laws of mortality...? No. No, there's something very wrong with this...

0105153412001511--.name: I am beginning to understand. The $item:30000419$ is infused with the life force of many different creatures. Somehow, that's allowing it to resist the laws of nature and mortality.

0105153412001512--.name: But that's not all. There is also an intense malice in the very core of the blood. Enough malice to shatter a normal human mind.

0105153412001513--.name: But there's... there's something else, buried even deeper. It's barely perceptible, but it's powerful. Frighteningly powerful...

0105153412001514--.name: May I hold onto this for a moment? The power at the very core of the blood is powerful, but I sense no evil in it. If I can purify this blood of its malice, we may be able to learn the nature of this power.

0105153412001515--.name: May I hold onto this for a moment? The power at the very core of the blood is powerful, but I sense no evil in it. If I can purify this blood of its malice, we may be able to learn the nature of this power.

0105153412001516--.name: May I attempt to purify the $item:30000420$?

0105153412001518--.name: It is said that $npcName:23190005[gender:0]$ never stops beating. I can certainly see why. The $item:30000420$ within this blood is what powers it...

0105153412001519--.name: So the source of his power... isn't evil?

0105153412001520--.name: That's right. Even in this small particle of $item:30000420$, I see a wonder I've never before encountered.

0105153412001521--.name: If one were to gather enough of these fragments, to merge them into a complete form... Well, anything could happen. You may have the $item:30000420$ now.

0105153412001522--.name: One concern I should warn you about. This $item:30000420$ is but a fragment. But were you to perfect it, it would become a whirling source of endless magic. It would be powerful, yes, but it would break the laws of nature. Would that make it good... or evil?

0105153412001523--.name: What matters is how it's used.

0105153412001524--.name: Hmm... When a new life is born, an old life returns to the earth. This is the balance of nature. Something like $item:30000420$, which only creates power and never consumes it... That would be like a world of birth without death. Such a thing cannot be sustained.

0105153412001525--.name: Excess leads to imbalance. An ever-expanding power may be useful at first, but it could well go out of control and consume us all.

0105153412001526--.name: So there's no way to safely use it?

0105153412001527--.name: I don't think... Wait. Yes, perhaps Harcha could do it...

0105153412001529--.name: He is a blacksmith at $map:2000203$. A friend of mine. I met him while I was researching the possibility of life regeneration through mineral... That is neither here nor there. His family has a special smithing technique that is of particular interest to us.

0105153412001531--.name: He said he was studying to use this technique to imbue a weapon with potent magic. Magic more powerful than anything the enchanters of the day had. The secret was balance... His ancestors had a method of balancing powerful magic so that it wouldn't run rampant.

0105153412001532--.name: We could use that balance to control this power!

0105153412001533--.name: Presumably we could, but he hadn't yet perfected the technique when I last spoke to him. It seems there was a certain mineral that he couldn't find anywhere.

0105153412001534--.name: That was some time ago. Maybe he's figured it out by now. Either way, I believe Harcha is your best bet at turning the $item:30000420$ to a useful purpose. Why don't you seek him out at $map:2000203$?

0105153412001535--.name: I believe Harcha is your best bet at turning the $item:30000420$ to a useful purpose. Why don't you seek him out at $map:2000203$?

0105153412001536--.name: Sorry. I don't do custom orders.

0105153412001537--.name: Do you know where I can find Harcha?

0105153412001538--.name: Do I? Harcha was my great-granddad!

0105153412001539--.name: I wonder why someone'd send you to find Harcha. It's been decades since he quit smithing...

0105153412001540--.name: Did he ever figure out how to balance magic in a weapon?

0105153412001541--.name: Not many people knew about his research. He had theories, but the old man never did manage to make such a weapon. I've got some ideas of my own, and I even have some leads...

0105153412001543--.name: There's a mineral called $item:30000421$ that's supposedly sops up unstable magic like a sponge. I hear they use it to clean curses off the land and such.

0105153412001544--.name: If I had some of that, I bet I could finish my great-grandad's work.

0105153412001545--.name: Problem is, you can't get it anywhere in Victoria Island. There just aren't any deposits here. And even if I did have it, $item:30000421$ is just the stabilizing agent. Without a source of power to stabilize, it's not much good.

0105153412001549--.name: $npcName:23190005[gender:0]$?! W-wow! Yes, this'll... this'll do the trick!

0105153412001550--.name: Wherever you got that, we need more. And the $item:30000421$, too. I need enough of both to refine and recombine into a stable form... No... No, it couldn't work, could it?

0105153412001552--.name: Huh? Oh, right. So, I have good news... and twice as much bad news. What do you want first?

0105153412001554--.name: Let's get the bad news out of the way.

0105153412001555--.name: The good news is that the power of the $item:30000420$ should be compatible with $item:30000421$. Together, they'll make a weapon unlike anything Maple World has ever seen.

0105153412001558--.name: First, the $item:30000420$ you brought me is impressive... but it's just one fragment. We'll need more if we want to show its true power.

0105153412001559--.name: Second, remember how I said you can't get $item:30000421$ anywhere in Victoria Island? Without that ore, we're dead in the water. Unless the Allicari brought some with them from across the sea, but what are the odds of that?

0105153412001560--.name: Is it possible they did bring some? No, no, I'm just getting my hopes up at this point. There's no way we'll get our hands on any $item:30000421$...

0105153412001563--.name: I'm glad your eager, but don't get your hopes up! First, I need more $itemPlural:30000420$. There's no point in doing this in half-steps. We want a weapon that will go down in legend.

0105153412001564--.name: Then, we need to get our hands on $item:30000421$ somehow. The Allicari merchants in $map:2000064$ might have some, but that's a long shot.

0105153412001565--.name: If, against all odds, you can get the materials I need, I'll take care of the rest.

0105153412001566--.name: Once again, I need two materials. First, I need more $itemPlural:30000420$. There's no point in doing this in half-steps. We want a weapon that will go down in legend.

0105153412001567--.name: Then, we need to get our hands on $item:30000421$ somehow. The Allicari merchants in $map:2000064$ might have some, but that's a long shot.

0105153412001568--.name: If, against all odds, you can get the materials I need, I'll take care of the rest.

0105153412001569--.name: You actually did it! Well... Luckily for you, I already prepared a weapon mold. Give me some time to synthesize the materials you brought me...

0105153412001573--.name: <font color="#909090">(He's concentrating harder than you've ever seen anyone concentrate before. It's making you a little uncomfortable.)</font>

0105153412001575--.name: N-no... I infused the weapon with the $itemPlural:30000420$ and $item:30000421$, but something went wrong. Some sort of dark magic flared up from within the essences. I'm sorry...

0105153412001577--.name: It's as powerful as they come, but it's basically cursed. It's not safe to use in this state.

0105153412001578--.name: I've shamed my great-granddad. No matter what it takes, I swear I'll find a way to make this weapon usable!

0416153812003076-Mastery05-.name: Hi, $MyPCName$, I'm $npc:11003870[gender:0]$, from Berg Island. We've finished reviewing your application, and your 50,000,000 meso payment has been processed. I've got your authorization forms right here, and I'm happy to welcome to the Berg Mining Collective.

0416153812003077-Mastery05-.name: Um... I think there's been a mix-up. I didn't sign up for anything.

0416153812003078-Mastery05-.name: Hahaha. Very funny. In any case, after a year-long vetting process, and a substantial investment, I'm sure you're quite eager to begin taking advantage of your exclusive access to one of the world's richest, and most varied mineral deposits ever discovered.

0416153812003079-Mastery05-.name: But, I didn't pay for any of that...

0416153812003080-Mastery05-.name: Uhh... You are $MyPCName$, are you not...? It's unlikely our accountants transposed an identification number, but I'd be mortified to mistakenly hand over access to hundreds of millions of mesos worth of minerals to someone who wasn't a member of the collective...

0416153812003081-Mastery05-.name: H-hundreds... of millions...? Why yes, I am $MyPCName$, and I'm ready to visit Whats-Its-Name Island right away.

0416153812003082-Mastery05-.name: Oh, excellent! For a moment I thought one of our employees had made a terrible, career-ending mistake. Anywho, come meet me at $map:02000424$ and I'll get you all set up!

0416153812003083-Mastery05-.name: Go and meet $npc:11000454[gender:0]$ in $map:02000062$. He'll arrange your voyage.

0416153812003084-Mastery05-.name: <font color="#909090">(Is this really happening? You should go to $map:02000062$ for now.)</font>

0416153812003085-Mastery05-.name: Nice day for some weather, huh?

0416153812003086-Mastery05-.name: So there I was in a world of trouble. Me in a leaky lifeboat bailing fast as I could, against the stormy fury of the sea...  I've had smoother journeys.

0416153812003087-Mastery05-.name: Speaking of... You know, I almost married a mermaid once! I think I dodged a bullet there, but sometimes I think of those poor mermaids who missed out.

0416153812003088-Mastery05-.name: <font color="#909090">(Across the room, $npcName:11000453$ rolls her eyes in disbelief.)</font>

0416153812003090-Mastery05-.name: Oh, you know, cultural differences. We were from different worlds, after all!

0416153812003091-Mastery05-.name: No...  The boat! What happened with the boat?

0416153812003093-Mastery05-.name: Oh, ahoy there. Did you need something?

0416153812003094-Mastery05-.name: I'm just looking for a ride to $map:02000424$.

0416153812003095-Mastery05-.name: Ohh, I bet you're the one $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$ was talking about! The lucky new member of the Berg Mining Collective!

0416153812003096-Mastery05-.name: I've already set everything up with $npc:11000981[gender:0]$ over in $map:02000062$'s southern quay. He'll book your passage to $map:02000424$.

0416153812003098-Mastery05-.name: Ahaha, right! Where was I? I guess I'll start over...

0416153812003099-Mastery05-.name: NO! Um, you stopped at the part where you arrived on $map:02000424$!

0416153812003100-Mastery05-.name: Well then! So there I was lying on the shores of $map:02000424$, barely breathing, and without a ship to my name.

0416153812003101-Mastery05-.name: Stranded on that island, all I could do was wait. But as $map:02000062$'s greatest fisherman, I at least wouldn't have to worry about going hungry.

0416153812003102-Mastery05-.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11000455$ seems a little skeptical, but otherwise enraptured.)</font>

0416153812003104-Mastery05-.name: In between wild bouts of fishing, I explored the secrets of $map:02000424$. Turns out... it's full of rocks! And not just any rocks, but minerals as far as the eye can see!

0416153812003105-Mastery05-.name: Yes, I conquered $map:02000424$ all on my own, thanks to my perseverance and wit! If only I'd been the first to stake a claim, I'd be rich.

0416153812003107-Mastery05-.name: Ahaha! If I had a meso for every time I heard that...

0416153812003109-Mastery05-.name: Oh, you're the mining enthusiast $npc:11000454[gender:0]$ talked about. Well, it sounds like no one could appreciate $map:02000424$ like you.

0416153812003110-Mastery05-.name: You'll need to take a Berg Mining Collective boat to $map:02000424$. I'll handle all the paperwork, I've got a few copies I half filled out earlier.

0416153812003111-Mastery05-.name: That boat'll take you straight to $map:02000424$, no stops or layovers. Then you can find $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$, who I'm sure you can't wait to meet.

0416153812003112-Mastery05-.name: Fortunately, the seas are calm today. Safe voyage!

0416153812003113-Mastery05-.name: Fortunately, the seas are calm today. Safe voyage!

0416153812003114-Mastery05-.name: Welcome to $map:02000424$. This island belongs to the Berg Mining Collective, and now you can count yourself a proud member. As long as you don't go over your daily allotment, you can mine as much as you like.

0416153812003115-Mastery05-.name: You're lucky the weather is clear and the sea is calm. Boat rides can be perilous.

0416153812003116-Mastery05-.name: After $map:02000424$ was purchased by the Berg Mining Collective, a geological survey revealed it to be one of the most mineral-diverse places on the planet.

0416153812003117-Mastery05-.name: And now you, and a handful of other carefully selected individuals, can share in the profit.

0416153812003118-Mastery05-.name: Anytime you need to mine some precious rocks, this is the place to do it.

0416153812003119-Mastery05-.name: What makes this island so special is that there are veins of just about every ore and mineral found in Maple World right here. It's like an everything bagel, but with rocks!

0416153812003120-Mastery05-.name: Hey, since you're here... You think you could help me out?

0416153812003122-Mastery05-.name: It's just a small favor. Literally, it's a small object I want you to deliver. Since my job here is as the island's caretaker, it would be weird if I did it myself. So... here.

0416153812003124-Mastery05-.name: Deliver this $item:30001128$ to a $npcTitle:11003871$ named $npcName:11003871[gender:0]$</font>. If you head up those steps and follow the path, you'll run into him sooner or later.

0416153812003125-Mastery05-.name: I know you just got here, but to be fair this is a GREAT way to learn the lay of the land!

0416153812003126-Mastery05-.name: Deliver this $item:30001128$ to a $npcTitle:11003871$ named $npcName:11003871[gender:0]$</font>. If you head up those steps and follow the path, you'll run into him sooner or later.

0813141612003221-Mastery05-.name: How could you be so clumsy and lose it? Go get another one!

0813141612003222-Mastery05-.name: Huh? Don't you have it already? Snap out of it!

0813141612003223-Mastery05-.name: Your bag is full. Clear out your bag first.

0416153812003129-Mastery05-.name: Why are you giving this to me? Where is $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$?

0416153812003131-Mastery05-.name: This isn't even what I asked for. I bet $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$ couldn't get the right item and sent you so he wouldn't have to deal with it. You poor sap.

0416153812003132-Mastery05-.name: Well, it's not your fault. Thanks for trying, anyway. Maybe I can find something to do with this $item:30001128$.

0416153812003133-Mastery05-.name: Welp, I guess I'll head back to $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$ now...

0416153812003134-Mastery05-.name: Oh, hang on! Can you help me with something since you're here?

0416153812003135-Mastery05-.name: Ooh, I'd love to but I'm pretty busy...

0416153812003137-Mastery05-.name: Oh, okay. That's fine. Yeah, no problem, I'll just keep working while my daughter grows up without her father, and my wife grows more distant by the day.

0416153812003138-Mastery05-.name: Really, it's no trouble at all. Gives me more time to figure out what I'll tell my daughter when she's grown and asks what her dad has been doing with his life.

0416153812003139-Mastery05-.name: That's just being a father for you. Yep, I don't need any help or anything, really. You go about your urgent business. I'm sure it's very important. Very. Important.

0416153812003143-Mastery05-.name: Gather up the minerals you find around here and take them to $npcName:11003872[gender:0]$.

0416153812003145-Mastery05-.name: Gather up the minerals you find around here and take them to $npcName:11003872[gender:0]$.

0416153812003146-Mastery05-.name: Who are you, and why are you bringing me minerals? Are you licensed to be moving those around?

0416153812003148-Mastery05-.name: Oh, $npc:11003871[gender:0]$ asked you to do it! I'm not surprised he's trying to pawn his work off like that... Anyway, thanks.

0416153812003149-Mastery05-.name: So hey, if you're here in $map:02000424$, that must mean you're in good with the collective. You must be trustworthy. Diligent.

0416153812003150-Mastery05-.name: If that's the case, I look forward to seeing you around here.

0416153812003151-Mastery05-.name: Uh, yeah! Totally the case. Let's be buddies!

0416153812003152-Mastery05-.name: Well said! It's been a pleasure... buddy!

0416153812003154-Mastery05-.name: Fine folks like you are always welcome!

0416153812003155-Mastery05-.name: Yikes, you look exhausted. How's $map:02000424$ treating you?

0416153812003156-Mastery05-.name: Oh, it's great. Lots of rocks, and lots of people who... need things.

0416153812003157-Mastery05-.name: Ha! Yeah, I heard you've been running all over the island. The collective definitely picked you for a reason.

0416153812003158-Mastery05-.name: Well you're certainly welcome anytime! I'm convinced, and that's good enough for anyone.

0416153812003161-Mastery05-.name: Although most know me as $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$, the Head Librarian of $map:02000031$, I'm also a member of the Alkimi Guild!

0416153812003162-Mastery05-.name: I've contacted you because the guild has been looking for you. Don't worry, that's a good thing!

0416153812003163-Mastery05-.name: The guild has recognized your incredible talent for foraging, $MyPCName$, and so they would like to invite you to $map:02000425$.

0416153812003164-Mastery05-.name: Go to $map:02000069$ in $map:02000062$ and speak to a $npcTitle:11003876$ named $npcName:11003876[gender:1]$. She will arrange your voyage to $map:02000425$.

0416153812003165-Mastery05-.name: That's all! I think they wanted me to tell you in person so you wouldn't think the offer was junk mail.

0416153812003166-Mastery05-.name: <font color="#909090">(You should go to $map:02000062$ and meet $npc:11003876[gender:1]$ at $map:02000069$.)</font>

0416153812003167-Mastery05-.name: ...I really wish books didn't get so dusty.

0416153812003169-Mastery05-.name: That's me. So who are these Alkimi Guild people, and why do they want me to come to their island?

0416153812003170-Mastery05-.name: You don't know? The Alkimi Guild is super into alchemy. I thought they invited you because you're some kind of herb-gathering hotshot?

0416153812003171-Mastery05-.name: Not just anybody can charter a boat to $map:02000425$, y'know. It's a real honor to be invited!

0416153812003172-Mastery05-.name: And it's supposed to be so beautiful there. I'm so jealous you get to go!

0416153812003173-Mastery05-.name: In any case, I think they're expecting me to help you arrange a ship to get there.  I don't mind, of course. I'm at home around ships!

0416153812003176-Mastery05-.name: Alright, we'll be launching from here for $map:02000425$. Just give us a second to get the ship ship-shape!

0416153812003178-Mastery05-.name: You all set? We're ready to set sail!

0416153812003179-Mastery05-.name: You can take the ship to $map:02000425$ whenever you want!

0416153812003180-Mastery05-.name: Farewell! And bring back some pictures or something!

0416153812003181-Mastery05-.name: I want to see that beautiful $map:02000425$ scenery!

0416153812003182-Mastery05-.name: Farewell! And bring back some pictures or something! I want to see that beautiful scenery of $map:02000425$!

0416153812003184-Mastery05-.name: I'm $npcName:11003878[gender:1]$, the caretaker of $map:02000425$. I hope the journey here was no trouble for you.

0416153812003185-Mastery05-.name: This island belongs to the Alkimi Guild, and is used as an herb sanctuary. We maintain the peace and integrity of this place by limiting who may visit.

0416153812003186-Mastery05-.name: You were chosen, $MyPCName$, because of your extraordinary talent and appreciation for handling such herbs.

0416153812003187-Mastery05-.name: Oh, goodness, I just remembered. I was supposed to dispatch lunch to our $npcTitle:11003879$, $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$, but I'm afraid I lost track of the time.

0416153812003188-Mastery05-.name: Perhaps we can help each other, then? If you deliver the packed lunch, you can tour the island while correcting my terrible oversight.

0416153812003189-Mastery05-.name: This sounds a lot like busywork...

0416153812003190-Mastery05-.name: Oh, dear! I would never dream of wasting your time! Let me assure you, I never ask random tasks of my associates. Ever! What favors I ask always have a clear purpose.

0416153812003191-Mastery05-.name: Please deliver $item:30001130$ to $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$. I would be forever grateful!

0416153812003192-Mastery05-.name: Please deliver $item:30001130$ to $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$. I would be forever grateful!

0814134512003225-Mastery05-.name: Don't tell me you lost it! Do you think it's easy making a packed lunch? Don't lose it this time!

0814134512003226-Mastery05-.name: Isn't that the packed lunch in your hand? You must be really exhausted.

0814134512003227-Mastery05-.name: You should check your bag first. I think it's full.

0416153812003194-Mastery05-.name: Hey, I've got this packed lunch for a guy named $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$?

0416153812003195-Mastery05-.name: Sigh... $npcName:11003878[gender:1]$ forgot about our lunches again, didn't she?

0416153812003196-Mastery05-.name: Thank you. I was getting hungry and losing faith in ever seeing this lunch. What's your name?

0416153812003199-Mastery05-.name: $MyPCName$. You've obviously got a good heart. Mind doing me a favor?

0416153812003200-Mastery05-.name: Since I'm on my lunch break, could you pull the <font color="#ffd200">weeds</font> around here while I eat?

0416153812003201-Mastery05-.name: Couldn't you just do it after lunch?

0416153812003202-Mastery05-.name: I could. If I wolf it down as quick as I can.

0416153812003203-Mastery05-.name: But you saw this lunch, right? Surely you can appreciate its delectable flavors and aromas. I want to savor it while I can.

0416153812003204-Mastery05-.name: Fine, fine, just stop talking. You're making me hungry.

0416153812003205-Mastery05-.name: I really appreciate this. I never get to enjoy my lunches!

0416153812003207-Mastery05-.name: $npc:11003879[gender:0]$ is really going at that lunch...

0416153812003208-Mastery05-.name: Looks like you've finished your lunch.

0416153812003209-Mastery05-.name: Mm, worth every bite! I can't thank you enough for giving me the time to relax for once.

0416153812003210-Mastery05-.name: Here, I've wiped the lunch box clean. Please return it to $npc:11003878[gender:1]$ on your way back.

0416153812003211-Mastery05-.name: <font color="#909090">(Looks like you're going back to $npc:11003878[gender:1]$.)</font>

0416153812003212-Mastery05-.name: You're a real hero, my friend! Have a safe trip back!

0416153812003213-Mastery05-.name: I'm stuffed. It's been too long since I really enjoyed a meal.

0814134512003229-Mastery05-.name: It seems all I did was talk and talk, and I completely forgot to give you the $item:30001131$. Here, take it.

0814134512003230-Mastery05-.name: Isn't it in your bags already?

0814134512003231-Mastery05-.name: Why don't you clear out your bag first?

0416153812003214-Mastery05-.name: <font color="#909090">(You return the empty lunch box to $npc:11003878[gender:1]$.)</font>

0416153812003215-Mastery05-.name: So, what do you think of $map:02000425$?

0416153812003216-Mastery05-.name: It's a beautiful island, isn't it?

0416153812003218-Mastery05-.name: I saw you pulling weeds for $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$. I didn't expect you to be so gracious with your time. I see we chose well in inviting you to come here. Consider yourself welcome to avail yourself to the bounties of the island at any time!

0416153812003219-Mastery05-.name: This isn't much, but you deserve something for your trouble. Hope you enjoy it.
